title: Fantastic staycation.
desc: Service of the hotel was pretty amazing, although the food and service at breakfast could be further improved. Tons of good food nearby the hotel area. Room was huge, good and clean. Would definitely book another longer staycation again in future.

title: Modern decor with youthful and attentive staff in a vibrant part of Singapore
desc: It is always nice to break out and try something new - especially when it works out so nicely as the Andaz Singapore. From its modern decor and well appointed rooms to the staff and food quality in the outlets I found the experience very nice way to return to Singapore after 2 years. I was a bit uncertain at first about its location, but the vibrancy of Kampong Glam, Haji Lane and Bugis area were a wonderful change from the mercenary shopping scene of Orchard Road. Hotel staff were also commendable for being friendly and very service oriented - they all went out of their way to try and help me. I think the Director of Operations Ms Any Lu has done a fine job of encouraging staff to not be afraid of foreign guests.

title: Gorgeous hotel, with romantic experience marred by 665 Degrees Farenheit
desc: We stayed at Andaz for the Klook 36 hour package, which was perfect for us. We checked in on the morning of our wedding day at 9am, and stayed till 9pm the following night. The room was wonderful and we got the corner room at 3730, providing a wonderful view. The room was a great size, with separate walk-in wardrobe, a huge bathroom, and a seating area which we used for the bridal make-up. No complaints about the room, honestly! It was very spacious and comfortable. We were happy to have booked this stay for our special occasion. After checking into our hotel room, we tried to book a table for 2 at 665 Degrees Fahrenheit for lunch on the second day of our stay via the concierge / front desk. They said okay, and that they would confirm with us via a call back, but nothing

title: Good but can improve in check in and check out.
desc: Overall stay was good beside the hiccup in check in and check out. Breakfast was delicious and the staff serving breakfast was nice. Was offered Bay View Twin Room and the view is great! Will recommend.

title: Staycation
desc: Overall, my family and I enjoyed our stay and the food at 665 restaurant. Here are some minor issues that you can improve on: 1) The TV remote control is not working 2) The safe box was unable to open However, the problem was resolved by the hotel staffs very quickly.

title: Always perfect despite Low staff count
desc: Got the presidential suite at a discount and it was the second time we stayed there. Service was average - but I think it seems that‚Äôs the Andaz biz model where they focus more on the rooms and run on a rather lean staff count (as opposed to say a Capella where you run into staff asking you if things are okay all the time). That said, room was impeccable. Clean and well maintained. View was great. Staff was friendly when approached. Will be back!

title: Nice view from the room, complete room amenities provided and friendly staff
desc: Service was excellent! I was given link thru email for pre-check in and to book for swimming pool, breakfast and gym usage a few days before check-in. Room is ready to use by 10am. Reception staff are friendly and accommodating. I was given room 3313 which has a really nice view out of the full length window. Amenities in the room are complete. Minibar refreshments are complimentary. My sis was given macaroons and a card as we were there to celebrate her birthday. The view from the infinity pool is also stunning. And the gentleman staff manning the pool has been helpful and friendly too! Had a really nice stay there as staff made us feel very welcomed. Did not use the dining voucher though as the food are not halal but appreciate that staff has been very kind to inform us

title: Hotel with nice environment and great food nearby
desc: Stay at Andaz was great. Room was clean and spacious. Reception staff was friendly and tried her best to accomodate to my request. Great foods around hotel area as well. Room price is worth the money.

title: Awesome
desc: Quick check in even though there was a crowd. Melissa lim and team really left a great impression Unfortunately, we are unable to get a reservation at 665, otherwise, everything else was perfect Was treated to some macarons when Melissa noted my birthdate... that was a nice touch

title: 1 night stay with city view
desc: Location is good. Check-in is fast. Service is good except for some staff who needs to be more responsive. Room is big and bed is comfortable but pillow is a bit too soft. View is nice. Complimentary mini bar with lots of drinks and some snacks. Breakfast is yummy. Highly recommended.

title: Sure to revisit
desc: This is the 2nd time my family and I stayed here. The ambience, service and the rooms were simply amazing. The location is perfect for eateries and I would love to stay at the presidential suite if given a chance. The swimming pool view is breathtaking. Overall a perfect stay and saving some money to return.

title: Rest and Relax
desc: awesome room atmosphere and cosy bed. had a free upgrade to a bay view room where i can see MBS and the singapore flyer. good for relaxation. however, due to bad weather and covid, there is no sheltered path for a short distance to the nearest mall.

title: Wedding + Staycation
desc: Stayed at the Large Suite room for 2 nights after our wedding lunch. Wedding Lunch was great and the banquet team that served us at the Garden Studio on 19 Feb 2022 did a great job. The events person, Valerie managed our requests well and managed to help us book an evening slot at Mr Stork. Overall all, the hotel food, service, amenities and facilities were great! Will consider returning again during our anniversary next year!

title: Hotel condition
desc: Hotel room is spacious and clean and in well kept condition. Only bath towel provided. No hand towel. Near Proximity to shopping centre - bugis junction n bugis +. Take lift to b3 and walk towards downtown mrt/bugis mrt

title: Great stay
desc: Hotel is located near a wide host of food choices. Room was exquisite compared to other hotels of the same price range. Public transport extremely accessible. Very exclusive feeling when you head up to the lobby on the 25th floor.

title: Staycation
desc: Bookwd the Andaz Singapore‚Äôs stay at KING Bed or TWIN Beds (room only) package. Had a great room with magnificent view. Room was very clean and bed was very comfortable and had a great sleep. Good location with nearby amenities. Staffs were friendly and provided great service.

title: staycay
desc: Good and convenient hotel to stay. Hotel is clean and gave us the highest floor on my bday. Tried earlier check in but was rejected. Also downside is only need wait 30 minutes to check out to retrieve your deposit if u paid in cash.

title: Great Stay with Awesome Views
desc: Loved the room and the view. Staff were helpful and pleasant. Great for a weekend staycay. Staff provided a little surprise for husband's birthday. Overall a lovely stay. Will definitely return again.

title: Hotel staycation
desc: The staycation would be better if there is Halal breakfast available. Staff and room service personal provided good friendly sevice. The ambience and location of the hotel was excellent. As it was near Bugis and Arab Street area, find eating places for Muslim customers helps alot.

title: Exceptional
desc: Booked a birthday staycation for my partner for 2 nights after seeing photos of the gorgeous room interior and views on Andaz's website. We arrived before noon to drop our bags off and were pleasantly surprised that our room was ready and we had received a room upgrade. The large suite was so awe-inducing we refused to leave the room. The full-length windows, lounging area, walk-in wardrobe, large bathroom and stunning views were to die for. The Andaz team even sent a small cake to our room as a birthday surprise! Breakfast at Alley on 25 had a decent selection which all tasted great. We also ordered in-room dining but strangely, we could never get the chatbot to submit our order successfully so we did it via guest services. We also visited Mr Stork which offered panoramic

title: Great experienced
desc: I stayed at both Andaz and MBS on my vacation so my review is going to be something of a comparison. While while the latter had a more spacious room, the former felt more homely and convenient. Andaz has small touches that had a large impact, like detachable showerheads (which for some reason MBS did not‚Ä¶?), and the lift at Andaz goes straight to the MRT and a path to Bugis Junction (press B3 in the lift). It was cozier and had a lot more food options than say, the Shoppes. The staff was also very helpful and friendly, and just gave off a certain more personable vibe than in MBS where the staff felt a bit more impersonal and distant.

title: Staycation
desc: Booked a suite as recommended by my colleague. Location of the hotel is very convenient. B3 is the link to bugis mrt and the mall. Love the view from our room and we can see half of flyer from the room and bathroom.

title: Anniversary Staycation
desc: My first time and definitely not gonna be the last. The staffs were all extremely welcoming and friendly. Enjoyed our stay at Andaz! The room were clean and comfortable! The view was also beautiful! Received a delicious macarons as complimentary for our wedding anniversary! Thank you for the great experience!

title: Valentine‚Äôs Day Stay.
desc: It would have made the stay more pleasant by extending the check-out time to 3 pm and also to allow the use of swimming pool. Breakfast should also be included and gum should also be allowed. It was also a little disappointing that the Stork was not open in the morning to gain access to the observation area.

title: Convenient
desc: The location of the hotel is convenient. Lots of food around the area especially for muslim. Love the unique look of the hotel room and the cleanliness is excellent! Hotel concierge is very friendly and passionate. Beverages provided is awesome. Just love this hotel, would come again!

title: A Night With Andez
desc: I loved the overall experience with the Andez. Everything was as expected. Very clean, very modern! Love the Nespresso coffee that was complimentary. Great location, excellent view. Only drawback was no bathtub.

title: Great Staycation!!!
desc: Excellent Hotel Room layout. Great Breakfast experience. Most of the staff were well training in customer service and they were very helpful. Excellent hotel location. Enjoyed the stay very much. Sure, will be back to stay again.

title: Almost perfect
desc: Bed, room and view was awesome, but the service isn‚Äôt stellar for a 5 stars hotel‚Ä¶ No room service provided until asked, dirty teaspoon and face towel in the room, upsetting breakfast buffet service. For the room though, I‚Äôd call the experience very good. The room was relaxing and well furnished

title: One of the best hotel in Singapore
desc: Location is very convenient. Great city view. Toilet is clean, however no bathtub. Only suite room have bathtubs. The staffs were friendly and it was very welcoming to be there. Besides that, they are very concern for our safety, always checking us out to ensure we are ok. Overall, it was good stay. Thank you Andaz!

title: Happy to be back!
desc: Back here after 2 years and everything is still as amazing, if not better! We got a corner room on the 33rd floor this time - clean space, really comfy bed with awesome views. You can also conveniently request for any items/book facilities by scanning the QR code in the room. Shoutout to Dayah who was very helpful during our check in and gave us an hour late checkout, and the guy (sorry, didn't get his name) at the L2 lobby on 12 Feb for being the friendliest! Can't wait to be back again :)

title: Cosy hotel rooms in Andaz Bay view room and Andaz studio suites
desc: Enjoy the unique interiors of the design of the rooms, different from other hotels. feels very homely and cosy , good space especially Andaz studio suites, added advantage with the beautiful sceneries overlooking the Harbour view and Singapore Flyer.

title: Great restaurant service and food
desc: We walked in for dinner on a Saturday evening and we were served well generally by the staff there. Joey especially was very attentive and attended to us promptly and efficiently. It was a very pleasant and warm experience. The restaurant was cozy and is ideal for a nice time with friends or family. Loved the drink of the month too. A great place to chill and will come back with friends.

title: Great location and spacious room
desc: Really happy to get a Klook deal for a 2N stay with $100 food credits. Check-in was very smooth and express check-out meant just dropping off the keycards. Hotel is linked to Duo / Bugis Junction and surrounds and the MRT, so very convenient. Room was clean and spacious, well designed spaces for everything and very quiet. Suggest adding a non-slip mat for the shower as it can get slippery when soapy. Good range of food for breakfast. Check out 665¬∞F or Mr Stock for the great view while dining or just walk round the Public Observation Deck. Love that there is complimentary beverage and local snacks in the Sun Room! Well done Andaz!

title: Not the best
desc: Mediocre food and coffee, inflexibility for check in and check out, nothing prepared even though stated it was for a birthday celebration. Rooms were clean and spacious. At most a 4star hotel, not 5. Hope they can improve. Location was convenient and fantastic

title: Wheelchair room on level 27
desc: I booked 36 hours at Andaz. Got the room on level 27 with accessible toilet. Pros : Good value with hi tea and breakfast included. Food was tasty but Hi tea portion a little too small for me, the big eater. Room was ready when I did online check in. Fantastic location of hotel with many places nearby. Unique slippers. Requests were all fulfilled. Good services provided by staff from different departments of hotel. Cons: No PILS and potato chips as in the last year's other guest reviews. Bathroom floor remained wet throughout stay once it has been used for shower. Very small wash basin. 2 chairs are in room instead of sofa, I presume to cater space for the wheelchair. A king-size bed only though I prefer 2 twin beds combined to form an extra long king size for my father who has

title: Spacious room
desc: I like the room's design, although my friend said why paid so much just for a sleep, but I find is worth for the price. I spend a lot of times in the room and I really enjoy, especially the speaker could connect to my handphone, I used it when I have a shower, haha. But when I called few times to the reception, no body picked up the calls.

title: Overall an enjoyable stay
desc: Other than the several answered calls to guest service, the staffs were great, helpful and friendly. Hotel is spacious and clean, breakfast is lovely, and the pool wasn‚Äôt crowded as they have booking for time slots. Just one thing though, it would be perfect if there were normal hotel slippers instead of the blue/white flip flops.

title: Smelly room
desc: Room has a weird smell when entered, room is small and layout is weird. No complimentary carpark. The customer service staff was not able to advise on early check in and a staff even hanged up on my call abruptly.

title: Short Getaway
desc: Excellent & efficient service provided by all staff. Rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. Love its decor & ambience in the room & around the hotel. It was a great getaway. Would love to go back there soon. Would be perfect if there's complimentary parking at the hotel. Parking charges at Duo Tower was very expensive. Afterall, the whole experience was still great.

title: Stayca at Andaz Singapore
desc: Andaz Singapore, I had such a great stay. The day of my check in, I was served by Dayah, she giving us a very excellent customer service, friendly, always smile we felt warm welcome. The room was spacious, the bed very comfortable to sleep. And the view I love it so much, small so called 'living room', the toiletries smell good, there is toilet with spray so don't worry. The shower no issues every thing went well. The room design was nice. I love it. Swimming, I had great time at the pool, the pool staff was friendly too. Went around 6-7pm slot. Breakfast, the food was good, nothing to complain about. Staff very friendly. Service very fast. It so convenient, nearest mrt is Bugis, there is near to Bugis Junction, bugis street. For those Muslim traveller, there are a lot of

title: Nice room and centrally located.
desc: Great nice accomodation with good food. Service was good & staff are all polite. Very good location just at bugis downtown line however entrance signage might be alil confusing for some. Looking forward to a new promotion for our next staycation.

title: Nice cosy hotel, friendly staff
desc: Overall the stay was fantastic, room was great, staff were friendly and helpful. Food was great, stunning view at Mr Stork, and the guest room. Breakfast venue a little packed, but we managed to slot in our preferred time for breakfast.

title: Breath taking stay.
desc: I was here last year for my birthday with my wife, we had lunch at 665 Degrees Fahrenheit restaurant for lunch and the view from there was phenomenal. So we told ourselves that we definitely need to stay at the hotel room. A year later we came back to stay at the hotel room and it was amazing, from the services of the staff, the view, and also the swimming pool. It was worth staying here but 1 night is definitely not enough. Amazing hotel. I would like to shoutout to the staffs that made my stay even wonderful. I will go in order of the staff that we came across from the start. Thank you to the chinese lady staff that held the door for us knowing we had a luggage and a baby stroller. I didnt get her name, she was a very nice lady wearing the blue dress and a speactacles.

title: 3rd stay for daughter's birthday
desc: 3rd stay, for my daughter's 2nd birthday! The room type this time is studio suite. The check-in on the day was not very smooth. I received the email and arrived early to check in, because I asked to check in in advance to make some birthday decorations! But I waited in the hotel lobby for almost two hours, and the room was not ready! I went to the front desk to ask, they saw my sleeping daughter in my arms, and they immediately arranged a rest room for me to wait! Said that my room was ready to call me, but I waited in the room for almost forty-five minutes! It's three o'clock and still no call! I went directly to the front desk to ask, only to be told that the room was ready, but I did not receive a notification! It took me almost three hours to wait, and the lunch I

title: Recent stay
desc: Overall the stay was good. Room was clean and everything was working well in the room. Except for waiting time (15 mins) for lift during check out time. The best thing about Andaz is the location is super convenient!

title: Excellent service from Andaz
desc: I can only say everything was excellent. From the services, the room, the location to the food. Everything was perfect. Love the night view from my room too. Thank you Andaz. Will definitely stay again. Highly recommended.

title: Recommended choice
desc: Convenient location. Easy access to bugis and mall. Nice environment in hotel. Friendly and polite staff. Easy to make adjustment due to unforseen circumstances on check-in. Rooms are spacious and clean.

title: Amazing staycation
desc: We had 3D2N staycation at Andaz and it was amazing. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. View from the room is great and the breakfast/dinner at Alley on 25 is very tasty also. Definitely will come back again.

title: Awesome hotel
desc: The hotel was beautiful and well maintained. Everything in the room was working well. It is also child friendly and located conveniently near restaurants. Food was really delicious and in-room ordering was fuss-free. Customer service was also 5 star! My family and I really enjoyed the stay there.

title: Great for staycation
desc: Planned a solo staycation and have to say the service is fast and great. You can do online check in the day before, and they will email you once the room is ready so you can arrive and check in earlier as long as you receive the Room Ready email. Hotel room is clean and room service is fast too. Love that you can arrange room service by scanning a QR code label on the hotel phone so you can text the robot chat Andy and order in-room dining/room service without calling them. Great for introverts or anyone that doesn‚Äôt like to call. Check out is easy too. Just have to drop the room key in at their express check out box. Didnt spend much time queuing for check-in/check-out. Only issue was the smart tv doesn‚Äôt have netflix/youtube function. (Or maybe i just couldn‚Äôt find it) but

title: Happy Stay
desc: We had a lovely stay at Andaz! The room is great ( we had connecting rooms) and my girl loves it! The pool access is limited to a number of pax and I appreciate it due to the pandemic situation.. The breakfast served was really good! Most staff is friendly and helpful except for one to two who seems to be students who probably need to be more knowledge trained :) Otherwise, its a great stay and definitely hope to go back soon.

title: Friendly staff, excellent service and facilities!
desc: I‚Äôd love to recommend this hotel to my friends and family. Had a really good experience in the hotel, the staff and so warm and friendly, the breakfast is amazingly good, I like the room facility, free beverage is provided. Will def visit again in the near future.

title: Wonderful CNY Staycation!
desc: Booked 2 rooms for staycation w parents on CNY.We expected a long queue due to festive season but when arrive the queue was manageable.We had a wonderful check-in experience with Jaypee.He offered both rooms to be upgraded and arrange them on the same floor side by side which was fantastic! And we really appreciate it! View was beautiful and the room was clean,spacious and aesthetically üëçüèº We would love to comeback for next Staycay!

title: Best hotel staycay!
desc: Celebrate birthday. Cake provided was delicious. 2nd time booking at andaz. Everything was great including breakfast and room. Service wise a bit of hiccups but nothing too major. Would definitely go back again

title: Disappointed and disillusioned expectations of hotel popularity
desc: 1) Check-in was uninviting due to no welcome greetings 2) Drinks at Concierge were served late 3) No instruction to transit to another lift to hotel rooms Overall, I would not recommend to anyone nor myself to revisit Andaz Singapore as I would to Fairmont

title: Kudos to the staff team of Andaz
desc: This was a solo staycation. The check in process was smooth. Throughout the whole stay, I felt very welcomed from the doorman to the reception and even to the staff who made my room. It was an amazing stay throughout

title: Great stay
desc: Got married here last year and had a fantastic stay. Decided to come back for our wedding anniversary. Rooms were big and clean. Breakfast was still good. Special mention to Scott from the pool area. He was very friendly and initiated to take photos for us without us asking.

title: Staycaytion
desc: The hotel was awesome. The staffs were awesome. The place was clean. Smell's great. Will recommend to my family members and friends. The view was great. Location wise is good where you can walk to Haji Lane to have a good place to chill with friends and Bugis Junction to go shopping.

title: Not worth it
desc: No complimentary parking. Mosquitoes at pool. Rude & impatient staff who act like they‚Äôre the guest. One of them shouted at an elderly couple for queueing at the wrong place (the signages provided were to tiny to be seen). Rooms were nice and clean. But ultimately, customer service were so bad that it isnt worth our stay there.

title: Overall good package
desc: The view, room, food and customer service was marvelous. Recommended üëçüèª the fact that the hotel was accessible to walk from the bugis mrt straight was amazing add on. And the restaurants in the hotel itself had good food,view and ambience. Not only that, the quick check in process was a great plus! Definitely will try another room type and revisit the hotel and restaurant with my family next round!

title: Can be improved
desc: Hotel service is lacking, staff needs to be more service oriented. The hotel itself was beautiful and quiet and rooms spacious. It is located at an MRT station with good access to food and amenities. The bar service needs improvement.

title: Outstanding Property
desc: Andaz is easily one of the most lavish hotels. Andaz feels very new, modern and grand, living up to the Hyatt standards. Moreover, the pool and Mr Stork bar was fantastic. There was a staff going up to Mr Stork bar who passed my 4 year old daughter a soft toy in the lift and made her stay fabulous.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Had a nice time at the executive lounge. The service by Ms Hazel was fantastic and upon our request recommended very nice drinks for our night. Will visit again, Thanks Hazel for your hospitality!!!!!

title: Andaz recommended
desc: Room was clean and spacious. Good city view. Staff very courteous and pleasant. They will always greet guests anywhere and everywhere. Checking in and out was prompt. Very convenient location. Near arab st and bugis. Will definitely consider returning.

title: Andaz was and is Amazing
desc: We chose this place as friends had many good things to say about it. We didn‚Äôt go with any expectations as we thought it‚Äôd be as comfortable as any other hotels, which it was, but we were blown away by the beauty of the place. Everything was so cool. You have to stay there to experience it. Highly recommended!

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: All was very good except a little enclosed wood smell in da room. Booked the room for a little getaway with the kids and the room given was of an acceptable size. Enough for the kids to run around. Bathroom has no bathtub due to the nature of the hotel type but its fine, vast space to walk around and clean too.

title: Very Good Staycation Experience
desc: We had a good staycation at Andaz. The 9am to 9pm the next day package was very good. We had enough time to visit the sites in the city -did long walks, Malay heritage museum, shopping and inyeresting food outlets near by - Arab St on one side and Liang Seah Street on the other side. Wonderful location. Service staff were good and attentive. Everything was very good, except maybe the Kitchen Party at Alley on 25 needs to up their food menu.

title: Good location and excellent room. Spacious and pretty.
desc: Nice getaway. Good location close to bugis area. Plenty of food options. Spacious room and pretty roof top view. Enjoyed my stay. Had an early check in as well. However with Covid measures, accessibility to the hotel is rather troublesome.

title: Wonderful stay!
desc: I had the most perfect stay at ANDAZ throughout my 3 days 2 nights. The process of early check in was done very smoothly and ANDAZ even accommodate to our late check out. View in our room is amazing! 10/10 for cleanliness of the hotel, our bathroom and our room. Love the scenic view of the pool. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay!

title: Incredible getaway and excellent hospitality
desc: Stayed one night for a birthday occasion. It was on a Sunday, so the queue for check in was short. The room is spacious and clean with Bay view. The pool is nice although it's small but not crowded. Had dinner at Mr. Stork, the view is amazing with nice chilling vibe. The food is decent. Overall, I did enjoy my stay here and I would like to extend my appreciation to Mr Adrian and Ms Dayah from front desk for an amazing and welcoming hospitality! Both have made my stay extra enjoyable and memorable!

title: Beautiful with amazing service
desc: Excellent hotel with excellent view, extremely clean & comfortable, before our arrival we received a called from Mr. Greg, he apologized for not being able to Welcome us by himself, he makes our stay more interesting with his advices & tips about the supermarket ,shops and restaurants are within walking distance. Would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone who want a honeymoon vacation or visiting Singapore ! It's a true sample of excellent hospitality. Thank you Amy for going just that little step extra for us ü•∞

title: Disappointing service
desc: We stayed at Andaz for one night under the 36 hours package. The stay was pleasant and enjoyable. My experience outside of the stay wasn‚Äôt. Check in took a while, but the front desk staff was friendly and welcoming. The room was well furnished and spacious. It‚Äôs a relatively new hotel so the amenities still look new and clean. No bathtub, but there‚Äôs a separate shower space, toilet (with its own sink) and makeup and sink area. Our room was on 37th floor (highest for rooms), so it had a good view. Breakfast was decent. Local options were better than western ones. The pool was small, but the gym was larger than expected and had a variety of equipment. But you‚Äôll need to bring your own water. Now for the pre and post stay experience. Firstly, apart from my own booking, I

title: Good location
desc: Location is very convenient. Accessible via Bugis downtown line and fully sheltered. Proximity to Bugis Junction, Bugis Village, Albert Food Centre and also walking distance to Raffles City. Recommended.

title: Hotel review
desc: The best service so far I had. Everything went smoothly. Check in was so efficient,I never expect the complimentary cake for birthday was kind of big‚Ä¶ good job Andaz.during breakfast there wasn‚Äôt much of a hussle, from start to end of our staycation was marvellous‚Ä¶

title: Staycation with Friends
desc: if you are staying with your friends or family. They do not have connecting rooms therefore they arrange for us whereby the room is next to each other. This hotel is very accessible from the Downtown Line Bugis Station. As they have an entrance/exit at B3.

title: Best Stay Ever
desc: Stunning view, Delicious breakfast and dinner and absolutely lovely environment. 10/10 Would come again for a staycation, I would've never remembered how beautiful Singapore's Night Skyline if not for Andaz. Everything was also prepared very well for my husband's birthday surprise.

title: UNIQUE EXPERIENCED‚ù§Ô∏è
desc: No Regret! The Best hotel stayed that i ever had!Super Clean n warm welcome by the staffs on duty too.Skies view‚ù§Ô∏èEspecially on the higher level.Hope to have a chance to stay again at Andaz hotel!Love it to the Max!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you üåπ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Amazing Breakfast and Room
desc: Staycation happened in Dec 2020. Check-in was a breeze as the staff called 2 days before to inform that we get to check-in early and all other bookings (breakfast & pool) could be done online a week before too. We got the Twin Bay Deluxe View Room with additional bed & breakfast during their sale at $300++ which was a steal. Room gets a little tight with the additional bed just in front of the TV nevertheless, it is still comfortable and if bathtub (only in suites) was available in deluxe rooms, that would had been perfect! Toiletries, Mini Bar and Breakfast was inclusive with our booking. Breakfast is extensive and definitely one of the best hotel breakfast out there! Staff are friendly and not rigid as we got the pool slot timing wrong but they were nice to make some last

title: Great start to 2022
desc: We checked into the Andaz over the New Years Day weekend and had a wonderful time. The staff at the check-in counter offered to upgrade us to a room with a better view and late check out - which was much appreciated! Breakfast was nice and had an interesting selection of local/international dishes. Thanks to the team for a lovely stay x

title: Disorganise and confusing hotel access
desc: Complicate to access the hotel. Guest has to find level 2 lift to get to level 25 hotel lobby. After check in , guest has to use another guest lift to room. It is confusing and disorganise. Please experience yourself and take note of my note. One good thing is the city view is beautiful

title: Spacious and comfortable room
desc: Room was spacious and comfortable, all amenities were clean and in good condition. Service was especially good :) They ran out of creamer and got me a small cup of milk even at midnight. Thanks for the service!

title: Wonderful & Clean stay
desc: Excellent clean room with many amenities as well as great facilities. Food was splendid and there are an array of options with restaurants in the hotel and also below the hotel. Convenient location to the rest of Singapore with having an underpass directly to Bugis Station and to Bugis Junction.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: We booked our staycation at Andaz hotel to celebrate my wife‚Äôs birthday. We booked a Residence Suite(3 guest) and a Bay View Deluxe twin(2 guest) for 2 nights. On the day of check in(15th Jan about 12pm) our first impression of the hotel was shattered by Katherine, the front desk staff. While we were in the queue we observed her welcoming another couple warmly and wishing them to enjoy their stay. However it was a different treatment for us. We were waved to approach the front desk and given a cold shoulder. She kept looking at her laptop, no greetings, no hello, no introducing herself. I had to ask for her name. Perhaps she was trained to give warm reception to only certain category of guests. Only a demand for my identification card. Information about the Sunroom and that our

title: Awesome stay with great view
desc: Awesome stay among all my other staycation. Room is so nice and cozy till I cancel my dinner plan and pack food back to room for 1st night. And order room service for 2nd night. Just didn‚Äôt want to leave the room. Definitely will come back again!! Highly recommended

title: Staycation at Andaz Singapore
desc: Wonderful hotel near Haji Lane and center of Singapore. There is a MRT station nearby. Room is clean and well furnished. Staff are friendly and helpful especially at check in. Complimentary breakfast was good. Enjoyed our stay.

title: Clean, well-appointed Rooms
desc: Had a City View King room which was well-appointed, quiet (asked for a room away from the lifts), and very cosy. Pillows are too soft for my liking but this was easily rectified by a call to Guest Services for their pillow menu. Andaz‚Äôs signature scent is delightful - their body lotion a treat! Minibar is well-stocked and towels fluffy with a great rain shower. Breakfast offerings are plentiful and lovely.

title: Expect the Unexpected
desc: Great Hotel, no doubt. Although the whole world are fighting with the Covid-19 Pandemic, there should not be any short change on Basic Customers Services. Front desk staff need more training on Customer Service Care, not just lips services and letter writing skill.

title: Great View and Excellent Location
desc: Andaz was well-kept and staff were very friendly. Breakfast at Alley on 25 was fantastic with a good selection of food choices and very attentive staff (special kudos to Jonas/Danish on this). The pool staff was also very friendly, attentive and even went the extra mile to help my friends and I take a photo when he saw us trying to take wefies (I didn't get his name but he was on duty on 12 Jan 2022, between 2.30pm to 3.30pm). Thank you Andaz for the wonderful experience. Would definitely visit again!

title: My staycation at Andaz
desc: Staff are courteous and friendly, clean and comfortable room with full amenities. Full hotel facilites to cater to everyone's need. Staying in the room especially suites and your never want to leave the room. Value for money. Will certainly recommend friends to stay at this hotel.

title: Calming and Nice Hotel to Visit
desc: While some may complain the entrance level at 26th floor, I kind of like how secluded the area was. I love the colour used for the hotel. It's calming and soothing to look at! It is a good hotel to stay if you are looking for one to relax in!

title: 3D2N Staycation
desc: It was a pleasant staycation, Staffs in Andaz SG is friendly and approachable, attended to our needs when needed. Check-in was a smooth process, love the dining experience too. Would definitely go back again!

title: Great Centrally Located Contemporary Hotel with Views & Rooftop Pool
desc: Traveling has been difficult these days but I throughly enjoyed my stay at the Andaz in Singapore. The gentlemen at the front desk in the morning was friendly, professional and helpful after I arrived on a long VTL flight from SFO. It took a few hours for my arrival test to come through but the hotel helped make it comfortable until my negative result came through and I could leave the room. The suite we stayed in had great views of the city, the gardens and the waterfront. The rooftop pool was a nice touch with lounge chairs. Bathroom amenities were nice and there was a large tub which had views. Room service was quick, friendly and there was a wide selection of food and beverages. The hotel's elevator leads conveniently underground to the metro which was very convenient

title: Andaz Stay
desc: Front desk service wasnt really good. The floor i was given was the same as VTL travellers.. I recommend segregation of different floor for VTL travellers. I asked to book for Mr Stork, they said to go to the Sunroom louge to book it, I went to Sunroom lounge they told me to go to reception to book it. I feel that there's a lack of communication. I wanted to book for pool, the reception told me i can book from my room via a QR code, and i cant find anything till i dial 0 only to realize i can book via the link they sent to my email. Room view was good, with amenities and complimentary minibar. Nespresso machine cannot dispense espresso shot.. Dinner at Mr Stork was fantastic. Thank you Carlo for attending to us and being so attentive and patient. Breakfast at Alley was great

title: Crazy staycay
desc: Booked a room to celebrate our anniversary and let me tell you , it was way above expectation. The view was crazy , the room was super nice, the staff were super nice . The experience was overall super satisfying definitely would recommend!

title: 2d1n staycation
desc: Highly recommended due to the good location. we didn't get to enjoy the facilities much as our package does not allow us to enjoy the gym and pool facilities. would be great if it's being thrown into part of the package as well. however check in was smooth and swift, staff were generally friendly and helpful.

title: The best hotel
desc: I'm very satisfied with the service at Andaz. I get a free upgrade for my room. All staffs were very friendly and helpful. As this is my first time staying here, i get a small welcome gift which i think was a lovely gesture.. the room was fantastic. Big, spacious and very clean. I especially loved the bathroom. Will definitely come again.

title: Saying good bye to andaz team
desc: We had stayed 01 day only and the team andaz has made our stay memorable specally udit & ompal jee thanks again hoping we are coming back soon. The best team ever experience in service. Good Luck to you all Stay Safeüòä

title: Wonderful stay at Andaz for our anniversary and wife birthday.
desc: One of our best staycation in Singapore. Must try to dine at Alley 25, with complementary mimosa drink and small birthday cake for our celebration. Staff service very good too. Food wise some hits and miss but overall, still one of the best experience we have.

title: room dusty and breakfast bad
desc: room was dusty, ask room attendant to clean, but no action. breakfast selection limited and poor. bacon hard as rock. only thing is front desk staff service is good and reactive. booking for breakfast seat was easy.

title: Not happy with the view and food
desc: Service was nice. Room was nice and the cleanliness was good but disappointed with the view i had and food was quite tasteless. There was no complimentary parking which is a minus point of staying at Andaz. Overall not bad if just for staying but will not come again if its for a special occasion which i booked for a birthday.

title: Clean & pretty common areas
desc: Second time here because we were impressed on our first stay here! A short getaway before the year starts and didn‚Äôt expect the hotel to be packed. An hour delay on the check in as the room wasn‚Äôt ready in time but Andaz allowed us to extend 1 more hour for check out. Service is good & love the interiors of the common area. Some wear & tear can be seen in the room for example stained tiles. But for someone who is picky on the cleanliness & hygiene Andaz still pass!

title: Amazing stay amazing staff
desc: Great experience with lovely staff that tries to cater to most of our needs. Do use their QR code to ask for any room services, super convenient. Centralized location with many food places and haji lane just right around the corners.

title: Customer service needs to be improved
desc: Slow service at reception..hard to reach customer service before stay for enquiries..not flexible in giving late check out or check in..dining choices limited..didnt experience 5 star customer service..except one taiwanese boy called Scott who displayed great customer support and going the extra mile for customers

title: Pleasant Staycation
desc: The check in process was quick and fuss free. The room had an excellent view, was clean and comfortable. The breakfast was tasty and choices were satisfactory. The location is convenient with the MRT station, museums,restaurants and shopping areas nearby. Enjoyed a lovely complimentory drink after coming back from shopping in the Sun Lounge

title: Room automation defaults not necessarily a good thing!
desc: Bed and pillows not as comfy as expected of a great hotel. And previous settings room temperature, blinds and lighting keep going back to default when one leaves room and returns. Waste of time resetting again...

title: Superb location, awesome bright spacious room
desc: Checking in was a breeze. The room was superb, with high quality bed and finishings and a wonderful view. Staff and service was exceptionally good. Free refreshments were provided in a beautiful waiting lounge while waiting for check in completion

title: Delightful!
desc: I was first introduced to Andaz - Mr Stork by my friends. Been heading to the bars for some good drinks. Little did I know that the stay experience would be so delightful. Service was splendid. Staff were attentive. It will definitely not be our last stay w Andaz. The breakfast was sumptuous. Bed was comfortable and we love how smart the rooms were. Our family will be back again!

title: Good room and service
desc: Stayed at the Andaz's Suite King room for a couple of nights. Check-in took a while. 20 minute wait but drinks were served. Second stay at this property. The room didn't disappoint. Very comfortable and spacious. The hotel is about 4 years old. It still feels very new. Blinds and curtains are automated. Bathroom has heated mirrors - nice touch. Twin sinks. Two toilets. Very comfortable bed. The light switches took a while to get used to, as did the blinds controls. Breakfast service was speedy. You can select from western or Asian menu. Good balance of sinful and healthy foods. I enjoyed the breakfast. Had dinner on both nights at Alley on 25. The food is reasonably priced. There's a Pizza and Pilsner night on Tuesdays with free flow of both for $39++. The 4 cheese pizza is

title: AMAZING! MUST STAY!
desc: Wonderful kind staff! Truly amazing customer service! Anything we needed, they immedietly provided with a smile! Also room is super up to date and modern, really one of the highest quality rooms we've seen here in Singapore! Location is also perfect, metro station is in the same building that will take you anywhere and Arab street and Bugis is minutes away walking. Truly wonderful and will be back!!

title: Excellent service and wonderful hotel stay
desc: Easily accessible via sheltered underpass at Bugis MRT. Efficient check-in under 5 minutes and rooms were prepared ahead of our scheduled check-in timing. Our family-friendly, connected deluxe bay view rooms boasted picturesque views of the city skyline, with glimpses of notable tourist attractions such as the Singapore Flyer and Marina Barrage. Our cosy modern-looking rooms were well-furnished with toilet amenities and well-maintained with a high level of cleanliness. Pleasantly surprised that drinks and snacks from the mini bar were complimentary, including drinks at the Sunroom located on level 25 (redeemable after 12 noon). Casting onto the TV was user-friendly and the TV also had a rotatable hinge for convenient pivoting, which means you can enjoy your favourite shows on

title: Great view from Junior suite
desc: Hotel is well situated and connected to the MRT underground . Only down side is that parking is not complimentary . Front desk area is tad congested but staff make up for it- they are very helpful , show intimate and professional . Our basic level suite was very spacious and boasted a beautiful view . Connectivity was good and playing stuff from Devices onto TV was easy ( for a Luddite like me ). Loved that drinks from mini bar were non chargeable and that dining credits were given - we throughly enjoyed room Service and the comforts of our room. Jonas from food and beverage / room service was very helpful . Room was spacious and everything was in perfect working order . However it did look visually a bit worn ( color of wood and fact that wordings on light switches had faded

title: Suite was large and comfortable
desc: Conveniently located above Bugis MRT station, with many localised eateries and shopping within 5 minutes of walk. Hope that their business lounge facilities could be revitalised like how it was before covid.

title: Andaz Staycation
desc: Clean hotel, great view from rooftop bar, easy location to get to. Too many F&B outlet closed for renovation leaving few choices for dining. Overall service from front desk is a forgettable experience.

title: Great Stay at Andaz.
desc: The service provided at Andaz is a cut above the rest. Personable and impeccable. The hotel interior & rooms are beautifully designed. Modern and yet cosy. I tried the pool and hotel breakfast, both good!

title: Well organized hotel room. Thank you
desc: The service is great! Staffs are nice. Reception staffs and MR Stork staffs are accommodating. Room is pretty and clean. Toilet amenities are full, eg razor and comb are there, we do not have to call house keeper, the hair dryer is powerful can dry your thick long hair in a minute, they even have complimentary mini bar items for us its so sweet. Wine opener is also in the drawer. üëçüèª

title: Spectacular stay and a spectacular view and awesome central location
desc: Guys I have to tell you about the breakfast buffet! The service at the breakfast area was top notch as the Waiters and Waitresses wasted no time in providing our food and scribbled our orders swiftly. We enjoyed our breakfast to the fullest. Even in room dinner was prepared rapidly and we had our stomach filled :) honestly I enjoy our staycay so much because of the FOOD and the promptness in delivering fresh food to us! Fruits was fresh and sweet and juicy too! I enjoyed every juice. Haha. Also view wise was good except a small construction work going on in front of Andaz hotel but I still enjoyed the infinity pool!

title: Staycation
desc: Warm welcome by the receptionist, quick check in process, complimentary mini bar snacks in room. Also, emjoyed the free tea/ coffee at sun room after 12nn. Room was clean n tidy. Quite spacious. We used up the $100 dining credit for room services and enjoyed the food. Its a pity the late checkout only allowed up to 1pm consistently. Same as previous stay.

title: Awesome staycation
desc: Room was awesome and clean. staff was exceptional . Making us felt very welcome. Check in was Swift. Breakfast was great! Very yummy. High tea food was a little Lower than expectation. Swimming pool was great. And not packed as they limit the number of guest. Which is good

title: Worthwhile staycation using singapore rediscover vouchers
desc: I enjoyed my stay from the booking processes. I wish to thank Priscilla Tan for being prompt and helpful in my requests online. The room was comfortable. I enjoyed the layout of the bathroom. Also found the casting to TV very useful. My room service order was excellent.

title: Great location, wonderful view
desc: The room was spacious. The hotel is connected via B3 to MRT lines( green n blue ) as well as Bugis Junction. Even though it rained we could move around easily.Staffs were all friendly . Highly recommended

title: Amazing experience
desc: feels magical in here. the interior design, amenities and service are all impressive. unfortunately did not experience the fitness centre and pool during to covid restrictions. we skipped having meals in the compound also because it's such an accessible location with shopping centres and restaurants all around

title: Awesome family staycation with great view, food and location
desc: This is the first time with Andaz and we had the residence suite King for 3 nights for our family of 4 (2 adults and 2 kids) for the New year celebration. During our first day, we went to Mr Stork as recommended and we had great food and view. Carlo was attending to us and he has been awesome to ensure that my family is looked after. He has also introduced us to Andaz Pils and it was great. We also had breakfast and the buffet came with local delights such as toast/egg, porridge, laksa and nasi lemak. The pool was suited at the 25th floor next to the hotel restaurant, which offers great view of the surrounding. Andaz location is very well suited for family as in B3, we are able to connect to Bugis Junction, where there are plenty of restaurants and walk about. My family truly

title: Beautiful room view
desc: So I booked the room using the SRV and previously had stayed there before and was super impressed with the amenities. this time round I just booked room only, since it was just a one night staycay, didn't opt for breakfast or facilities usage since I knew I won't be using them. from checkin to checkout the experience was wonderful. also love that it's connected at the basement from MRT, but i do feel the direction to the hotel could be clearer from the MRT signage. as

title: Fantastic room with great view and amenities
desc: Luxurious room with fantastic cityscape. Plush bedding and pillows. Beautiful and trendy dining/bar options resulted in me spending a lot of my time at the hotel! Few minor glitches that were promptly and professional resolved by helpful staff. Love the gym. Pool was quiet, however, without music, and for some reason, alcohol can't be served there.

title: Memorable Staycation with Andaz
desc: Had a very last minute booking for pool and gym facilities during our stay at Andaz on 29&30 DEC 2021, I was really impressed by one of the staff (malay guy with a nice watch) sorry didn‚Äôt manage to get his name but he is in charge of the pool and gym section he managed to accommodate our request and get to experience the facilities provided at the hotel making it a memorable experience ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëçüèª Thumbs up to the excellent service he provides. üòî One thing that really disappoints me is during our stay there is no birthday surprise cake for my birthday other than that overall the hotel room design, service, breakfast, facilities and cleanliness overall is the most favorite hotel I had been to so far.

title: Amazing stay at Andaz
desc: Thank you Andaz staff for accommodating my family and all our requests especially during this very hectic festive season. To Kenzie at pool deck area, despite having almost fully booked in all pool slots, he was able to help us get a timing and followed through when some guests cancelled their booking. Keep up the good work! To Jonas, Norrie, and Rosanna from Room Service and Bar Square. As always, wonderful experience and very up-close and personal. Always looking after us, and asking if everything is ok, and making sure my family is well-attended to and having a good time. They truly made our stay memorable and comfortable. Last but not the least, to Adrian in FO for making this stay possible, thank you so much for helping us throughout this stay, ensuring that everything

title: Excellent new Chinese restaurant
desc: Lunch at Andaz's soon to open 5 on 25 Chinese restaurant was fantastic. We enjoyed the rich flavors of all the dishes we tried, including the prawns, beef and chicken. The desserts were unbelievably delicious, especially the ginger flavored one. Views of the city were breath taking and service impeccable. So far, our favorite restaurant in Singapore. Highly recommend.

title: enjoyed my stay with family
desc: This is my 2nd year we are returning back to Andaz. Such a great ambience, room, food and service! Perhaps, we will make it a yearly affair. My wife enjoyed the cleanliness of the room, my daughter enjoyed the great view of the city, while i truly enjoyed the service and food.

title: Room with Excellent Views
desc: Stayed here for the second time after booking through Klook. Got the Studio Suite again as I enjoyed it on my last stay. The view remains unbeatable with the views of Padang and Marina Bay even. The Check-In process before the stay is a little more haphazard this time round: some requests are deemed not possible but later possible during the physical checking in : such as in-room breakfast or room preference. After more than 2 years in operation, the hotel seemed to age alright. The television screens can do casting from the phones and tablets without any issues. The kettle works fine and the showers are alright. The hotel is located at Bugis with easy access to the MRT Station. There is parking available at the building but it is very expensive on weekdays. Breakfast was

title: Great food, good service and stylish rooms
desc: As the title says, the food at Alley on 25 was superb. Definitely enjoyed their BBQ Pork Ribs and Lobster Mac & Cheese. Rooms are slightly different for each stay, making the surprise all the more worth it. Has one of the better swimming pools in Singapore with a great view. Will definitely be going back again.

title: Great Experience at Andaz
desc: Overall a great experience staying at Andaz with the friendliness of the staffs, good breakfast choices, nice view good water pressure (I'm very particular on this) and clean room/amenities. If there's a small feedback, it would be the comfort of the bed and pillow which I tend to think Hilton probably beat Andaz on that part. But it's entirely a personal opinion but other than that, it's a pleasant experience and we felt welcomed during the stay.

title: Very memorable stay at Andaz
desc: The staff were very polite and friendly. Check-in and check-out were a breeze and we were pleased and grateful to be granted early check-in and late check-out despite our stay happening on festive period. The food at Alley on 25 and the drinks at Mr Stork were also superb. And the night sky view at Mr Stork was very breathtaking. Room was very clean and well furnished and there were also complimentary refreshments. However, snacks at their guest lounge can definitely do a lot better. Overall I really enjoyed my stay here and will most definitely go back to Andaz again for another staycay!

title: Great service from staff
desc: Love everything about our 2days staycation here. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Our check-in was assisted by Ms Gab. She was super helpful in suggesting which restaurants to have our dinner and asked us to try the pool. Ms Kavi, an immaculate staff assisted us during our breakfast. Our room was on 30th level - great view. Room was spacious and clean. Room service was fantastic, took less than half hour. Overall food was great. The pool on the 25th floor had a breathtaking view too, especially during sunset. If only parking in hotel was free, this would be the ‚Äòicing on the cake‚Äô for our staycation here. Definitely will come back for next stay.

title: Pillows need to be upgraded.
desc: I realised the pillows is not comfortable to sleep too thin. Shower room need to be upgraded. Water flood during shower. No face tower in the room. Heater is faulty sometime no hot water. Toilet Bow water keep dripping non stop.

title: Could be better
desc: Staycation on 23-24 Dec. The room is quite spacious, so as the bathroom. The pool is very small, but offer very good view. The fitness center has very limited equipment, so, quite disappointed. Celebrating my friend's bday, and was given 2 macarons and a birthday card. Had lunch at Alley on 25 and it was a wrong decision. The set lunch portion was small. Taste was just average. The waiting time is terrible. Especially for desserts, which were pre-prepared, yet, waited like 20 mins to get it. Even the bill need 10 mins wait. So, took more than 1.5 hrs for the simple set lunch. I cannot imagine how long is the wait should we order ala carte which need longer time to prepare. My recommendation, don't have you lunch/dinner there. Go Bugis area for lunch instead. So, overall, the

title: Two extreme level of service - the good and the bad
desc: 2 Extreme level of service - extremely good and extremely bad experience First of all, i must commend on your Front desk staff Joel on his superb level of service and helping us to change our 2 room booking to a Large Suite. Although it was only available for 1 day, our family thoroughly enjoy the great experience provided by him. He make sure to see us through the room changing and personally escorted us from our resting room to the suite. The suite room was very comfortable with cinema surround sound system for cinema like experience. But on the 2nd day (27th Dec 5.00pm), my children wanted to go for a swim and when we get to the swimming pool, we were turned away. The staff simply told us that since we did not book for the swimming slot, we were not allowed to enter the

title: Amazing Andaz Singapore!
desc: Stayed here from 25 to 27 December 2021. The whole experience was wonderful and made better by our host, Ismail, who made sure that our reservations and requests were seen to. Kudos to Ismail. The two King rooms that we stayed in were two of the cleanest hotel rooms that we've been to. Andaz has an amazing rooftop bar called Mr Stork at Level 39. Great place to take in the drinks and the sights.

title: Would love to stay here again!!
desc: I really enjoyed my stay here at Andaz Singapore. The room was very clean, organised and looks elegant. They even provide complimentary tea and snacks at the hotel lobby if you are waiting for your room to be ready or just waiting for someone. The hotel is also conveniently located nearby Bugis MRT, F&Bs, shopping malls, hospital and even mosque for the muslims. Hence, I am very satisfied with my stay here and would love to stay longer next time!

title: Christmas Staycation in Residence Suite Room
desc: Great location which near to two MRT lines and Bugis shopping area. The staff who did my check-in was friendly and attentive. The room slippers which provided was those rubber flip-flop slippers. It really uncomfortable. Good for wearing it to swimming session but not comfortable for bedroom used. Prefer the soft fabric disposable type. Room was cleaned and very spacious. Free mini bar but no milk capsules in the fridge when tried to make coffee. Like their electronic curtains and blinds control. Breakfast wise, hope to see more vegetarian options at Alley on 25.

title: Clean, comfortable and convenient!
desc: Very comfortable and classy looking hotel. Booked their deluxe bay view and the room was decked with technology! Curtains and blinds were easy to operate, bathroom and shower room was spacious and had plenty of room too! Many charging outlets and usb ports too! Breakfast and afternoon tea was good as well! Professional and very friendly staff are on hand to assist and welcome you, and Bugis Junction is literally down the road (opposite only). Direct underground access to Bugis MRT and there is a mosque (Masjid Sultan) nearby too! You would be hard-pressed to NOT find any food nearby given the plentiful choices in the area.

title: Staycation @ Andaz Hotel
desc: Service is good and it's clean. Hotel is quite new too. Area around hotel has many good food and cafes. Location is convenient with the Downtown line just at basement level when exiting hotel and could travel to places like Chinatown or Telok Ayer street for good food and restaurants. Would recommend to stay in this hotel.

title: Great affordable hotel in the city
desc: Great service and awesome hotel view. Room layout is splendid, with a make up room, great for those who want space to doll up. Location is also near the MRT, very accessible to city hall and orchard room to do shopping.

title: Great customer service and hotel breakfast
desc: We enjoyed our stay because of the great customer service that some of the staff provided. We were impressed by the service provided by hotel staff Scott, who made my son feel very welcomed by attending to his needs. Breakfast quality was good as well, and we really enjoyed the food. Room amenities were good too, with complimentary minibar items.

title: Staycation with family
desc: We booked Andaz to celebrate my wife birthday. We enjoyed our staycation at Andaz. The hotel location is good and is within short walking distance to get food, shopping and some sight seeing. The lap pool is nice. Andaz has a great serving crew that really makes my staycation outstanding and memorable. I hope to return soon.

title: Awesome hotel
desc: An awesome hotel with helpful and welcoming staff. The hotel is clean with a great view and the hotel staff try their best to meet our requirements as much as they can. Despite the big crowd over the school holidays, they still served us with a smile and as efficiently as possible. Thank you, Andaz!

title: Nice staycation
desc: It was generally a nice staycation. Room view is nice, and it was comfortable too. Did my own simple decoration for fianc√©e's birthday celebration. Unfortunately we were unable to use the swimming pool as no slots available.

title: A great place for staycation.
desc: Staff was friendly & courteous. Great location with a short walk to amenities such restaurants, shopping mall etc. Breakfast was good. It‚Äôs a pity unable to utilise the $100/- dining vouchers at 665 Fahrenheit. Overall, a pleasant stay!

title: Andaz
desc: Excellent service, room size, cleanliness and location! I particularly enjoyed the afternoon tea at Sunroom level 25 and the service rendered by staff was impressive. I have stayed in many hotels in the region and this is truly one of the best.

title: 3D2N with Andaz
desc: I‚Äôve always wanted to stay in Andaz ever since it opened in 2017. Check in process was orderly managed with different time slots to adhere safe distancing management. Which is not what you see in other hotels. After check in and putting our things in the hotel room. We went out to get lunch nearby. Came back to a surprise complimentary Pandan cake (which I really love Pandan cake) in celebration of my birthday that was 2 weeks ago which was very sweet of the Andaz Team. Just a few down side of the experience. 1. Bedsheet wasn‚Äôt changed found the exact same stain on the bedsheet when I check in as well as on the 2nd Day of my Stay 2. Headboard light and side lamps tends to flicker 3. TV remote wasn‚Äôt functioning well which might just be the battery Overall still

title: Perfect hotel stay
desc: One of the best hotel stay i have ever experienced. room was clean and service was on point. the online check in ensured that i skipped the queue and got my room key earlier than expected. highly recommended and will definitely re-visit again.

title: Good and relax hotel
desc: Very special program of 36 hours stay. The feeling is different and make you feel like staying 2 days. You can travel easily in Singapore without worrying of your room stay. Will consider to come back again.

title: Amazing room
desc: Excellent service from check-in right up to the chambermaid. Awesome room, very spacious and most importantly it's very clean. Love the bedroom slippers alot. Will definitely stay there with my family again.

title: Stay
desc: Hotel is situated at a very good location. Service is good and the staffs are very friendly and helpful. A great hotel especially for the family with kids. Food , shopping mails and MRT are easily accessible.

title: Best treatment and great hotel!
desc: This is the first time I am staying here and the service / treatment was great . Location was good and there were many shops nearby and very convenient . The hotel was new and the amenities and facilities were fantastic too. I will visit again!

title: Perfect staycation
desc: Andaz is located close to various amenities and marina bay area. There are offices, shopping centres, mrt all seamlessly connected to this hotel. Overall, the room was spacious and the view amazing. We will surely come back...

title: Exemplary in all areas
desc: We stayed at the highest floor (level 37) with early check-in at 12pm. The package came with free breakfast, complimentary in-room minibar (drinks and snacks), $100 F&B dining credit and unlimited free drinks and snacks at Sunroom (level 25). Awesome service with great food and beverages. The room was new and clean and the king size bed was firm and comfy. Amenities were great and it's a breeze to request for additional, if need be, by scanning a code available on the phone located besides the bed. Request can be done with just a few clicks away. View was excellent from the room, swimming pool and rooftop bar (Mr. Stork at level 39). Definitely, value for money and will revisit. Exemplary in all areas!

title: Great service
desc: The usual peak season for Staycation however despite the peak crowd, was greeted by Ms Catherine Kwek during check in. She has greeted me with a lively welcome and great services. Thumb up and professionalism! Am indeed surprise by the service of her and Andaz which far exceed my expectation. Even their room service is prompt. Bump into Catherine during evening and she even remember my name. I must say that she makes a huge difference and indeed a gem for the hotel and service industry.

title: Average overall experience
desc: Nice hotel in a good location. However, the service crews from front desk to restaurants is managed by amateur part timers which resulted in the supposed permanent staff being stressed out thus affecting their service level including being curt and. Impatient to hotel guests. Of course there are couple of them who are good but you just need 1 rotten egg to create the unpleasantness.

title: Nightmare stay in Andaz
desc: Not recommended with young children. Staffs are hostile and rude. Very terrible service and found coffee stains in room. By 1545 checked in room not ready follow by room cards unable to use. Not fast to rectify issue as well.

title: Awesome staycation
desc: Had a fantastic stay at Andaz. The room, amenities, food and staff exceed our expectations. Room's view is awesome, amneities are clean and simply love the complimentary mini bar provided. However, found the pillow on the soft and flat sides. It will be perfect if pillow menu is offered by the hotel. Booked the Cityview room which includes $100 F&B credit and breakfast. The credit is enough for a nice dinner for 2 at Alley on 25. So you don't have to step out of the hotel at all. Special shout-out to Jess at Alley on 25 for the great service and the complimentary chocolate tart. Her team is so friendly and attentive to our needs. I am really impressed by the service of all hotel staff which make you feel so welcomed. Chill out at Mr Stork is a must do for the nice panoramic

title: Suggestion for improvement
desc: The room is clean and blind & curtains are electronically controlled. Well thoughts to have USB port beside bed but suggest to have wireless phone charges equipped in room in case guest forgotten to bring along the phone charging cable.

title: Very comfortable stay
desc: Had a very good experience here. Staff were very friendly, view from the room was good, room was very clean. The pool was very good. I travelled with a young kid and it was kid friendly. I will want to choose this hotel again!

title: Didn't see a need to step out of hotel room
desc: Booked a suite for my family staycation and it was the first time I didn't step out of the hotel room at all. The view was fantastic, the TV was easily connected to our iPad and we could watch movies all day long, the kids enjoyed the long bath and the view outside and we even ordered room service for breakfast. Food was decent as well. They also gave complimentary chips on top of all the other complimentary items in the mini bar. We lived like royalty for that one day!

title: Family Staycation
desc: Hotel quite new, room and staff service commendable. Only downside is Hotel doesn't come with its own Parking lot. So expect to fork out huge amount of $$$ for parking day-overnight if you are driving.

title: Fantastic hotel stay
desc: Food was excellent. Dining credits given makes the hotel stay even more worthwhile. View was great! Room service was thru an app which is very convenient . Room condition very new. Definitely coming back here.

title: Exceptional Customer Service & Enjoyable Stay
desc: Highly recommended for those who want to celebrate their birthday, Andaz surely will make you feel special. Was really surprised that they sent up a cake for us. The check-in and check-out procedures were both simple and speedy. The room, amenities, food and staff exceed expectations. We will surely recommend our friends and family about Andaz Singapore.

title: Very enjoyable and relax stay
desc: I like their rooms which is so clean and modern with some gadgets. Although the one I stayed in, the fridge rubber is coming off so it is not easy to close the fridge door. Other than that, the staycation is great. I like the pool which is sized nicely. The staff were great. Very hospitable and friendly and helpful to make our stay so nice.

title: Staycaytion
desc: The stay at Andaz Singapore was great. The room, amenities, food and staff exceed expectations. Check-in and check-out processes were straight-forward and relatively quick. We will definitely recommend Andaz Singapore to friends and family.

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: We had an enjoyable stay, all the staffs we encountered are so friendly and helpful especially Catherine from the check in desk. Stayed in the studio suite and the room was spacious, phone can be connected to the tv so we can watch Netflix, YouTube and play musics which was really great. - Found the bathtub a little higher than normal hotel, so have to be careful. - Feel that for room service, it will be quicker to request through phone call than through the app. When I made request through the app, the request was not fulfilled but when I request it through phone call, it was delivered to our room very quickly. On the app, I can‚Äôt seem to use the digital key but it‚Äôs ok since we have the cards. Overall the experience was great and enjoyable.

title: Big and clean. Good location. Nice infinity pool
desc: First time to Andaz and it was a great experience! From the room to the food to the pool to the location. The room is big and spacious. Bed is comfy. Love the design of the bathroom. Breakfast is not bad though can only choose 1 main. Would recommend laksa. Continental choice is unlimited though. The pool is an infinity pool and is lovely to be in. And oh, you can request for complimentary beverages in the Sunroom, just beside the entrance to the pool. As our package includes 36hrs stay, we thoroughly enjoy the time spent in the hotel. Check out is a breeze too, via the express checkout where you just drop the key card into a red box at the lift. Will be back when the price is right!

title: Rest and Relax
desc: This is my second time staying in Andaz as I love how convenient it is and check-in was super fuss-free. Got a room on the high floor with super nice city view. Love the pillow selection that will suit needs of different people. Definitely coming back again.

title: Officially our favourite hotel! Totally worth it!
desc: Check-in process was a breeze and the service was excellent! My partner and I were given complimentary desserts to celebrate our anniversary and the hotel arranged us for late check-out at 1pm, we are super grateful and extremely satisfied with our stay at Andaz Singapore. Overall great service, really clean, spacious and cozy room, great location and the perfect hotel for a staycation. Still the best hotel I‚Äôve stayed at. Thank you Andaz Singapore!

title: Staycation
desc: My family and I had a fantastic staycation at the Andaz Singapore. The level of service from check in to the restaurants ( alley 25 and Mr Stork) was very high. We would highly recommend having the weekend lazy breakfast and evening drinks at Mr Stork. Looking forward to be back at the Andaz.

title: Stay cation with Members
desc: We enjoyed the stay in this hotel, clean room and good service. Only there's no halal food in the hotel restaurant and room service. Luckily there are halal restaurants and shopping malls nearby. Good location.

title: One year on‚Ä¶.
desc: We were here a year ago, and had an equally enjoyable and relaxing stay. We love the sprawling bed and tiled flooring, water pressure was great and of course, the all important toilet bidet #gotbidetcanstay Our rooms came with in-room refreshments, F&B credit and breakfast. Last year, there were alcoholic drinks in the minibar but they have changed that to all soft drinks now. The in-room dining was speedy and food was good, other than the cheese platter which was quite disappointing. The slices were thick and large and ended up with all the cheese tasting the same (pungent due to the blue cheese) Breakfast was at Alley on 25, the waffles were crispy and delicious. Mushrooms could have been cooked a little bit more. We had a pleasant surprise when Ms Kavi remembered us from

title: Birthday Staycation that turns out to be proposal
desc: Birthday staycation which turned out to be a proposal went pretty good. Facilities, deliveries and f&b at the hotel were great. However, staff could be more friendlier (more smiles) except for check-in officer who displayed great professionalism. Moreover, the staff who communicated with my fiance have done better by keeping the promise to my fiance on fulfiling the special service (re proposal).

title: Fantastic Place for Staycation
desc: Place is fantastic, room was spacious and modern. Breakfast was also delicious. Location is also link by sheltered underpass to bugis junction etc. Swimming pool is small but is a beauty due to its high floor.

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: Stayed 1N in the Studio Suite and loved the wide views from ocean to city. Room was spacious + especially enjoyed the big bath overlooking ocean. Special kudos to Carmen at the reception. She was friendly, confident and knowledgeable. She offered advice on eateries, acceded to our requests for a high floor room + even arranged a cake to celebrate my birthday - customer oriented service at the highest level! Keep it up!

title: Nice hotel for relaxing
desc: Swimming Pool and Gym was difficult to book. Requested for and network cable as the wireless was kind of slow, only after 3 or 4 calls + trips to the front desk then they informed me that they do not have it. Why did they give the false hope that its available when I requested for it the first time???

title: Andaz Stay
desc: Nice, good facility, cozy. Value for money. Amazing view. Good staff. Good food. Many eateries around the hotel. Good selection of breakfast. Amazing view from Mr Stock. Complimentary in-room mini bar.

title: Excellent stay and extremely friendly staffs
desc: We were given free upgrade on our room upon releasing we are staying at Andaz Singapore for our anniversary. The room conditions are great and the food selection at the various restaurant are excellent. The staffs are extremely friendly and the staff going around hanging surprise Christmas gifts for the hotel guests are super funny too :D

title: Birthday trip
desc: My wife gave me a surprise cake issued by hotel. To our surprise, it cost sgd$18 charged by hotel whereas it was presented to another guest free. Why this double standard? We checked in on 14th oct and checked out on 15th oct. The water heater was spolit, repaired once and spolit, so we need to change for another room. My birthday mood was dampened.

title: Top-notch service and room.
desc: My husband and I stayed in the Deluxe King Room and had a lovely time. The check-in process was a breeze with staff assisting us to book our pool and gym slots. The room was clean and the view was amazing!

title: Perfect staycay
desc: Love the CS team warm service and support during my stay. Especially how the lobby check-in personnel prompt update on the receipt of my flowers. Really appreciate the warmth and professional service rendered by the front-desk personnel in making my surprise a success ! Appreciate CS GABRIELLE's team in accommodating to my request and suggesting alternative services to make my stay better. Really enjoyed my time here.

title: Superb stay!
desc: We have a pleasant stay at Andaz Singapore till we didnt want to leave! Staff are polite, room is clean and awesome. They also made arrangements to send over a handwritten note and a box of macarons for our anniversary. we will be back!

title: Hotel with a unique, posh design
desc: Check-in is fast, check-out is even faster (by simply dropping the key card at L2). Exclusive walk-in walk-through closet design separating the wardrobe, luggage rack, bathroom and vanity counter from the bedroom. Great gym, good pool, amazing city view on rooftop garden. Subway access is within same building compound, plenty of eateries below and nearby. Bugis junction is just across the street.

title: Staycation at great location
desc: Location was superb, walk to Bugis Junction, Suntec in a few minutes. Service was great, staff were polite and helpful. F&B was nice. Breakfast choices were wide and served to the table. Will surely stay again with the F&B voucher promo deal.

title: Great hotel
desc: Hotel was clean and new, with great service and ambience. We stayed with our three kids (all below the age of 6) and we had a great time. They provided a baby bath tub for my 6 month old baby too. Food was great too! Would definitely revisit in the future!

title: A 5-star Hotel That Would Not Disappoint
desc: Andaz‚Äôs service is one that is professional and close to heart. The staffs are extremely friendly, and accommodating towards our request. I would recommend reading the pre-stay email that they sent out, as I have missed out a lot by not reading it. The email contains useful info about the hotel, from breakfast menu, booking to amenities. There is also an online check-in. Super great hotel, will definitely recommend and visit again!

title: Spacious bed & tasteful interior
