desc: Lovely stay at Andaz! Service staff was extremely helpful with the facilities booking and meals. Also, they even wished us happy anniversary with a handwritten note and macarons which is rlly unexpected but really sweet! Love the food, the room, the big bed, the beautiful decor, and the view! üòÄ highly recommended

title: Trendy and into details.
desc: Doing away with feature wall or art piece behind check in counter. Instead it's open window view with bar setting as backdrop at level 25. Staff are dressed down in solid colours, more personable. With staycay as only leisure for locals, I am happy to receive birthday wishes in a subtle manner. Thank you Hana for your thoughtfulness and eagle eye during check in. Perfect open city view from 3123. I can see building construction on its way and hope it won't block this rooms view. The window glass is not pixelled so you get clear view of the city. Must visit the infinity pool and Mr Stork at level 39. The view is spectacular. Though you will need to book in advance for the best timing. Guests are allowed 90mins up at Mr Stork, 60mins pool use and 60mins breakfast time. There are

title: Okay / Average Stay
desc: The room was great - Spacious / Clean / Amazing views. Swimming pool was okay, small as compared to hotel size. Carpark not complimentary. Check in took a long time (Not really their fault as busy time). Staff were decent. Overall, nothing bad, nothing great. Average stay.

title: Staycation
desc: Excellent service. Hotel is clean and spacious. Booking come with 100 F&B credit which can be utilised at the hotel. Overall happy with the room and services. Would recommend to friend and come back again.

title: staycation with family
desc: my requests was met upon check in! Bay view with superb view! friendly and attentive staff around the hotel to ensure that we have a wonderful stay! location was good with mrt connected to the hotel. we will definitely be back again!

title: Comfortable stay
desc: A lovely stay with love ones. Amenities are available upon booking. Staffs are efficient and hospitable. Breakfast options are substantial and breakfast server was helpful and clear with explaining the menu options.

title: Meets expectations
desc: A hotel in a good location that should have the wow factor but overcrowding, not being able to book into use the facilities and loud building works at the pool let‚Äôs it down. A shame because the room was nice. But overall not good value for money. There‚Äôs better options out there for a staycation in Singapore.

title: Happy customer
desc: This is my second visit staycation in Andaz. First was in deluxe rm and now we stayed in suite room. We had a nice views and everything in the room was nice and spacious. I love the bathroom with large bathtubs and full length of glass windows. Andaz is generous you can have everything in the mini fridge w/o extra charge and daily top up!! It‚Äôs easy to find varieties of food and caf√© around the area. I would recommend this hotel and we will definitely come back next time during sch holidays. üëçüëçüëç

title: Enjoyed the stay despite some hiccups
desc: Loved that they provided baby tub n toiletries<3. Only downside they didnt understand my request to freeze my icepacks... (this happened on both days) so it was a little stressful coz i needed them to store breastmilk since the fridge was not cold enough n i needed the ice packs to transport the milk home as well. Everything else was great! The view, the location, the food was all good

title: Best hotel I‚Äôve ever been in Singapore!
desc: Never knew Singapore had such a great hotel, great view and room was perfect. Best customer service, they even called to check on me when I wasn‚Äôt well and provided me with my requests. Food was super good loved the ribeye and the laksa! Wanted to spend my birthday alone and relax and had such a great trip.

title: Supper worth it for a 36 hour staycation
desc: Its really nice to have the 36hours staycation esp in SG and current situation. Really feel like a short holiday for my family. My kids and parents enjoyed the stay. Just that the bed did not seem to suit my family needs but had fun in all.

title: Favourite hotel ever!
desc: Stayed at my favourite hotel for the 2nd time for my honeymoon. Indeed the best hotel - with such a magnificient view from the 36th storey! My husband and I love every single sides of the room. We will book andaz again, for sure!

title: Family and couple staycation
desc: A great experience to all of us, from arrival to room, to dining in, to the pool and checking out. Just hope that the hotel can eventually work out with the building management to include complimentary carparking for hotel guests. Hope to come back again soon. Thank you and great job to everyone at Andaz.

title: 2d1n staycation
desc: Room was extremely spacious. the room was beautiful with a nice view. service was top notch. although we were woken up by a false fire alarm at 3am. i believe that was an one off incident. I would definitely come here again.

title: Average at best
desc: Lights were flickering in the room, wifi was down in the room, the tv programmes had limited options, food was very average, keyless bluetooth entry was broken. Overall, wouldnt recommend if you're looking for something special. I had heard a lot of good things about this place but kinda felt like it was over-hyped. Maybe Singaporeans have lower standards, but I've experienced stays at this price range with a much better experience.

title: Great stay!
desc: Amazing stay! Great exploration and food at nearby Kampong Glam. The bay view was amazing, Woke up with flyer and sea view. Serving staff at Alley on 25 & Bar Square are great! Breakfast was yummy! Overall staycation experience was awesome!

title: The best staycation ever!
desc: Check in was swift. All request was communicated among all team members. High tea is great. Changes menu according to the season. Breakfast is good. All staff are all extremely attentive. satisfied room. Cant wait to book again! They are the Singapore Airlines of hotel service!

title: Nice and comfortable staycation
desc: Nice and comfortable staycation. In-room dining was expensive. Not enough dining venue due to renovation of Auntie's Wok. Also not enough slots for booking of swimming. The quality of food is above average but quite expensive in general.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: We had a pleasant check in procedure, smooth and fuss free, guided to our room by staff. Chilled at the Sun room and the Andaz tea was amazing! Definitely a must-try. Kids love the spacious room, and hygiene was up to standard. We are able to pre book slots for swimming and gym in advance to allow better planning of the day. Breakfast served one of the most delicious bread spread. We enjoyed the stay except the air con didnt really perform at night.

title: Great Stay
desc: Conveniently located, very clean and new. View is awesome yoo. Stayed in Residential suite which is reasonably priced. Minibar is replenished daily and guest service crew is responsive. Stork at 39th floor refreshments and view is good (6pm onwards)

title: Excellent staycation
desc: From the check-in till the check-out, during our 2 nights stay to celebrate our wedding anniversary. It was a pleasant and memorable experience. The F & B outlets, the room and the staffs were absolutely amazing. Due to the constraint of listing all the names. We extend our personal & sincere thanks to each & everyone of them for a great excellent service.

title: Overall good but some improvement areas
desc: Rooms are spacious, clean and very comfortable. We accidentally broke a glass in the room and housekeeping arrived in less than 30 minute and did an amazing job cleaning it up. Thank you so much! It was a pity that the swimming pool was not managed too well. It is a small pool with a maximum capacity of 20 pax but at one point there were more than 30 pax and people could only stand around in the pool with little or no space to swim. When I brought this up to the management, he did not seem too bothered and replied ‚Äúsome people will leave‚Äù. Another disappointment happened when I was misinformed by front desk that children under 12 years old were not allowed at the breakfast restaurant. This left me very puzzled and I ended up having breakfast at So France downstairs (a good

title: Amazing experience!
desc: We had a beautiful stay and experience here! Our appreciation and gratitude for an amazing host- Mr Ismail! Made our day eventhough we had a late checkin. An upgrade to the cityview was amazing! Never had a view like that at any other hotels. Lovely view to watch the world go by on a peaceful night. Would definitely return again :)

title: Pleasant stay
desc: The hotel is clean and friendly staff. I really liked the online check-in and how it updates me on the time I can check-in. Really like the room size and amenities. It perfect for friends, couples and family.

title: Family staycation
desc: we were travelling with family and booked 2 rooms. Staff were very accomodating when we requested for rooms on the same level. I was impressed when i receive birthday card and macaroons for my birthday in my room.. good surprise!.. Will stay here again in future. Good location.

title: One of the best Staycation Hotels in Singapore
desc: Upon entering the hotel, you will be attended promptly by their kind and approachable staffs. Hotel is very clean and newly furbished. Room is clean and spacious and has a nice view. Breakfast was delicious with a wide variety of cuisine. Will be back again soon.

title: Staycation
desc: Service and staff was excellent. Swimming pool usage was regulated as there were not more than 15 guests at any one time. Each room number can only reserve one slot per day to use the pool. Food was very good, enjoyed the breakfast selection and the service was excellent:

title: Accommodating staff
desc: Staff were accommodating. During breakfast, they informed us which food items are non-halal. When we requested for certain ingredients to not be included into our order, they listened and delivered what we asked for. :)))

title: Staycation at Andaz with a toddler
desc: The hotel was conveniently located and facilities are extremely clean. Staff are friendly, prompt and thoughtful. Our 1.5 year old toddler slept well too! Will definitely visit again and will recommend this to our friends and family.

title: Great hotel, lovely view and comfy bed
desc: Room was great and the view was majestic. Hotel was nice to prepare a little cake for our anniversary. Bed was comfortable (it's the firm type), and breakfast was yummy. Will definitely come back again for other celebrations

title: Nice place
desc: The hotel is brand new,I will I give 6 stars for a remarkable place to stay ,very convenience with two MRT stations near by.Popular shopping Center near by.5 minutes walk to most popular shopping Centre‚ÄîSUNTAX. SHOPPING CENTRE. .

title: Hotel right In the cultural district with great friendly staff and nice view
desc: Great hotel for a staycation. Spent one night only , got the room with king bed and Bay view . Due to covid , hotel has staged timing for check in , which I did at 12 pm. Hotel starts from level 25 up, hence you would be assured of a city or bay view in any case . Went for a swim , nice pool with nice view of Padang and the flyer . Friendly staff, would recommend a stay.

title: Pleasant & memorable anniversary
desc: We enjoy our stay stay in during our anniversary & we enjoy the complimentary breakfast . Room service was excellent & staff are friendly. Fantastic view from our room. The check in was smooth and easy. Express check out was brilliant

title: 5* stay, 5* experience
desc: Hotel staffs were friendly, attentive and intiative. We did not submit any special request for our stay even though it was honeymoon staycation, but was asked during check in and was pleasantly surprised when we got an upgrade, which was awesome as we were able to chromecast and catch up on our netflix shows when we're in the room. Room was in tip top condition and cleanliness was perfect, one night is definately not enough to enjoy the amazing hospitality provided by the hotel. It's my husband's first time at the Andaz, and definately not our last!

title: Good hotel, good location.
desc: The rooms were big and very spacious. The amenities inside were great and the swimming pool had a very nice view of the city. Location wise, it‚Äôs very near to lots of food places, shopping, public transportation and the city. The only downside was the staff wasn‚Äôt that pleasant. Upon arrival there wasn‚Äôt any help with our bags, at the lobby the receptionist didn‚Äôt approach us. Throughout the stay, I only encountered good staff at the pool area, and concierge. Nonetheless, it was a good stay with a good hotel at a good location.

title: Staycation at Andaz
desc: Check-in process can be made online so that upon registration it will be quicker. Staff were polite. My birthday was 2 days after the staycation, and the staff offered an upgrade of the room with city view. I was also given 2 macarons and a birthday card from the hotel. My overall stay was pleasant. View at Mr Stork was great. Location was great and connected directly to Bugis MRT. Overall, I had a great staycation at the hotel.

title: Perfect
desc: If you are travelling with small kid, this is just a good place for you for short vacation. Amenities are everywhere shirt distanced. You don‚Äôt need to go elsewhere to eat as the quality of food is just perfect.

title: Honeymoon
desc: Enjoyed our stay. Check in process was done in less than 15mins and we were given our room immediately. Room and toilet were clean. It‚Äôs convenient as there are a lot of shops nearby. Everything went well and we really enjoyed our stay there! Would definitely be back again!

title: Family staycation at Andaz way surpassed our expectations
desc: I do not often take the time to leave a review but I think Andaz is well deserving of a mention from me. To keep this short and succinct: What I love: Unlimited complimentary drinks One time use of mini bar Luxurious and comfortable rooms that provided us with excellent sleep Awesome breakfast with superb service from wait staff (special mention to Jess at Alley 25) Guests can wait comfortably and served beverages while waiting for a table Convenient access to Bugis Junction Can be improved: Usage of pool and gym needs to be booked in advance (but understandable due to Covid situation) No complimentary parking for guests Thank you for the 5 star hospitality, Andaz! We will be back!

title: Great stay with young kids in suite room
desc: Beds were v comfortable, suite room was spacious, and plenty of halal food within a 5 minute walk at Arab street. Highly recommended for quick getaway. Only downside was parking which was chargable, arnd 20-30per week-day.

title: Great place, top notch service.
desc: The service was excellent. The staff made sure to remember their guests and their habits. They would ask if the food was ok and whether the stay was ok. The food was decent and location was great. Great place for tourists and locals alike.

title: Best view of the City and plenty of amenities
desc: The view was absolutely beautiful :D bluetooth speaker was a great addition and the staff are very friendly and helpful. Architectural design of the room is nice but pillow could be improved. Will stay again

title: Fantastic location. High floors. Nice views. Nice rooms.
desc: Fantastic location. High floors. Nice views. Nice rooms. Really enjoyed this yt stay here except the inconvenience of parking. If you can, get a room with the view of the Padang. Very close to my gym as well which is good for me.

title: Staycation
desc: It was a fuss free check in process, email that contain important information for us to take note was send out prior the stay, we can also do an online check in first during the day of stay and will receive an sms when the room is ready. Appreciated that the mini bar item is complimentary and we got a nice view for our room, the location of the hotel is also well connected to bugis mrt which make it very convenient especially family like us with kids. Overall a satisfied stay and would love to come back and stay again next time.

title: Friendly staff, great service
desc: Had a honeymoon staycation at Andaz, have to say that it is one of the best staycation I had. At the concierge, I met Scott who was very friendly and welcoming, and throughout my stay in the hotel, I would bump into him and he always remember my wife and I, finding out what he could do to make our stay better. It is difficult to find a hotel staff that gives such a personal touch to make your stay a more pleasant one. Keep it up Andaz!

title: Andaz Staycation
desc: Overall a good stay, the solar dots hampered the view of the bay which we paid higher amount. Breakfast selection need to be expanded. Indian chai and cuisines need to be added. Halal food option to be added.

title: Room was bigger than expected
desc: Room was bigger than expected and the layout is very unique which enhances the overall feel of the room. Head pillow was a little too soft for my preference. Breakfast spread was really very generous and even something so basic like their congee was very delicious. loved the antioxidant smoothie as well. Pool was of decent size and the view was above average.

title: My staycation at Andaz
desc: It was a relaxing n pleasant stay for my husband n me during our stay at Andaz. The staff were friendly and accommodating. We had a sumptuous breakfast and enjoyed exploring the area as the hotel is well located.

title: dissapointed
desc: dissapointed with the overall services. the purpose of our family staycation is to celebrate our wedding anniversary (which I have indicated in my booking comment) and also to bring the kids to the pool. the online swimming pool booking only allow booking for 2pax, so I have to call guest services to book for 2 adult and 2 kids. in the end didn't managed to get a slot by the time we get to speak to guest services (called 2 days beforehand for the booking). the kids were very dissapointed. and also no complementary parking which is quite ridiculous to pay about $50 for 2 nights of parking. if knowing that the swimming pool is so difficult to book and have to pay additional for the parking, we would not have selected Andaz for our celebration. all these information should have

title: Very nice property & close to amenities
desc: The view was stunning and modern room and facilities. For the pricing against room size definitely is worth it. Plus Haji Lane is just opposite so many food choices are available for you. Shall try the breakfast on my next visit. Kudos to the Andaz team!

title: Clean and nice
desc: Love it clean and nice view room . We got it sunset in our room . Recommended to friends and wish everyone have a nice day . Convenient and near city area. Nice view of swimming pool üéâüéâüéâüéâüòçüòçüòçü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©üá∏üá¨üá∏üá¨üá∏üá¨

title: An Unforgettable Stay
desc: This is my third stay in this hotel, and the service level has not faltered. The team members I encountered were warm, polite and hospitable. Due to the ongoing renovations, the checking in of guests was done on the 2nd floor. Although there was a queue, I did not have to wait long. To take your mind off the wait, it is a brilliant idea to have a pushcart where guests can order a complimentary beverage. The check-in process was quick and I made my way to my room shortly after. The room I was assigned to was very comfortable and had all the amenities a guest needed. Find time to look through the TV menu and you will be equipped with what the room has to offer during your stay. The clear instructions meant I can stream movies from my phone app onto the TV screen. Another bonus

title: Nice hotel in good location
desc: Its a relatively new hotel and well designed. Rooms are modern and stylish. Slept very comfortably in their beds, nice views of city and the waterfront. Swimming pool is rather small and at the time there were renovations going on but the hotel and staff ensured there little inconvenience to guests which was good. The bar on top of the building was a nice hang out place with spectacular views of the area, unfortunately I was told I have only 1.5 hours to spend there and I have to leave. That was a little disappointing as I wanted to have more drinks and food to enjoy the view but can't. Other than that very happy with my stay.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Check In process was smooth, friendly and quick. The room was exceptional giving me an impression that it is a leading hotel in Singapore. I will definitely return to Andaz again to celebrate our anniversary yearly

title: Super worthy stay and great breakfast!
desc: Everything is wonderful! The attitude and all! The check in process was fast and no wait needed. The room is very clean with nice city view! If they could have done up some bday and wedding anniversary package or surprise it will be 100% perfect

title: A great choice for a stay in the city
desc: My wife and I had a one night's stay and what can I say? The room was cozy, clean and the view phenomenal! The staff were friendly as well, not to mention helpful. As an added bonus, the location was so convenient, right in the middle of town! I highly recommend Andaz for a stay of any length.

title: Staycation
desc: Love the place. Really clean and cosy. Amenities were well provided, food was really good. Loved the concept of the coffee bar at the lobby. Easily accessible too, and the location was amazing i could jog ard town and the biz district easily

title: AWESOME STAYCA
desc: The hotel staff are very friendly, helpful and polite and gives you that welcome vibes when being approached. The rooms are great and the view from my room is super awesome. Overall my stay has been very pleasant and great and definitely will recommend it to friends and relatives and will make a come back

title: One of the best staycation we had in Singapore!
desc: It was an amazing and restful staycation (2.5 days), such a steal thanks to the hyatt bday sale! Love every moment from having a high floor corner room, beautiful view of the city, delicious breakfast as well as sipping drinks watching the sunset at Mr Stork rooftop bar!! Would definitely visit again next year!

title: One night stay w bestfriend
desc: 10/10 enjoyed myself w a beautiful view . Worth every penny . Service and staff was excellent . Room was clean and spacious . Breakfast was ok but enjoyed it nevertheless . I would come back again w my family and friends .

title: Short weekday staycay
desc: Overall really enjoyed our stay in Andaz. Room was clean & cozy. Our stay included the afternoon tea & breakfast the following day. We were very happy with the food quality & food portion. Customer service was consistently excellent from staff across different departments which made the stay all the more enjoyable. Location is pretty great too! Super easy to get around since it's right outside Bugis MRT. Would love to come back again!

title: Great hotel but experience can be improved
desc: I think that hotel staffs can do more. I don‚Äôt know but it seem that none of them greeted or even smile during my 2 night stay. Like a lack of communication between guest and hotel team member. I believe a lot of work need to be done to improve the overall experience other than being a new hotel, with great location, nice room and nice food.

title: Unexpectedly awesome!
desc: Services received since the first check-in had been awesome. Attentive, helpful and friendly staff throughout our 2 nights' stay. Surprises were given to us even though we didn't mention that it was for honeymoon. Nothing to be picked on, rooms are clean, toiletries are generous. Definitely going back again!

title: Great Service made the stay really enjoyable
desc: My husband and I came here for our honeymoon and the service was great! We booked it through Klook with the rediscover vouchers, so essentially we paid about $200-250 (depending on day) after discount, which included free breakfast and $100 F&B vouchers per day. Those vouchers actually covered all the food we needed such that we didn't have to eat out since we have brunch + dinner settled. Food was good but service but several staff was the real highlight! Would like to mention Remon the Assistant Manager of Alley on 25 really went all out to make sure that my hubby and I had the best dining experience. Norie who was the lady that served drinks at the lobby was also super friendly and walked us around the bars upstairs to recommend us drinks and good deals (like the happy hour

title: A great place to get your work done.
desc: Needed a day break to focus on my school work and Andaz was such an ideal place. Loved the ambience and the service was good. The room was spacious and the toilet was clean. The mini bar area was great too. Overall very pleased with my stay.

title: Splendid stay at Andaz
desc: We have a very enjoyable stay at Andaz . The staff were friendly and made us feel so welcomed and treasured . Kudos to all staff of Andaz , from check in counter to Mr Stock , Alley 25 dinner and breakfast , Pool and staff we met along the way and while taking the lift . You made our stay so splendid and memorable !

title: Good location hotel only
desc: Good location, connected to the mrt line. No free parking. Swimming pool suspected to be dirty as kids got spots and rashes after. Booking system thru Facebook messenger not intuitive, unable to find out what keywords to type. No toilet near the swimming pool, need to walk quite a distance from the swimming pool which is quite inconvenient.

title: Family staycation ‚ù§Ô∏è
desc: Family staycation. Booked a suite. Splendid view. Opted for in room breakfast. Very good quality of breakfast and plentiful. The only thing I felt was hotel staff are not warm and approachable. Queue was long and slow during check in (weekdays, school holidays) and was disorganised too. No proper directions on where the queue starting point. The bathroom door can be open from inside and outside of the bathroom (2 ways), without lock. Hence no privacy for a family stay. The view from the top floor rooms, bathroom views whilst in the bathtub and the location at the heart of bugis made me want to come back though. Got a good rate too via email reservation. Thank You Andaz.. Hope to be back!

title: Perfect place for a staycation
desc: It's a perfect place for a weekend getaway or even a midweek escape! Strategically located in the Bugis area, you will have excellent choices for food all around. It has direct access to the MRT which also means that you won't have to worry about getting wet on a rainy day and still have plenty of options for food and shopping! You will come here to enjoy the unique layout of their rooms - the touch of yellow really makes a difference in lifting your mood, and together with the floor the ceiling windows - you will enjoy a great view no matter which type of room you pick! Room service was quick via the chatbot, it was easy to navigate and you pretty much have everything you need all from a few taps of your own mobile. Overall a great experience and wished we stayed longer - the

title: Best location and great hospitality
desc: Hotel is accessible via train and others public transportation. Location is near food eateries, you can easily walk within mins to enjoy your local delights . Hotel room is clean and well maintained, you get best view of the city and if you are lucky you will get a room with view of the SG flyers .

title: Staycation at Andaz
desc: Best part about Andaz hotel is the rooms at high floors with fantastic views (bay or city view rooms) The place is clean and very comfortable to stay. The addtional perk is the wonderful rooftop bar (Mr. Stork) that has superb service and beautiful night view.

title: 2 thumbs up üëç üëç
desc: Very polite and helpful staff with a smile. Clean environment. So touching that the management gave me a Birthday Card.Nothing to worry about coz management had the rules and regulations of the hotel to follow. #staysave #stayhealty üôèüôèüôè

title: Friendly staff and excellent services
desc: The staff was friendly, courteous and very helpful n attentive :) there are staff around to ensure all our needs are fully taken care of ‚Ä¶ the room are very spacious n with Complimentary mini bar snack n beverages

title: Fiserv - Green Oven
desc: Great food, experience and hospitality from service crew Horman, Jiaxuan, corwinn, Dinesh. They will serve the water and food promptly. The key word is memorable. Great hospitality is about making each guest‚Äôs dining experience memorable. Keep up the good work night time.

title: Great staycation!
desc: Fantastic view at level 39, awesome customer service and helpful lift attendants! The staff at the lobby and reception look genuinely happy to be working there. If they are not, I also appluad them for their acting chops!

title: Birthday staycation
desc: The room was spacious, clean and it was in a high floor and the view was amazing. The tv was adjustable to the sofa and the bed and there was Chromecast and complimentary drinks in the fridge. I would definitely come back to andaz for another stay

title: Birthday weekend
desc: Great experience with family. A birthday to remember. Staff took the trouble to ensure that my birthday surprise deliveries were taken care of. It was memorable and sweet at the same time. Thank you the enjoyable experience.

title: Happy
desc: Amazing experience. Staff are friendly and helpful. Nice room ambience, spaciousand clean. Breakfast is great and delicious, portion are big. Alot choices for the breakfast. Nice location, just afew minutes away from bugis.

title: Restful stay
desc: Really enjoyed my staycay for 3d2n. Was not expecting too much as I‚Äôve read reviews of how service wasn‚Äôt that good. But I‚Äôve received great service and the room condition and cleanliness was good too. Really enjoyed my stay and would return when there‚Äôs opportunity

title: relaxing birthday staycation
desc: Our first time staying at Andaz. We booked the 36hrs stay package for my birthday. check in from 9am was smooth, we had a good impression as the front reception, Greg (as he introduce himself) was nice, he was quite clear and sharp explaining how to book facilities online, etc, and he wish me a happy birthday and he asked if we have questions before going up to our assigned room, we didn‚Äôt encounter this from other hotel‚Äôs reception even from other 5stars hotel. we had our room at top floor (37th flr) with a good view (without requesting it) it will be perfect if the room has a bath tub cos the toilet is quite big also (no photo) but so far we have no complains, afternoon high tea for us was so so , maybe we were comparing it with other hotels who had more selections. There

title: Great stay with nothing much to complain about
desc: Booked a room with this hotel as i read somewhere that their rooms had bathtubs. Sadly it turns out not true. Only Suites had bathtubs. When I called to enquire, the staff over the phone told me rooms facing city view has it. however, during checkin, I realised that the room I've been given has no bathtub. He said only suites has bathtubs. Had some issues with TV, requested room service and technician never came. Pillows are very flat. even with both. Thus not very comfortable. Breakfast and tea time there was pretty good. overall service is not too bad.

title: Feels like a true vacation
desc: Since we can't travel to Seoul, we wanted to 'pretend' that we were. The hotel staff treated us like tourists, allowing us to leave our luggages in the front desk and all, which made the experience more wholesome and fulfilling. Thank you, Andaz.

title: Pleasant stay, wonderful staffs
desc: The staff were very approachable, friendly and helpful. They assisted us the moment we alight from the taxi, carried our luggage and briefly tell us on the checking in procedure as there was a queue. While waiting for our turn to check in, they offered a complimentary drink too. Upon checking in, the staff noticed my birthdate and wished me an advanced bday. It was unexpected. As for the cleaning of rooms, we did not request for it however they did the extra mile to ring the bell and knock the door to ask if we need the room to be cleaned. Overall stay was wonderful and the service rendered was beyond expectations!

title: Fabulous staycay
desc: Stayed at Andaz, was wowed by the excellent service from all the staff. Special shout out to Ms Carmen Lim, the assistant manager who was very thoughtful to arrange a birthday cake to be delivered to our room for my wife.

title: Good Stay
desc: We purchase the hotel vouchers when they had a promotion for their birthday. Booking was a breeze via the website and emails were sent from the hotel to inform us to look out for another email that will be sent 3 days prior. We waited for the email (checkin was on a Monday, but nothing still on Sunday) as we wanted to make reservations for the facilities but we received none. We called the main hotline which was directed to India and then was subsequently transferred to Singapore. The agent said that the department (Sales) that was supposed to send the email is not in, but she was kindly enough to assist us with the reservation. Subsequently, we did receive an email (Late Sunday afternoon) with the facility booking, but it was a day after I sent an email over to ask for it.

title: Memorable Stay!
desc: I brought my young kids along to the staycation and booked for 2 nights with different room as the first night, there wasn't any available room left under the promotion. When I checked in, the staff at the Front Office, Scott knowing that i brought kids along, upgraded my room to bayview type (which is the same as my 2nd night's stay) as the room i booked for 1st night was not big enough to accommodate all. He also slowly explained to me to ensure i understand the terms of stay. I had a box of macarons delivered to me in my room after i checked in and the next day (which was my birthday), they gave me another box of macarons which i thought that was a sweet gesture! During check in, they had a basket for guest to put in their used pens so they could sanitise. They also had

title: Short but wonderful staycation at Andaz
desc: Excellent location for Andaz hotel and rooms were big, looks new and had great views of the city or Marina Bay. Service level from all staff were wonderful and warm. Breakfast and room service food was of good quality! Was a little surprised that only one main can be ordered for the ala cart breakfast but there were other selections ( bread, cold cuts, coffee, tea, waffle) to make sure one is filled to the brim. Pool area was not big but had an excellent view of the marina bay. Really feel relaxed just chilling by the pool and definitely a hot photo spot. Hotel has some renovation ongoing so hopefully the new amenities will make future stay more enjoyable! Overall an excellent stay and value for money to me as I was using the SRV discount and opted to visit during low peak day

title: Wonderful and restful staycation
desc: Wonderful stay at a luxurious city centre hotel, spectacular city skyline and given a corner room. Excellent and prompt service staff, amazing amenities within the hotel and its surroundings, direct access to Bugis Junction and Bugis MRT.

title: Andaz Hotel
desc: Everything is perfect. From checking in to booking out, it was a smooth and quick transition. Their rooms were amazing and facilities were top notch. My family and I had a joined deluxe suite room. It was spacious. We enjoyed the view very much. The employees were very friendly and very helpful. Thank you Andaz! Never dissatisfied one bit. Would love to come again.

title: Excellent location service and room
desc: The location was fantastic, linked by connection to the mrt stations, we could shop the nearby malls rain or shine. Service was excellent, with staff to guide you at the lift lobby as there were removations being done. Check in was smooth and pleasant as was check out. Having the e-concirge service Andy made it very convenient to book pools and gyms slots (covid restrictions) wheever you are. The rooms were fantastic and felt very user centric.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Room is spacious. Hotel is in town area with shopping malls and alot of food outlets just a couple of steps from the hotel. Direct access to MRT at the hotel basement level. Staff are friendly, polite & helpful & fast room service. Really enjoyed our stay here.

title: Great Stay at Andaz Singapore
desc: Enjoyed my recent stay at Andaz Singapore. Everything is efficient and well organised and the staff are friendly and helpful. The hotel offers good selection of breakfast and the high tea was nice. Great experience overall !

title: Excellent place for romantic celebration
desc: Smooth check in, beverage provide by a small kiosk. The view from the Studio Room(level 36) was spectacular. Able to see MBS, Singapore Flyer, Esplanade, National Stadium and a lot of ships on the sea from the French window.

title: Amazing hotel stay
desc: Very friendly staff that handles request swiftly and professionally. The service was quick and the breakfast was just too good! Not to forget the amazing view is superb. Extremely satisfied with this staycay... will definitely be back!

title: One of the best
desc: Love the room.Clean, great location. Check-ins area can be improved.I had to queue for an hour before another counter was open on different floor.Waiting area can also be improved. HALAL food can be found easily around the vicinity.

title: Great hotel!!
desc: Celebrating special occasion by staying in a convenient hotel was a good choice. Lots of Nearby choices of food and location was convenient to move around for shopping. Will consider to book again this hotel in future.

title: Amazing service and great location
desc: Attended my sister's wedding at Andaz a few days ago. The venue was gorgeous, spacious, and easily hosted all our guests. The lighting was set up perfectly for the different events and the dining service was punctual and fast. Food was excellent and Audrey took excellent care of us and all the guests who attended. This day was very special to us and Andaz went over and beyond to deliver a phenomenal experience for both families. Thank you Audrey!

title: Pleasant stay!
desc: Friendly and helpful staff who made us feel so at home! We were in love with the Very clean and spacious hotel~ all staff (fr the lobby to the pool area were very service orientated) Thank you for the wonderful experience!

title: Loved the stay!!
desc: Really loved everything about the stay - room is clean and comfortable, gym equipment good enough for a good workout and breakfast was not too bad as well! Staff were all friendly and pretty efficient. Wished my stay with Andaz was longer!!

title: Comfortable, Quiet with lots of helpful staff around to make our stay comfortable.
desc: A very comfortable stay at Andaz with very professional staff and good location for food and shopping. I went there for recuperation from illness and had a very restful time with my husband and son. It was a restful period and nearby ammenities like shopping and eateries were good. The hotel is very nice with it's cosy, clean and quiet environment. I like the peace and the staff who were around making the stay comfortable and good.

title: Senior Citizens Couples
desc: The check in staff Mr Ismail was very friendly and courteous. He gives us room at 37 floor and want us to enjoyed the stay and the view. Before we leave for lunch, I call the operator, which I only know her last name Bte Rahman to have our room clean and to top up the Nespresso coffee capsules. By the tone of her voice, she was very happy to serve us and even make arrangement to top up extra Nespresso coffee capsules which we did enjoyed it. Overall the staffs was very friendly and helpful. For sure we'll come back.

title: Wonderful Staycation at Andaz
desc: Had a wonderful staycay experience at Andaz. The room is comfortable and hotel view is amazing! Will definitely consider going back to Andaz again for another weekend getaway. Satisfied with the service.

title: Affordable price with high standards
desc: I like andaz and i would recommend a lot to my friends,This is second time been here, a bit change is no alcohol provide and all the shampoo change brand , but the quality all still keep and we will have third time visit

title: Great stay!üëçüèª
desc: Bought a e-voucher during sales from the Hyatt website. Includes a 10am check in & 4pm check out, breakfast for 2, regular room & $50 dinning credits Check in service was smooth, managed to upgrade to a suite room with a charge of $150++ Breakfast & in-room dinning food was great too! Breakfast had a really big feast, I choose the western & Asia set for in-room breakfast.

title: Perfect stay!
desc: The staff at Andaz know what is the true meaning of Service Excellence! They were knowledgeable, flexible, understanding and I cannot find something to go against them. There are sufficient staff ready to serve and waiting time was minimize. The front desk staff whom I forgot to get his name really gave us a good start of our staycation. The staff at Alley 25 were excellent too! View from the room was magnificent and will not lose to its other competitors. The room was clean and neat and requests came in fast too. The room size was perfect for a family of 4. There was also a big table for 4 of us to have in room dining. The location of the hotel is good. Away from the crowd but yet conveniently accessible to the mrt. Food was nice and portion was good. We had a great time at

title: stay
desc: had a recent stay at this property. very aesthetically pleasing exterior. room was decent. other than one of the power points not working and the slightly low water pressure, nothing much to fault. plenty of food options in the vicinity. overall a good stay. will be back again

title: enjoyable and pleasant stay!
desc: hotel staff were friendly and enthusiastic. check in process was smooth. carpark was convenient. breakfast spread was delicious. pool water wasnt too cold. convenient location. it was easy to self-book the hotel facilities although it was not stated you had to go to L25 to change gym pass when gym is on L38.

title: Good stay good memories
desc: The hotel is clean and location is good, can walk to the shopping mall in just 2-3 mins. Andaz is so sweet that noticed it‚Äôs my spouse‚Äôs birthday and send 2 mini macaroons and a birthday card to our room although the booking was under my name. My 9yo boy enjoyed a lot in the Halloween themed room! This is another sweet memory for our family!

title: Andaz Singapore staycation
desc: location very convenient with good public transport. Hotel amenities excellent with good foods and friendly services by staff. Room is very clean and neat. Would recommend business associate and friends to stay in Andaz Singapore.

title: Wished I had stayed here earlier
desc: Luxuriously spacious, well-appointed room that presented the perfect getaway. The service was warm, but not intrusive. The location is nice and central with a lot of dining options. thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and will definitely be back!

title: Enjoyable stay at Andaz
desc: Hotel was flexible and accommodative to our requests as we brought kids along. We were grateful for the free room upgrade and early check in. The rooms have great views and were very clean. We enjoyed our stay alot.

title: 36 Hrs Staycation
desc: The 36 hours staycation was excellent! I like the package that CI at 9am, next day CO at 9pm. Room is spacious with well cleanliness. Friendly staffs. Except the breakfast, very disappointed dinning experience . Very dry and plastic-like Dim Sum, dry breads , away below Andas supposed to be.

title: Wedding Anniversary staycation
desc: Check-in procedures were way below average although I was given a time to do check-in, queued for more than 30 minutes to be served at the check-in counter. The experience was liked checking in to a boot camp. The staff there were unfriendly, inexperienced, not professional.

title: Staycation at Andaz Singapore
desc: My wife and me had honeymoon staycation at Andaz Singapore. During our stay (1st Nov - 3rd Nov), the reservation/reception in-charge Scott that help us with the check-in was very friendly and his service excellent. The hotel layout design was great and room has great view in front our bed. Really thankful and appreciated üòä

title: Good location. very clean.
desc: Good location, Good food and Halal food around 5 minutes walk. And shopping area. Bugis night market. mosque nearby. one of top locations. Great View from roof top restaurant but need to book in advance. it can provide you 360 view of Singapore :)

title: Halloween themed stay at Andaz
desc: +ve points - staff was really friendly and nice - food was great (room service and breakfast) - location very central -ve points - halloween deco was basic (balloons and stickers) - welcome tray was full of sweets and chocolates (diabetes!) - high pricetag - wasnt able to use pool facilities due to weather :(

title: Great staycation
desc: Sumptuous breakfast, nice view, friendly and pleasant staff. Spacious room with a fantastic city view on 33rd floor. Public gallery on 39 floor at nite was marvellous. Dinner menu not much choice. Will be repeating stay there again.

title: Awesome Hotel
desc: Great, clean and friendly staffs. Wonderful experience, impressive view and great for staycays. Easily accessible to nearby amenities. Welcome with a complimentary drink. Will definitely book again for my future visit.

title: Staycation
desc: Great location with a lot of good food around the area. Cleanliness of the room is there however the water pressure for the shower is really bad (stayed at high floor). The check-in was smooth and fuss free as well. Had some technical issues and the staff came up to fix it really fast.

title: 36 Hours Package is a good deal!
desc: First time staying at Andaz, using the 36 hours at Andaz staycation package. You can maximise your stay by checking in at 9am, and checking out at 9pm the following day. Thus you have 2 full days to enjoy the hotel's amenities (go check their infinity pool and gym at Level 38), and explore Bugis area at your own pace. As the hotel is located from Level 25, every room has a good view. Room is spacious and comfortable.

title: Enjoyable food and room :)
desc: We enjoyed room service for our late lunch of steak, risotto and cold cuts from 665 Deg F (the restaurant)\ shortly after check-in on Sunday 31 Oct 3pm. The steak was a brilliantly done medium-well :). Nice touch on congratulating us as newlyweds with a card and macarons. Dinner and breakfast at Alley on 25 was very enjoyable because of the food quality and warm service. Some memorable dishes we can recall are the seafood stew, the pandan chiffon cake, barramundi, laksa and runny yolk on the eggs benny :D Regarding our room, we appreciated that it came with many electrical and even USB charging points :) interesting walk-in bathroom concept :)

title: Excellent accommodation for families
desc: The room was spacious. There were no sharp corners to worry about. My daughter had fun in the pool. The breakfast for us was limited as we had to have halal food which they didn‚Äôt offer. The kaya toast and egg was good though. Not forgetting the TWG tea! Best part is the minibar was free.

title: Awesome Staycation at Andaz Singapore
desc: A very satisfying stay. Overall experience was very good and cannot think of anything lacking. Friendly staff at check-in, clean, tip top condition and spacious hotel room with a beautiful view. Good and convenient location to some interesting places. Super happy place to be in for my 26th wedding anniversary. I‚Äôll be back for my next staycation, otherwise it will definitely be on my next wedding anniversary.

title: Staycation with the best view of the city
desc: Upon arrival, while waiting for check in, we were delighted to be given refreshments from the coffee cart located at the lobby. I really think this is one of the best features of Andaz for making guest feel comfortable and refreshed while queuing up for check in. The front desk leader, Mr Adrian was kind enough to allocate us to a room with a wonderful view of the city, Room 3601. Its was corner room. Breakfast was on the 25th floor, Alley on 25, i must say that the food choices are limited but all delicious. Will definitely come back and recommenf Andaz to my families and friends.

title: Birthday Staycay
desc: Went for a staycay for husbands birthday and Andaz was very sweet to sent up a little gift and card for him. It really made our day. Only pitfall is that they do not provide complimentary parking. Other than that, service and room was great!

title: Staycation was awesome
desc: Andaz has not failed to lived up to its expectation. heard a lot of good reviews about this place so decided to try it. Check in speed was acceptable but the service and protocol to keep the guest safe was great. excellent room with excellent view. breakfast was good but could have more variety. would come back again. Maybe i will get a room upgrade in the future :)

title: Andaz Hotel
desc: From the moment I stepped foot into the hotel, I fell in love with pretty much everything. Really enjoyed my stay! Only regret is that it was too short (1 night only). 200% would recommend to everyone!

title: Staycation at Andaz
desc: Bad experience at Andaz . Unable to enjoy the facility with my wife . Service is poor during Breakfast. The staff actually left the recipe on my plate . There is no complementary parking . At Mr stork , my wife was recommended a cough syrup drink which totally left untouched after a slip . I would never üëé spend another staycation or recommend to my friends at Andaz . üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüëé

title: 36 hour stay
desc: Pleasant stay! Room was spacious and comfy! Staff was very friendly and helpful! The vibe of the place is extremely relaxing and there was a lot of privacy, building structure was nice and modern! Would highly recommend for anyone who wants to make their staycation worth !

title: Birthday staycation for daughter
desc: We chose the suite in order to get the bathtub that is a must for any of our staycation. The room was really big, spacious and beautiful that I really cannot bear to leave. Swimming pool slot was full and I got panic as my birthday gal keep pestering to go. Was put on waiting list for 7/8pm and next morning 8am. Was grateful i did receive call afterall in the morning and the birthday gal enjoyed her swim. Early check in/late check out request sadly not granted for slightly longer stay. Lastly, complimentary parking that is default entitlement for any hotel stay will be appreciated. Our previous stays in hotels that shared carparks with residence/office/malls managed to provide so i believe is depends on hotel decision afterall. üòâ

title: Room was cosy and nice
desc: F & B was good but 2 to 3 of the establishment was not open due to renovation. If it were to open, I definitely will visit again. Lastly the view was good when I paid abit of extras amount but due to pandemic, there is no nice view like fireworks

title: One of The Best Hotel Ever Stayed In
desc: Andaz was one of the best hotel i ever stayed in. The staffs were friendly during check in and even took the effort to find out if we are celebrating any special occasion. The room was spacious and the view was awesome. Breakfast was also delicious.

title: Cosy, comfortable and modern hotel with spacious room in excellent location
desc: The room is generous in space with a good layout. The entrance area is spacious too, unlike the typical narrow doorway in most hotels. The sofa and table provided in the room is also of a good size. It's comfortable as a dining or working area for 2 people. The king-sized bed is super comfortable. I like that there are windows in the bathroom which lets in natural light. And if privacy is needed, there are automatic blinds to adjust the amount of coverage needed. The hotel is in an excellent convenient location, and is linked to a shopping mall and 2 MRT stations, within 3 mins walk. Friendly staff who makes me feel welcome. I will definitely stay again and will highly recommend this hotel!

title: Bday Staycay
desc: Awesome skypool, clean room, huge bathroom, thank u for gifting me birthday macarons and upgrade me to deluxe room! Underground direct to Bugis mrt and Bugis Junctn shopping mall. Must visit 39th storey to view beautiful sunset! Only issue i have r the pillows. Cant sleep.

title: Fire alarm ruined the stay
desc: The hotel was okay but the fire alarm rang twice at 630 am and one more time at 930 am. It was extremely shrill and woke us up with a start. Definitely ruined the relaxing staycation we had planned. Am disappointed.

title: Staycation
desc: Everything is perfect. Staff & service on tip top condition. Room wifi and tv could improved. Hard to get signals and tends to get cut off while watching netflix. Input a netflix channel would be better

title: Always my go to hotel
desc: Very attentive staffs, they make sure you feel comfortable during the stay. Explained every details that you should know and always with a smile. Rooms are clean with great view, beds are comfortable. Feels like home!

title: Strongly recommend
desc: Strongly recommend you will never regret, room was clean, room was also big. Only that there is no bath tub. Overall experience is great than expected. You need to try it urself to believe it. First time ever

title: STAY
desc: Great Place for a short gate away Helpful and friendly ground staff like Mr KENZIE/MS LIRA CONTACT RECEPTION OPERATOR Dinning at 25 ALLEY superb in terms of Food and Prompt request attended to promptly Breakfast and staff were superb in service Mr Greg Mgr was superb in ensuring my expectation were met for this special stay

title: Quite an unfortunate experience
desc: We were very excited for our stay and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel is connected to a mall and train system via underground path, thus is very convenient. Unfortunately, we experienced multiple false fire alarms, one around 6 am and one around 9am. The first one lasted for a while so we couldn't get back to sleep, and the second one stopped the lifts from working and we were late for work...

title: Really comfortable and great for staycation
desc: Really enjoyed my stay with andaz. Room was comfortable and clean with a great view. Location was also very convenient as we had direct access to the mrt and mall. The staff was very polite and helpful. Food was also very good.

title: Excellent breakfast and stay
desc: Highly recommend Andaz, spacious room and tastefully designed hotel with very good choices for breakfast. Good service started with pre check in emails. Staff showed initiative and care contributing to a most enjoyable stay.

title: Good Services
desc: Upon arriving, we hace drinks being service while waiting for us to check in the hotel. There are also staff along lift lobby to direct us around. When we enter the room, it feels very comfortable. Love the stay. Will book for another.

title: We enjoyed our stay
desc: Awesome view. Think the best in SG because we got the highest floor. Staff are awesome, goes the extra mile. Breakfast is good and without much hiccups. Will definately return to this hotel for another staycation.

title: Wonderful stay at Andaz
desc: We have a wonderful stay at Andaz to celebrate our wedding Anniversary. The hotel is kind to accommodate to our early check in request and we are greeted with friendly staff to welcome our stay. The hotel also gave us macaroons and complimentary cake at the restaurant. We would also like to compliment Jess and Raudhah for their attentive service at the restaurant. We have utilise the $100 dinning credit for drinks at Mr Stock and Alley on 25. Overall, it was a wonderful stay and I would definitely come back again.

title: Favourite staycation hotel!
desc: Always love staying at Andaz with its top-notch rooms & service. A special thank you to Izzat at the front desk who assisted with giving us a room with a great view, took the initiative to assist with our reservation at Mr Stork & went the extra mile to ensure that we had a comfortable & enjoyable stay. Shout-out to the bar manager (didn't manage to get his name) who took the effort to explain & recommend different cocktails to us as it was our first time at Mr Stork. This is my 2nd time at Andaz & I'm returning to stay next month again!

title: Enjoyed the staycation experience thoroughly and the 36-hours is totally worth it!
desc: Got the 36-hours package from Klook (check in at 9am and check out at 9pm) so it was a very restful weekend! General One thing that I really appreciate is the interior design of the room and the location. Interior design is really thoughtful - from placement of power outlets, flexibility of TV angle, dressing room design, to anti-slip grip on the shower head control - these are all little things that elevates the experience. There was complementary minibar and it was a good experience drinking tea from their tea pot set. Only downside here is that there is no bathtub in the standard rooms. In terms of the location, it is a quick 5 mins walk to Bugis Junction and I could easily take away food and enjoy in my room. In terms of service, there is no doubt that the staff are really

title: Great relaxed stay
desc: Went over for another weekend staycation after having a lacklustre one at the W Singapore a few weeks ago. Liked the view, room, bed, location and breakfast. Will be back when there's another room promotion.

title: Luxurious room with huge bed!
desc: The room was big n spacious with a kind of walk in wardrobe. The king sized bed was huge! Good floor to ceiling windows providing a scenic view of the surroundings from a high vantage point. Convenient to get around too!

title: 36 Hours (Check-in 9am Check-out 9pm) with Breakfast and Afternoon Tea for Two
desc: This is my 3rd staycation. Earlier family stays were at Conrad and Ritz Carlton. Decided to try out Andaz after reading the good reviews. This booking was made and indicated that we are celebrating our 16th wedding anniversary and my hubs birthday. I was elated that a complimentary box of macarons was offered. Although check-in was at 9am, we arrived almost 11am. There is a drinks station at level 2 check-in lobby. It was indeed a welcoming gesture as a cool drink was definitely needed in the hot weather. However, I was a little disappointed when the front desk said to inform them when we are heading out and they will prepare the surprise. Thot that the room was already prepared for us. Upon checking in, we found the rubbish bin was not cleared in the toilet and called the

title: 36 hour stay
desc: Overall a good 36 hour weekend stay at Andaz. First room they checked us in had a musty smell, we called up the front desk but they rectified it by switching us to a different room at the same level immediately. The room on the 36th floor had a really nice view. Food at the breakfast was good and the staff members were polite and helpful. It was a pity that the bar was under renovation during our period of stay, would love to visit it otherwise.

title: City View Room
desc: Booked the staycation under klook with the rediscover voucher for my husband and i as a getaway. The hotel staff was very friendly and provided excellent service. Only could stay a night as we had to get home to the kids but already planning our next staycation with the little ones.

title: Great Customer Service & Superb Location
desc: Andaz Team surprise us with anniversary cake! Thank you for celebrating with us! The customer service who send in the cake is so cheerful & makes us feel very welcome! The guy who process our check-in makes things easier for us. The waiting time is not too long. They even have barista counter at the lobby for guest who are waiting to check-in. Will definitely have a comeback with my familyüëçüèº It has a prime location, where you can get all the halal food around. Arab Street & Bugis Junction is just outside Andaz doorstep. The luxury of staying in this awesome & clean hotel.

title: Excellent Experience
desc: My stay was memorable. The service and staff were friendly and courteous. Jus stay a night and you will stay on more. The food was really good especially breakfast served punctually. The pool was clean and staff very warm and cheerful. I very stronglyvrecommend the hotel for a staycation. My friends loved it too..Well done Andaz

title: King Bed with City View
desc: Booked this room for staycation using rediscover voucher. Upon arrival, got a really warm welcome at the concierge with welcome drinks and friendly receptionists. The check-in was very smooth. My booking was at 3pm but I arrived early and they allowed for early check-in. The room was very clean and spacious, unblocked City view, extremely beautiful at night. No bathtub but very nice bathroom. Walking distance to Arab street and general Bugis area. So quite a bit to explore. From there on can take mrt to garden by the bay or marina bay sands.

title: AWESOME hotel with AWESOME STAFF
desc: Recommended hotel. Their services is tiptop, Staff are friendly, approachable. Rooms are huge, good views as my room that i booked was Bayview. Worth every penny if ure looking for a good hotel. THUMBS UP!!!

title: Splendid stay
desc: Choose this place for the second time on my birthday week. reason because it is very accessible and conciliator conveniently located around halal eateries. The only downside was that 665¬∞ Farenheit (halal restaurant) was under renovation during my stay, so i was not able to utilise my dining credit fully. Other than that, my stay was a breeze.

title: Great staycation at Andaz
desc: Stayed 2 nights for a staycation. The hotel facilities and room are new, clean and great. Service was friendly, warm and really helpful. Location in Bugis is great if you want to pop out for some shopping or find something to eat. Highly recommended!

title: Relaxing Stay
desc: We were surprised to receive amenities for my son's post exam celebration. Overall, a relaxing stay and we bought the 36 hours package which included afternoon tea and breakfast. Maybe for breakfast to have more variety.

title: Recommended staycation choice
desc: I celebrated my wedding anniversary with my wife on this short staycation, good experience being my first time with this hotel. Accessibility to the hotel was easy with MRT ride, totally sheltered from the underpass straight to the hotel lobby, it would be great if there‚Äôs free or subsidies carpark rate for in-house guest. The staffs was great, warm, friendly and accommodating. Rooms are clean and the amenities provided are great, the city view from the room is just awesome, day or night. The infinity pool was nice for cooling dip, too bad didn‚Äôt get a chance to visit the gym due to the safe distancing restrictions. We had a wonderful dinner at the Alley on 25, the morning breakfast spread was good too. Overall, the staycation experience was as if I‚Äôm overseas.

title: Our Staycation @ ANdaz
desc: We had a great stay for our 1 night in rm 3111. Your staff from check in was smiling always & ever so helpful. We will come again. Location is close to SIngapore well known arab street or even Bugis Junction so not a worry. So if your from overseas & coming to my country, this place is a good place to stay with the tourist destination nearby. Oh ya.. MRT is a super short walk & connect you to the whole country.

title: Pleasant experience
desc: In general, the staff were very friendly and accommodating. Room service was surprisingly very good. Location was great, it would have been perfect if there is more children friendly facilities, the kids pool is a bit too small.

title: Nice staycation
desc: Very clean & new. Pretty big room too. My own ‚Äúdisappointment‚Äù is that they provided only a pair of rubber slippers which dampens & cheapens the whole experience. Maybe they trying to be ‚Äúeco friendly‚Äù but I wouldn‚Äôt expect such slippers in a 5 star hotel. It‚Äôs otherwise a great staycation.

title: Deluxe Room - City view
desc: Had a wonderful time at Andaz. My wife and I spent our first wedding anniversary there. We were generously upgraded to the Deluxe room - City view - free of charge! I highly recommend this room as the view is absolutely stunning. Throughout our 2 night stay, the staff was very friendly and supportive. The room was superb with all the necessary amenities. The staff did mention that there was construction work going on but we did not hear any construction sounds during our stay. The restaurant ‚ÄòAlley on 25‚Äô is cosy, warm and provides scrumptious meals. The breakfast is also very delicious. The restaurant staff there was also very friendly and attentive despite the rush hours. The hotel also has a rooftop observation deck which is open for drinks and snacks. This place is a must

title: Sweet family staycation experience at Andaz
desc: Clean and beautiful hotel, considerate staff and wonderful food. The swimming pool is nice, esp for the kid's pool, my baby enjoy the facility very much. Staff are very helpful and considerate. Overall a very wonderful family staycation at Andaz. We will come again:)

title: Very good experience
desc: Friendly staff, caring and very observant, thumbs up to all of them, you will see all of them hanging with a bright smile, which make your day better! Room condition is good, nice view, good location (short distance to bugis). Facilities is in good condition, perfect!

title: 3D2N stay with family in Residence Suite
desc: Overall was great. Easy access to everywhere and pretty convenient to get around. No complimentary parking though as they‚Äôre sharing the space with another building. Room was spacious and modern. Bathroom could be better, hated the stench couldn‚Äôt enjoy my bath as I felt that it was really disturbing. Good amenities all around. Staffs were friendly, efficient and helpful.

title: Awesome staycation
desc: Stayed there quite a number of times. Back here to celebrate my anniversary. Want to thank team Andaz, for making my stay here fruitful and enjoyable. Just a special mention Catherine from Front desk, who made my checkin seamless. Also helped me out with my questions and requests. Thank you. Give this girl a reward. Thank you

title: Family staycation
desc: We had a short staycation to celebrate my birthday. Was surprised to receive a lovely birthday gift from the hotel staff. Great view from our hotel room from the 33rd floor. Overall, a good place for staycation!

title: Clean and conveniently located yet quiet
desc: We enjoyed our stay at Andaz. The room size and layout was excellent. The hotel is located at a convenient location, well connected to other places via walking distance, bus and MRT (subway). Overall, staff were courteous. Perhaps the only small drawback was at 1 of the F&B outlets. The staff did not inform us that the kitchen was not open after serving us welcome drinks. And bar snacks menu was not provided.

title: Amazing stay
desc: Superb service by Andaz service! Friendly & helpful. Room was modern & cozy. Andaz provides a complimentary f&b. Breakfast & afternoon tea were great. Swimming pool staff named Fandi was so friendly, always smiling & talked to my mum. He even wished my mum for her birthday even it was a belated. One thing good about Andaz is that it is located near Haji Lane & Bugis - so convenient to find food & sight seeing. Overall i would be making plans to stay at Andaz again in future. Thank you Andaz Team.

title: Awesome stay
desc: It was really a very memorable and great stay for us.. they provided a small cake and macaroons for my girlfriend‚Äôs birthday. It was a very thoughtful act. Staffs are all very accomodating. Though u must provide an atm machine for those costumers who wanted to draw money, as the nearest one is at the bugis junction

title: One of the best staycation experience
desc: Stayed 1 night on weekday. All the staff we encountered - from lobby ambassador, front desk, housekeeping to F&B servers - were all extremely helpful and accommodating. Room was in tip top condition with fantastic city view. I booked the promo with $100 F&B credit and it was totally worth it. Thank you Andaz.

title: Wonderful Staycation!
desc: Loved the property the minute we entered the hotel. Check in was fast and the staff was very patient in explaining the facilities even though there were a lot of guests behind me : ) Room was spacious and bed was very comfy, unlike other hotels I have tried. Cleanliness is important to me and my partner and they made it very clean. Thank you. you will see us more!

title: Great location, great hotel
desc: Perfect central location, close to many eateries both expensive and cheap option. New and nice hotel, very comfortable. Needed to call for bedroom slippers but small matter. They provide rubber slippers instead

title: Best staycay no doubt!!
desc: From check in to bar to dinner, everything was great! Check in procedure were smooth and fast, even receive a welcome gift shortly after :) Mr Stork was amazing to see the sunset and taking pictures, but i feel the food can be improve. Nevertheless, thankyou to staff Mille for attending to us, making us felt welcome :) Dinner at Alley on 25 was good. It was a pity that i couldnt get a little late check out time..

title: Poor service
desc: 1) booked my stay on their website but when I checked in, they said breakfast not included. This was not specified during the booking 2)due to my honeymoon i asked for flower petal or special decoration on bed 1 week before the stay. I got some disgusting pandan cake and a mini bar refill which we didn't use. 3) asked for a firmer pillow and got sent the same soft pillow by 3 different staff on 3 occasions.

title: Think of Stayation, think of Andaz
desc: Excellent Services of staff especially the waiter and waitress which shown good service mindset which they do their best to serve. The breakfast is good with many choices. The rooms is clean and well maintain with nice city view. I can take many professional artistic photos üì∏ within the hotel and surrounding areas. Hope to revisit again when need to be recharge again.

title: Amazing service
desc: The service from front desk all the way to the dinning time. Everything was perfect! I would love to stay with andaz again when there is opportunity to do so! Definitely one of my go-to hotel next time especially if im celebrating anyone's birthday! During breakfast , Jess surprises my boyfriend with a waffle birthday cake! Totally commendable!!

title: Attentive staff and good location
desc: Attentive receptionist who take notice of your birthday during check in. Felt the friendliness and sincerity of the andaz staff. Location wise is great with direct access to basement which lead to the shopping mall and mrt .

title: WOWSZXS!
desc: Amazing view. Perfect customer service. Every single staff that we passed by at every corner of the hotel acknowledged us. I am pleasantly surprised. Pillows are super comfy as well! Toilet, vanity and shower is super clean. I had the best stay ever!

title: Incredible views and amazing hotel !
desc: Current best staycay hotel Everything is perfect about this hotel - Architecture, location, food and beverage. Breakfast located at level 25 (Alley on 25) met my expectation. Friendly staffs.. and very good in house service too. Go to level 39 (Mr Stork) for breathtaking views while sipping your cocktails. Excellent time here.

title: Nice Anniversary Staycay
desc: Overall experience at Andaz was great. Excellent room condition. Comparing to many other 5 star hotels this by far one of the cleanest room you can get. Yes will visit them again probably try the suit. Well done Andaz team.

title: Stay at Andaz
desc: The 36hours stay was wonderful. The staff was friendly and food is more nicer than expected!! The cocktail at Mr Stork was amazing. Bet will just come back for the drink too. Of course, this time will definitely return again with my kids.

title: Pleasant Stay & Good Food!!
desc: Big room with nice view! Quality & yummy food (dinner & breakfast) at their Alley on 25 restaurant. Beautiful Observation Deck & Outdoor bar at Level 38. Room rates a little pricey. Swimming pool kinda small.

title: Rest and relax
desc: It‚Äôs really a great place to rest and relax. The room is designed with users‚Äô comfort in mind, which conserves privacy as well as convenience. The views from our room, pool and gym are all very nice. We could even explore the rooftop level, where the night scenery is magnificent. The check-in and check-out are simple and efficient. We could even conveniently pre-book the pool and gym in advance with their Messenger chatbot.

title: Best to celebrate any occasions or just need a break from the world
desc: Got the 6pm check in but was relative early as we had lunch nearby, called to ask if we can get checked in early. The staff told us to go to the front desk and see if there are available rooms. We tried our luck and got checked in on the 2nd highest level and 2 hours earlier. Although we missed mr storks due to the booking being full. The in-room dining was fantastic with the view and room that was beautifully designed. The Andaz team deserved to be praised for their service and their attention to details.

title: Stay was good!
desc: Truly enjoyed the stay at Andaz, The view at Mr Stork is not to be missed! Nice Breakfast, and good location. Looking forward to staying here again, highly recommended. Do note that parking on weekdays are expensive!

title: All worth for the view.
desc: The view was amazing along with the room. Excellent experience from start to the end. It's a place for everyone to at least experience once. Aim for the city view if you like to carelessly enjoy the night lights and sun set.

title: Worth the $$ to stay
desc: - Top notch service from the friendly staffs - I was well informed on what is going on in the Andaz Singapore hotel while they are undergoing some renovations - Breakfast was awesome! - Room was clean!

title: Wedding Anniversary Stay
desc: Overall, the room was clean and the bed was to our liking. We booked a room with city-view and it was fantastic. Breakfast was ala-carte buffet although the offering spread was not huge, the quality is there and we enjoyed it. The service is however average and you would have expected more from this establishment.

title: Excellent Service
desc: Every one of the staff in Andaz maintained their professionalism and are very attentive and always has a positive attitude. Really glad we chose Andaz to celebrate our birthdays! We would definitely come back again in the future.

title: Hotel review
desc: The hotel staffs that assist me to check-in and dine in at Alley 25 & Mr Stork bar was great with excellent service. Free in-room Macaron and mini Chocolate Brownies from Mr Stork for my husband's birthday that warm our heart. Overall my husband & I enjoyed our stay with Andaz. Keep it up with your good service.

title: Bad check in procedure
desc: Not satisfied. check in process was a little slow , there were only 2 receptionist and a rather long queue when I was checking in , and when it was finally my turn to check in I was told that I have to place a deposit. But I didn‚Äôt have my credit card or any cash with me (I only brought my debit card ) so I told the receptionist that and said i didn‚Äôt want to put a deposit so I‚Äôll pay any expenses directly if I were to have any. But he insisted that I have to put a deposit otherwise he‚Äôs not gonna give me my room key. And told me that I can go to the nearest mrt station(around 10mins walk ) to withdraw cash and come back again to check in. I was confused because I‚Äôve been to a couple of other 4 Stars and 5 Stars hotels in Singapore and there were all okay with me not putting

title: Staycation at Andaz Singapore
desc: Hotel with excellent no-frills check-in and check-out process, easy process of bookings of pool, response time is quick for requests on toiletries. Front desk staffs are very helpful, and clear in their explanation and clarification. Good service staff.

title: Worst hotel experience
desc: Honestly it was the worst staycation I had in Singapore. Calling the room service or receptionist was really difficult. The line will just continuously ring without someone answering. At one point, they even rejected our call. Like which hotel does that? It was really a first for me. Checking in was a disaster too. I received an email that due to covid, they are staggering the check in time and ours was scheduled at 11am to 12pm and if we failed to come at this time, our next check in would be at 4:30pm. We reached Andaz at 11:20am, and upon checking in, I requested if we can have the Singapore flyer view. The receptionist told us that actually we are early for checking in and that our room is not available yet. So what she can do is upgrade us into a city view by paying $15++

title: Best Staycation Ever
desc: Could only enter the room after the stated 3pm check-in time as the room was not ready but it was understandable since I booked a suite and it takes time to clean a bigger room. As a result, they offered to extend the check-out time from 12 to 1. The room was extremely spacious, squeaky clean and super comfortable. Amenities in the room were very comprehensive. Love the room slipper the provided, which adds a note of fun to the entire experience as it says "Stolen from Andaz". The view towards Marina Bay was amazing! Breakfast served in the room was equally awesome! The laksa was very flavorful, spicy and warming in the morning. Will be back for sure!

title: Awesome hotel!
desc: Andaz never fail :) Great to be back here again. Room was huge.Had one of the great hospitality staying at Andaz. Value for money! Amenities are easy to book. Thumbs up Andaz Singapore for the great service and pleasant hospitality.

title: Room design and view superb, the rest average
desc: I concur with most of what the previous reviewers have mentioned and if you stay here, it is mainly for the view, pool and the room vibes. I purchased the Hyatt Flash Sale at $300 which comes with City View, breakfast and $50 credit and booked it on a Friday. The room felt clean and very wonderful to stay in. The view is obstructed by those polka dots which other wise is perfect. The inclusion of minibar felt just for the sake of including, the drinks are the typical coke which I could get it from elsewhere. Alcoholic beverages are only included in suites. A very rookie mistake of this hotel is that I was provided with 2 hair conditioners and 1 hair shampoo, which have never happened in everywhere I go. I had to call up to get a replacement which is some cheap looking body
