title: Perfect
desc: Staycation with Klook voucher for 36 hour, king room. We love the room and staff. I expected a long queue for check in as reviewed by other travellers, but it was supper fast and simple indeed (my CI time at 9PM, weekday). We will definitely come back ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Great
desc: Great place to stay in. Quick check in, clean rooms and staff were very helpful and friendly. Very comfortable and probably one of the best hotels for a pretty reasonable price. Everything in this hotel is excellent.

title: Staycation well deserved at Andaz
desc: Had a great weekdays staycation for the 1st time at Andaz. The room was clean n well-kept. Staff was very friendly profesional n helpful. Hotel in very strategic located in the heart of Bugis n Arab St. If only the have halal restaurant that will be great..but I enjoy my stay.

title: Excellent Ambient
desc: A new, clean and excellent hotel in Singapore but a bit pricy.. Pleasant staffs around all corners and helpful. However, can be better if price drop a bit during pandemic and I am sure the hotel occupancy rate will be definitely increased. Will come back again if price drops

title: Friendly staff
desc: Was pleasantly surprised by the warmth and genuine friendliness of the staff throughout my stay at the hotel. The location is easily accessible via public transport. Check-in & Check-out was a breeze. Kudos!

title: Excellent service
desc: We booked two night stay in the City view room from Klook, it‚Äôs really worth it. The room is quite spacious and we absolutely have no complaints. The best part about the stay at Andaz is their service. All staff were super friendly and helpful. Alley on 25 served good food, all staff were attentive and helpful, especially Lucas, who made our last dinner a very enjoyable experience.

title: Amazing!
desc: Hotel was very clean and well maintained. Our check in process were quick and smooth and we were given a corner room with an awesome view! Staffs were very helpful and professional too. We booked he 36 hours package from Klook and enjoyed every minute in Andaz. Definitely coming back again!

title: Friendly staff, great stay
desc: Felt welcomed the moment we stepped into the hotel lobby. Check in was smooth. The room is large. Toilet is veru spacious. Good view. Staff at the restaurant (Alley on 25) were friendly and attentive.

title: Nice, refreshing staycay!
desc: I chose the standard hotel room with king bed and it was roomy and spacious. Staff were friendly and approachable. The 36 hours package is quite attractive, with 1 afternoon and 1 breakfast thrown in. A late check out meant we could book the swim sess at 7pm before checking out at 9pm. Overall a good and refreshing experience. Location is fantastic too, direct lifts to basement 3 Bugis MRT station.

title: Great hotel!
desc: Great hotel for staycation! Location was great as it is near bugis blue line mrt and there is a variety of great food around the hotel too! Great place to relax and enjoy your vacation! Definitely will go back again for staycation. Thank you!üòä

title: Thumbs up for service and food!
desc: Very happy with the room which had windows on both sides with nice city views. Thanks to Front Office Muhammad Ismail who also recommended the e-vouchers & some food items. And a special shout-out to Horman of Alley on 25 where we had our lunch & breakfast during our 1-nite stay. He was mindful of my food allergy and quickly attended to change the item when it was served with the dish. The breakfast spread was scrumptious. The menu had smoothies, detox juice, TWG teas and even mocha. Freshly-made waffles, smoked salmon slices, Egg-Benedict, dim-sum were available too. The barramundi at lunch was surprisingly yummy. The early check-in and late check-out was definitely a plus too! Hotel is also conveniently located with many shopping & food choices. The only regret is that the

title: Excellent customer experience
desc: My first staycation at Andaz. I celebrated my 50th birthday there and feel satisfied with the services and the property there. I will recommend my friends and relative to consider Andaz as first choice of staycation. Well done.

title: Birthday celebration at Andaz
desc: I planned a birthday surprise for my partner here and nothing was revealed at check in. Had dinner at Alley on 25 and the atmosphere was lovely. The room and hotel had lots of design elements. Everything was well-communicated over the chat bot and requests were taken note of prior to check in. The communication on the day of check-in was clear and prompt as well. The service of the staff here are impeccable and I look forward to staying again!

title: Relaxing Stay at Andaz
desc: Our stay was for a wedding at Andaz, everything went smoothly. Highly recommended for wedding venue. Food & Service was top notch. City views were great, reminded me of Tokyo. Overall, a pleasant stay.

title: Wonderful Stay!
desc: Much better than I expected! Room is big, clean and nice with very good view! I must say the king size bed is ultra big. The staff was very thoughtful, seeing us with a baby, she offer to let us have in room dining and also arrange baby amenities without us asking for it upon checking it. Making our stay very comfortable.

title: 2 Nights Stay
desc: Very friendly and respectful staff. Helped with the arrangements of celebrating gf‚Äôs bday. Everything was so smooth. Food was also very delicious and there was a huge range to choose from the breakfast and afternoon tea sets.

title: Amazing place
desc: Andaz was very clean and looks amazing! Some of the food places were under renovation, but the remaining open ones were already really good. Cannot wait for the rest to open up for a second stay soon!

title: Staycation
desc: We had a comfortable stay at Andaz, fast check in, helpful staff, clean and generous hotel (with compliment drinks and snacks in the mini bar), good service and convenient location. The room is very spacious and the view is good. The hotel is value for money.

title: Excellent stay
desc: Good hotel, we enjoyed our stay very much on the occasion of my son‚Äôs wedding. The food was good, good service, very large super king size bed. We will come back again‚Ä¶. After the completion of the restarant renovation.

title: Awesome hotel & staff.
desc: Hotel room was clean and staff was really friendly. I was shock to enter the room . It was really well design and clean. The toilet was clean. We upgrade to a city view at room 2830 .The view was also wonderful and relaxing. Its was such a wonderful experience there. Will be coming again with friends and family.

title: Andaz Staycation
desc: The room was good with everything that you need. Room's view was fantastic to me. Food was nice with a wide selection. Overall very positive experience which leaves one leaving the hotel feeling like money well spent.

Just had to point out at the fact that I specifically requested for a slice of cake for my partner since it was a birthday celebration BUT the cake never came. Well ok even if i had to pay for it, they could have at least let me know that they dont have anything complementary to welcome their guest with. And upon checking in, the guy who was assisting us actually said ‚ÄúOh so this is for the birthday boy. Happy birthday‚Äù - honestly i dont even know if he was being sarcastic or not. Im not being a Karen but yeah. It was a good stay overall and I‚Äôd definitely come back :) (Ps parking fee aint free)

title: stay with a perfect view
desc: a must try at the studio / king suite room. perfect view, just a pity that the window glasses had polka dots in it or it would make perfect photos =D laksa breakfast was perfect! long check in queue currently during covid season, so do come early to queue for checkin. hotel rooms were a tad expensive but the views are definitely worth it. i was able to catch a glimpse of the awesome sunset from the west facing rooms.

title: Babymoon staycation
desc: Awesome hotel location and impressive service throughout our baby moon staycation. JB surprised us with a sweet gift macaroons and late check out. Room were clean and the view was great. Easily accessible to bugis.

title: Andaz Suite King
desc: Best room so far. Staffs were very friendly. The room was clean and neat. Location is a stone throw away from getting good local foods. Highlight was the bathroom. Super big and spacious overlooking the city lights.

title: Wonderful & accessible hotel
desc: Communication is responsive & good with staff as I had made a request for husband's bday & also, asked to staying in the same room thruout our 2 nite stay (I booked each nite stay separately) & also, asked for 2 firm pillows. Check in was a breeze too. We took their Essential Package on Klook with no access to gym & pool, as we dont need these facilities too. The room is huge, the king size bed is definitely bigger than the normal ones around. Husband is very happy with their TV too (he is a TV guy). Hotel is very convenient & accessible to mrt & nearby malls & places like Bugis Junction & Haji Lane too. Overall, a wonderful hotel & we would love to be back again too. Big Thank You to the staff at Andaz Hotel Spore for making our stay a pleasant memorable one.

title: By far, one of the best places for staycation!
desc: Had a really wonderful time here and we really enjoyed our staycation though it was just for one night! First time here but definitely not our last:) Service was amazing n top notch, breakfast spread was good too! Was celebrating our anniversary so they made special arrangements n had goodies sent to our room. Special shout-out to Scott, who helped us with the check in process and made sure everything was well! Thank you for making our anniversary so memorable.

title: Perfect getaway
desc: Took up the 36hours package and this is the best getaway. Staffs are professional and friendly from check in and the surprise macarons for birthday was a great personal touch. The room is clean and well maintained, views are great and facilities booking is made easy with QR code. Breakfast is sumptuous, please book the time slots early though. Sunroom free refreshments ends at 8pm, but the view is still great if you want to chill. Overall, a good stay.

title: Great food, poor rooms
desc: Loved the experience from Alley on 25. S/o to Audrey & Kavi for such excellent service provided. Afternoon tea was decent, was expecting a bit more flair - but the food itself made up for it. Breakfast was elite, food served were so delicious & beautifully plated. Beverages are pretty basic, nothing too special to note. However, would not recommend Andaz for a staycation, no bathtubs & the space within the rooms were pretty minimal. The view is decent, but it seems that the way the room is decorated makes the view a little obscured for appreciation. Other than that, great experience. For younger patrons, make sure to check out all amenities of the room before you set your bags. Had a faulty aircon that we only picked up later in our stay (we were under the impression it

title: Staycay @deluxe bay view room
desc: Awesome value added services from the Andaz Team. Altho my birthday was two days ago, i did not mentioned/highlight to the team. I wasn‚Äôt expecting anything as well but i Gab from the recep actually wished me a happy belated birthday. A kind gesture that I appreciate it as well as the macaroons given to me by this friendly guy which i didn‚Äôt get his name. Thank you for this awesome experience!!

title: Poor communication in between staff, poor IT system
desc: Not recommended due to irresponsible staff. Called a few days ago to combine my booking + late check out upon availability and staff that picked up the call said everything will be informed yet upon arriving hotel they couldn‚Äôt find my booking, spent 20 mins trying to check in. Never even follow up with my late check out request. Terrible. Worst of all staff told me to go down daily to change my room card as the hotel only allow room to be the same but the card has to be changed due to their poor IT system. Next day front staff asked me if I want house keeping, told him no, yet they still came to disturb‚Ä¶ room was so so TV ain‚Äôt as smart as you think. Furniture have lots of sharp hazard so be careful, I cut myself inside. I‚Äôm really disappointed with their service,

title: One of the best hotel experiences, ever.
desc: A building is a shell. The people making it work, give it its soul. That is what Andaz was - A comfortable hotel, with lots of heart and soul. Started right upon arrival, the lady at the door, the yound lady who came up to us and offered us coffee while we queued to check-in and then we met Greg, who checked us in. He was genuine, friendly and even seemingly sympathetic towards parents who were having some down time away from our kids, even though he wasn't a father himself. When we tried to room service, we couldn't connect directly so the operator (a lady working on 29 sep 2021, around 7pm) took our order directly without giving us the run around. At breakfast, we were met with more heart, soul and smiles. Right at the entrance, there was a delightful filipino lady who

title: Good stay bad service
desc: Was being wrongfully charge for $100 SGD their dirty carpet. And they never seem to pick up their operator phone service. Overall all was fun and good until you went to check your credit card payment for the dirty carpet which wasn‚Äôt done by you, imagine if we didn‚Äôt check? There goes an additional $100+ SGD charge.

title: Perfect stay
desc: Big and clean rooms, I'm amazed by the size of the hotel room. Nice view as we were given a room at level 30. Staffs were all extremely polite and you feel the warmth and welcome. Breakfast spread were awesome!

title: Warm hospitality, friendly service, modern facilities and rooms, nice afternoon tea
desc: Did a staycation here with a friend in October 2021 and really loved the service and the friendliness at the hotel which I feel sets it apart. Each one of the staff we met always checked in on how our stay was going and made very friendly small talk which made us feel at home. Check in was smooth and seamless, Andaz employs a lot of technology such as chatbots, online check in and booking systems for their facilities and restaurants. Despite that we never felt the lack of warmth and the human face of hospitality as everyone was unfailingly polite. Great pool with a city view as well, the decor in the rooms is modern and tasteful and has a great view of the city. And the afternoon tea has an enviable selection of good food. Would definitely return!

title: Perfect Stay
desc: This was my 2nd stay on 27/09-29/09 and was give 3217 room number. The lady who checked my wife and me in was exceptionally good and showed great professionalism in her work. The F&B staff were all great as well. Room is well maintained and cleaned. We will definitely be back again in November for our 1st wedding anniversary. Thank you team Andaz for making my stay a memorable one.

title: Fantastic staff and service
desc: We had a staycation at andaz recently. The rooms were well maintained and although the check in took a while, they offered us drinks while waiting (coffee, tea or lemonade). The highlight of the trip was Mohammad Ismail who checked us in. He was very friendly and had realised it was my birthday tomorrow (I did not mention it). He was very kind and arranged for macaroons to be brought to our room and also gave us a city view room and a later check out. It is staff like Mohammad that can make a good staycation become great and we really enjoy our overall experience. We will be back! :) thanks andaz team!

title: Perfect Staycation for Couples
desc: Nice ambience, comfortable and great staycation to relax, location was convenience except not much choices for dining, will have to walk to Bugis for other food choices. There was no face towels and have to contact operator to request.

title: Staycay
desc: Excellent, humble, warm, friendly service by staff, casual and comfy vibes! Hotel has great views! Some construction noise could be heard so just be aware of that. New hotel with good breakfast and pool with a view!

title: Andaz Singapore
desc: Wonderful experience in Andaz. Staff to Room were exceptional. Had a great staycation and would definitely be going back. Staff was really friendly. And did everything they could to make sure our stay was that much special.

title: Amazing stay as always
desc: Great service, beautiful rooms, delicious food, they have all that you need for a getaway. Been back twice, and have always been very satisfied with my experience and will definitely recommend to friends and family.

title: Great hotel and friendly staff
desc: Check them out! great hotel with excellent service. Lovely infinity swimming pool overlooking the bay area. great overall atmosphere. Good food and service. Very up-to-date hotel features. Will be back again!

title: Excellent Staycation
desc: Decided to try andaz upon reading all the good reviews online. It was definately a good choice to stay with andaz. Warm welcome by the staffs, smooth check in, knowledgeable staffs and was given an early check in and late check out by frontdesk Ismail. Perfect location, beautiful view. Will come back soon.

title: Communication between hotel and Alley on 25 needs improvement
desc: I was offered a complimentary Lazy Breakfast at Alley on 25 by the director of operations. TRIPLE confirmed with the hotel and restaurant before check-in and the night before, but I was requested to pay up after I had my breakfast. It ruined my birthday staycation mood. Only after I asked the waitress to check the validity of my complimentary breakfast, then they stopped contacting me. They did not contact me or let me know if I was billed or not, I had to check with the concierge myself during check out. Communication between hotel and restaurant was terrible, could be improved.

title: Good Getaway
desc: A pleasant staycation with my mom at Andaz. Can clearly see my mom was very happy and satisfied with the whole experience and she's already planning to come back for another round! Staffs were approachable and friendly at any time of the day and communication was smooth. The place is connected to underground which is an easy way to connect to malls and mrt. The room was clean and cosy. Service is great!

title: Attentive Staff and Personable Services
desc: The hotel turned out better than I have expected in many ways! 1. Staff were wearing casual clothing rather than formal uniform, making it a relaxed vibes together with the unique reception area. 2. Hotel was clean and new, with modern design and smart switches. Loved it! 3. Attentive Staff and great service from the guy at level 25 who press the lift, to the waitress at Alley on 25. My picky child wanted to have Carbonara and even though it was not in the menu, the chef specially prepared it for her. She loved and finished all of it! 4. The city view from the pool was gorgeous at different times of the day. But 6pm-7pm slot was the best to enjoy the day to evening views. 5. Safety of employees and guests were well thought especially in the area where we ordered high tea to

title: Luxe Stay in A Business Hotel
desc: Pre-Arrival Communication though automated provided the necessary information. Par the course of Covid-19, the new guest journey includes pre-reserving amenities and mealtimes; all accounted for in the pre-arrival detail. Concierge / Front Desk (1M, 1F) were also very unassuming and accepted the storage of items a day before arrival, which set off the stay on a good note. Check-In Given that Online Check-Ins was availed, the processing time was adequately fast. We were welcomed by the professional and calm Jerold(?) who was managing quite a number of guests alone. He however did not skimp on his explanation of the package inclusions and new norms. He was also observant; clarifying and initiating the option of meet my dietary requirements even before I could suggest it. His

title: Homey and welcoming
desc: Hotel room felt homey. Mini bar was fre throughout my stay. The staff all exceeded my expectations and went above and beyond to help. The pool was also beautiful and they even had pool speakers! A def must visit

title: Stay with Andaz
desc: The seamless check in/out of the hotel makes my staycation started/ended well. Though the service staff are basically pretty young, their well trained interaction skill, friendliness made me feel welcome. The food were yummy too. Good variety with good portions. The only regret was unable to got a booking for Mr Stork. Overall is a good staycation for me and my cousin :) We will be back !!

title: Perfect Staycation
desc: It's nice and memorable, the checkin and checkout are contactless and and it is very fast, the room quite clean and cozy. The breakfast, especially the Laksa and dimsum were delicious. It is nice and memorable experience for me and my husband

title: Better than expected staycation!
desc: despite covid, booking of pool, gym and Mr Stork was a breeze! Breakfast was al carte buffet at hotel restaurant however guests not allowed to walk around, servers will take order and bring to our table. Servers were highly attentive, and the overall experience was top notch.

title: Spacious room, Great views, Amazing service
desc: We did a 2-night staycay in one of their residence suite from Sunday to Wednesday. Room was spacious and offered a refreshing view of the city and surroundings. Bathtub was huge. We did in-room breakfast, and the quantity was always more than sufficient, albeit options might be limited compared to dining at the restaurant. Scott and Kensie, the gentlemen managing the very popular pool, was most thoughtful and always went around to ensure our needs were met, while also respectfully invited us all to vacate when it was time. Amazing experience. No complaints.

title: Nice venue to chill & relax
desc: Glad that we picked Andaz for our staycation venue recently. It was our 25th wedding anniversary, and the hotel surprised us with lots of kind gestures throughout our stay. The view from the infinity pool and rooftop bar is spectacular! Thanks for everything! Ted & Stephanie

title: Relax & Enjoyable stay
desc: Enjoyed the stay and the staffs are very friendly and helpful. Room is spacious and have very nice city view. Location is convenient also. Train station just below of the hotel and there's alot of nice cafe and food around the area.

title: Superb Service!!!
desc: My partner and I came here for staycation to celebrate our anniversary. It was our first time here and definitely not the last. Check in took awhile but understandable due to the shortage in manpower. Service staff were all so attentive and warm!!! Compliments to Scott and Jaypee from the front office for taking such good care of us and going above and beyond. They were what made the trip so special and unforgettable. Food was alright and pool was a little small but an amazing view nonetheless. Thank you again to the team at Andaz for being so consistent in their service throughout and for making our trip one of the best!!! üòç

title: One of the best staycay
desc: Had their 36 hours package staycay and this proves better than anything. Fully rested and every single bit of my time in the spacious room . The amenities are amazing with a big vanity area which I super enjoyed with my friend. The best moment would spending time at Mr Stork , a rooftop bar watching one of the most amazing sunset in Singapore. Will definitely be back again .

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: It was a surprise when someone knocked our room door and sent us a birthday cake. The counter manager was so warm and welcome during our check-in. We also visited the swimming pool. The staff are so well oriented. We are extremely satisfied during our stay.

title: Lovely stay with pleasant staff
desc: Enjoyed the relaxing staycation. Room is comfortable and clean. Friendly staff. High tea was delicious. Location is good with convenient access to transport and lots of dining places nearby. Recommended.

title: Check-in needs improvement
desc: The check-in process certainly needs major improvement. My family went for 3 staycations in September and found the check-in here most appaling. There were many guests waiting to check in but one staff took about 15 to 20 minutes to serve the family before us and about 10 minutes to complete my reservation. I shared with the staff that other 2 hotels we stayed at recently assigned check-in time and he said that he would inform his management. I hope he did as it is not safe for the guests to wait in the small lobby for a long while. My wait was 40 minutes. In addition, the staff at the bar were not familiar about how the drinks were connected. We asked one who referred us to another. The another staff also did not know. However we appteciated this other staff (who disappeared

title: Best customer service
desc: Loved the room layout and design. Customer service was great. 1st room we had had a foul smell coming from the toilet and they immediately switched the room for us! Staff were very helpful and attended to our needs super quickly

title: Perfect stayca
desc: Had an awesome solo stayca with Andaz ,check in was quick and simple.Room were nice and food was great too! Service staff was super friendly and greeted us every time they see us, makes us feel really welcome. Would def come back for another stayca in the near future!!

title: Great experience
desc: From checking in to checking out..everything was in good order. Staff were professional and willing to assist. Breakfast was no doubt excellent but slightly rushed. Would be best if complimentary parking was provided

title: Amazing!
desc: My friends and I got the suite and I swear, 2 days feels like it‚Äôs too short because the place/view and everything was worth the price. Would definitely come back again next time! Everything was really amazing. Over the top amazing!

title: Top notch service and attention to detail
desc: Rooms and amenities were kept very clean and sanitized. Service and care for guests were top notch and pretty personalized. Good location and proximity to transport, food and shopping. Highly recommended for staycations for couples and families!

title: Excellent relaxing getaway, service staff truly added the final touch
desc: Service staff were truly excellent, professional and polite, embodying the quality that's come to be expected of the Hyatt brand. Even when we experienced hiccups in our stay the staff went above and beyond to ensure that our experience was smooth sailing. The little gestures such as coming to the swimming pool to deliver our final room's keys after a long delay, the macarons and card for my aunt's birthday, and the lovely takeaway box for my extra early breakfast at 6:30am, I truly appreciate these so much. Special shoutout to the F&B staff at Alley on 25, my family and I were there for breakfast, high tea, and dinner, and each staff on shift no matter their station provided such genuine warmth and hospitality. Regrettably I only managed to catch the name of our breakfast

title: A hotel with style
desc: Had a great relaxing stay with fabulous views from the room. The suite room was clean. The staff were polite and friendly. I was informed in advance for the booking of facilities ie swimming pool via email and booking.com app, which were good reminders. The downside would be no lan cable provided, noisy air conditioning and no room dining menu found.

title: Whole family enjoyed the stay so much!
desc: The view is fantastic. The room is huge and spacious. Bathtub is by far the best I experienced. Breakfast is sooo good as well. My kids love their stay so much. Would definitely Staycation at Andaz again!

title: Incredibly friendly and welcoming staff! Really enjoyed our staycation!
desc: Every single member of staff at the hotel is fantastic! An incredibly well-run operation to ensure you have an enjoyable stay. Highly recommended for a Staycation here in Singapore and we very much look forward to another visit.

title: Good hotel location, impeccable service
desc: Bring your own bedroom slippers if you're not comfy with those rubbered-ones Try the local delights - laksa (main menu) Alley on 25 is good for dining in, ambience is soothing too Mr Stork for bar top alfresco experience

title: I will b back....
desc: Was looking forward to a relaxing stay n it really didn't disappoint..got upgraded to the bay view room n i will miss waking up to the view..the breakfast was great too n really kudos to the staff here..all so friendly! Will def b back again...

title: Good and good and good
desc: Good service, good room and good food. We went there to celebrate our birthday (both of us having same birthday date), the friendly hotel staff upgraded our room which added the joy we have. The breakfast has enough choices and we enjoyed it

title: Awesome staycation.
desc: From check in till we are in the room was hassle free. The hotel is awesome and very clean. The ambience and view in the room given was great. From my room we could see the sky line of Singapore and even the sea. Service is fast and efficient. No question if you need anything. They just deliver. The pool and gym are pretty normal. The staff are very courteous, friendly and fun. Will definitely come back again but only 1 point to note that if you are driving, need to top your cash card at least $20 per night parking. The rest is simply awesome. Must try their steak at the top.

title: Stay
desc: Our Room were not exactly sound proofed and we had issue sleeping well this time round (especially morning). The pillows might be too soft. customer service was good but check in took abit longer than expected.

title: Nice view
desc: The suite was spacious and had a nice view. Toilet was nice with a a nice bbathtub.Room service could be a little fast. Overall am pleased with the experience and would like to visit again if there is a chance.

title: Good hotel in downtown area
desc: Good and modern hotel but lack of the Wow factor. Pleasant food but jams and afternoon tea food need to be covered to prevent airborne contaminant. Gym and pool available upon booking. The need for staff image training to portray international standards. e.g. posture, uniform, etc. It's a 5 star hotel after all. Down pillows need to be sun to remove tobacco smell (allergy prone guest). Overall good experience.

title: Birthday staycay
desc: The best hotel i have been to and the view was just so amazing. I booked a suite for the experience and it exceeded my expectations by tenfold. To be honest i wish i booked it dfor 3days 2 nights instead but loved every single moment there.

title: Girls‚Äô Suite Getaway
desc: Came here for a short girls‚Äô trip and it was a great choice. We had topped up for a suite and it was absolutely worth it. Big thank you to Izzat for helping to arrange everything for us! The suite was very spacious and clean with modern furnishings. There was an amazing sofa area for lounging with sky high views, and also a great place to have breakfast in the morning. What better way to start the day? The bathroom was also a dream with so much space which is a luxury nowadays. Thank you to the team at Andaz!

title: Personal Staycation
desc: Staffs are very attentive, food was great a spread with many choices, however, do hope the in room slippers to be change to disposable instead for hygiene purpose. The pillows should be more firm as well.

title: Amazing birthday staycation
desc: The city room view was very clean and well maintained. Check in was easy although I paid additional s$45 +++ for city view. The staff surprised me with a birthday cake and card. The staff at Mr stork also gave me a birthday cake and our table had a beautiful spot for sunset watching. I really appreciate it. Booking for pool and gym via the link emailed to me 3 days before check in was very easy to use. The staff also granted our request for additional toiletries after our swim at night. The staff also provided our wine glasses, plates and utensils. The staff also heat up (microwave) our take away food. Breakfast at alley 25 was so good. Chinese noodle soup and kaya toast are excellent. I absolutely enjoyed my stay here. I will come back and will recommend it to my friends.

title: Staycaytion Review
desc: Having patronized many hotels during the pandemic period, it is safe to say that Andaz has impressed me the most in terms of service and amenities. Planning for a birthday celebration, kudos to the team for accomodating to my many pre check-in requests. The thing that really impressed me at Andaz was the food. I daresay it is one of the best food a hotel has to offer, having a vast travelling experience. To top it off, Miss Audrey Silvaraj displayed excellent profesionnalism which made my afternoon tea very memorable. If I had to be extremely critical, the pillows were slightly uncomfortable but still manageable. Will definitely revisit and looking forward to my next stay at Andaz!

title: Is this a 5-star hotel? Doubtful abt that!
desc: This is not bragging but travelling to other parts of the world have totally exposed my family & I to excellent hotel experiences. All these years, we have been pampered & thus, expected nothing less from a Singapore hotel. As our house is undergoing minor renovation works, we have selected Andaz due to its proximity to many halal eateries (my helper's dietary requirement). However, upon our check-in yesterday night, we were too dumbfounded by the state of the rooms. Is this the experience promised by a hotel that was stated as a 5 star on Hyatt website? This is as bad as the Hyatt Regency Casablanca (another nightmare). Rooms smell musty / horrible, not sure whether it comes from the carpet or something else. Quite surprised that the housekeeping team didn't notice it when

title: Great View, awesome staff, amazing view
desc: The rooms were clean, the staff were super friendly, the views great, the pool was comfortable, the food delicious, safe distancing was emphasied. I would definitely come back again for another stay :)

title: Room service
desc: Something to feedback is the room service take very long to reach us about 30 mins after we ask for plates, we finished eating the food. I hope that the next time i stay in Andaz again, this will improve.

title: Favourite hotel so far
desc: Second time booking Andaz for a staycation. Check-in and check-outs were busy as usual and we had to wait for some time but service was good. Rooms were clean and spacious, amenities stocked. A little unfortunate that the hdmi ports were a little wonky. Various food options nearby (Haji lane, Bugis, Lavender, Golden Shoe if you‚Äôre up for a little walk). Would come back again.

title: Best hotel in SG ever
desc: Andaz really blew my mind and after staying in a few hotels in Singapore I have to stay it‚Äôs really the best and my personal favourite. Nice and modern room, toilet, comfortable bed, free minibar, AWESOME ROOM SERVICE FOOD, friendly and warm staffs this place is just exceptional. Not to forget about the awesome location which already is a plus Point all by itself. Can‚Äôt wait to return to Andaz again!!!

title: Great View
desc: Clean, comfortable & spacious room, with great view & superb amenities. Check in ok - front desk was overwhelmed, nevertheless Scott checked me in without any hassle, gave good recommendation & gave a great surprise for my mother‚Äôs birthday. We are happy, hopeful to return next time.

title: AMAZING STAYCAYY
desc: Staff so amazing. Food delish. Service over the top. Rooms so clean and great. View amazing. Highly recommend. But overall its the service and staff that made our stay feels like a holiday. They are amazing people thank you!

title: Repeated stay
desc: Andaz has set the standard for my family. WE first stayed in Mar 21 to celebrate my son's 21st birthday. Last week, after all the stress at work, my daughter wanted to break away and have a staycation for her birthday. When looking for options, her standard was "ANDAZ" so we ended back here especially since they had a SIngapore Residents promotion. Works out well. ANDAZ staff are still consistently warm and friendly everywhere - from main lobby area, check-in, lift lobbies, restaurants, pool staff and even maintenance. Rooms are very clean and it is so conveniently located - totally accessible by the North-South and Downtown lines. Full of eating options around the area too. So looks like this will be our 2nd home in Singapore.

title: Service was great!
desc: The service received was great and staff was accommodating! The room and bathroom was clean too. View was not too bad and got a high floor. It was spacious and design of the room was aesthetically pleasing. Would recommend to others.

title: Another great hotel!
desc: Amazing service from Reservations team, Priscilla, to the Guest Services (Scott particularly) upon check-in. Room was not available for check-in when we were there but that is because hotel was running on full occupancy though. Anyway, Scott has been really helpful, warm and friendly and thank you to all the team for arranging the surprise birthday cake which was lovely (even though they mentioned they are sending up macaroons!). Highly recommended on their Studio Suite!

title: Cosy
desc: Enjoyed my stay there thoroughly. The break that I needed. Felt like I was at a home away from home. Everything was on point. One of the best hotel stays ever. I would definitely be back one day!!!!!!

title: Staycation
desc: Nice city view and surrounded by a lot of restaurants nearby. Room was very clean and provided good beverages. Good sound-proof room. Was served with welcome drinks while queuing for check-in. Overall very good service.

title: Amazing Suite Room
desc: Wonderful suite room with lovely views and on the highest floor. Love it so much! Assistant Manager Carmen Lim was very helpful and very friendly. I had a pleasant check in. I‚Äôm really enjoying my room! Room is so big and I get my bathtub to soak haha!

title: Staycay at Andaz
desc: Want to thank Andaz for the wonderful experience. From the check-in till check-out, every step was clearly explained and attended to with patience and clarity. Breakfast was amazing as well! Thank you once again Andaz! :)

title: Stay at Andaz Singapore
desc: Andaz is a very good hotel with spacious rooms. I stayed with my family in the Residential Suite and the suite has a living room and bedroom, thus providing a lot of space to move around. There is also a walk in closet, which allows us to keep our suitcases there and also hang all our clothes. The closet leads to a big bathroom. The room service was prompt and the people at the hotel were courteous. The only issue I had was with the breakfast. We had to book our breakfast slot in advance (due to Covid restrictions) and also indicate if there were any special requests. Since we are vegetarians, I had indicated this while doing the booking but when I went for breakfast, the staff there were not at all aware of my requirement. The menu for vegetarians was very limited (i.e.

title: I could rate 10 stars if I could!
desc: I want to particularly highlight the F&B team of this hotel -- this was what actually blew me and my husband away. In fact, a fine young man called Caleb made our staycation experience especially memorable. Caleb is someone who takes pride in his work and speaks about wine, albeit humbly, but filled with passion. Caleb checks on wine glasses before serving us, helps us with food recommendations, checks on us regularly throughout dinner, clears our plates promptly, goes over and beyond in terms of service. CALEB IS A GEM! We honestly haven't met such an awesome service staff in a long, long time. Other F&B service staff who impressed us with their service levels were Shawn, Horman, Maximillian and Bobby too (yes, we asked for their names so we could include them in this

title: Impressive Studio Suite Experience but...
desc: GOOD: Spacious suite. Well thought-out room layout. High quality bathroom toiletries. Friendly staff. Amazing location with nearby malls, restaurants and amenities. NOT SO GOOD: (Potentially) Itchy Bed, maybe not cleaned thoroughly? Rougher bedsheets than expected.

title: FAVOURITE HOTEL ON MY STAYK LIST
desc: It was my second time staycation in Andaz hotel. Excellent service as usual. Staffs are friendly and helpful even part-timer (they were here for school holiday? career posting??) Well equipped gym for my routine workout Swimming pool probably was the only place to be improved during my stay in term of visibility of the pool. Overall good experience. Will definitely recommend to my friends!

title: Slow check in and disgruntled staff
desc: The check in process and check out were marred by unclear queue lines and interns working at the hotel. They were clearly inexperienced to handle guests. Car rack is available, but not complimentary, this was not communicated to us upon check-in. On one occasion, I was stuck in the gym. The door did not open when I depressed the exit key and even when I used the house hone in the gym to call for help, however, no one answered the call. Thankfully,I had mobile reception hence, I asked my wife who was in the room to call for assistance to get me out from the gym. When I asked upon my checkout what was the issue, the manager on duty did not bother to acknowledge this issue. There are also other issues with the property as well.

title: Wonderful stay at Andaz
desc: It is my first time staying at Andaz. We had a wonderful stay! Overall the hotel was great and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The package comes with complimentary mini bar and high tea package. It is very worth it. The breakfast was great and very nice. Highly recommended and we will definitely come again ~

title: Poor experience twice
desc: Stayed twice at Andaz. The first time, was during Heightened alert so there was many restrictions like no dining out due to government COVID regulations. The second time we stayed was in Sep 2021 when dining out was allowed and facilities like the gym was allowed to opened. However, both times, the Changing room is still closed. We still have not experienced what that was about. Is it a Spa? There is also no shower facilities except in the room after going to the pool. Room design is quite good. No major problems for that. Being a 5 stars hotel, other than the rooms, common spaces is very tight everywhere and there is always a queue somewhere. Feels stressful just queuing during checkin, breakfast, lift lobbies, pool and gym. Why no staggered check in times? Pool is very

title: Most pleasant stay
desc: Just one night but a very pleasant one from a brisk checkin to happiness of stay including breakfast, dining voucher, free first round of goodies from the mini bar. Centrally located. Got a high floor room which was clean & bright, with a good view.

title: Relaxing birthday staycation
desc: We booked a room at Andaz Singapore for a birthday staycation and the experience was great! The hotel staff were friendly, helpful and experienced as our check-in & out process went very smoothly. The room was well-decorated with relatively new facilities and a huge bed! The hotel gave a little birthday token which made us feel cared for! Breakfast spread & quality of service staff were good. Unfortunately we did not managed to use the pool & gym facilities as it was fully booked.

title: Best Staycation ever!
desc: Booked Andaz for my birthday staycation and what a great stay I had! Staffs were responsive and attentive from pre-check in emails all the way till the end of my stay. Requested for a room with a high floor and early check in, and got both requests fulfilled despite being the sep school holidays. Ms Melissa kindly arranged a room with partial view of Marina Bay on level 35 for us! The view was spectacular! Hotel amenities are new and modern. Highly recommended! Will definitely revisit once the hotel renovations are completed!

title: ANDAZ Singapore
desc: We had our wedding at Andaz recently and from the moment we stepped in till checking out, everything was beyond our expectations and we truly enjoyed our time there! Food was great with the number of varieties no matter the time of the day. Rooms were spacious, clean and very comfortable! Service from the hotel was also very attentive and we were pampered all the way. HIGHLY HIGHLY recommend ANDAZ Singapore for your holiday/ special occasions or even just dining there!

title: Received true ‚Äòfive-star‚Äôservice
desc: If you don't mind the smell in the room and the arrogant attitude of the customer service staff, you can choose to stay I never thought the service at Hotel was like this.This is the worst travel experience in my life

title: Very rude staff
desc: Room was spacious, view was great. One terribly rude staff member completely stained our experience and ruined our only Saturday night. We went up to have a look at the view on the 39th floor and were met by nothing but rudeness and we were essentially dismissed by the staff member. It absolutely ruined our night and our stay at Andaz.

title: Once a place of memories and happiness, but now a place that can only be considered a venue.
desc: Did a proposal at Andaz because we loved it the 1st time we stayed. The management team knew i was going to propose, and what i felt was that all they wanted was me to pay for an upgrade to a suite. Actual day of checking in and executing my proposal, there was nothing that Andaz did that made us feel like ‚Äúwow Andaz is so generous/helpful/happy for us‚Äù. It only felt like Andaz was just a ‚Äòvenue‚Äô and not a celebratory place that genuinely are happy for any of its guests‚Äô events. No congratulatory gifts/drinks/or any sort of service. I expected more when paying $700-$800 for a night for a small room with nothing special in store for us. Not even a complimentary breakfast as congratulations. Once a place of memories and happiness, but now a place that we will only remember as a

title: Exceptional Service
desc: Truly an excellent hotel! Service was impeccable, rooms were very luxurious. Really enjoyed my stay and I do have to give massive credits to the staff. Every single one I met was exceptionally. Check in and check out was such a breeze. Would 100% be back!

title: Excellent stay in Singapore
desc: Great hotel close to the track for the GP. Great views from the pool and rooftop bar and within walking distance. Comfortable modern rooms and a fridge with a range of beverages, weird only 1 beer and not 2 for each person in the room

title: Definitely worth every penny
desc: I enjoyed every bit of amenity this hotel has to provide. I also liked every freebie that they gave. Overall, the experience made me feel I was at home resting combined with a certain level of luxury that I needed to get my mind off the stress from work.

title: F1 GP
desc: Highly recommend this hotel. The location is great walking distance to a lot of facilities. Very clean and hospitable, staff extremely helpful nothing is too much trouble. Mr Stork roof top bar at the hotel is a must visit.

title: Two nights in Heaven
desc: We arrived at the "Andaz Hyatt at 9am in the morning after a very turbulent ,sleepless overnight international flight. Th front desk staff could see we were pretty exhausted. We were prepared to sleep in the lobby until our room was ready. Alas, they immediately gave us a "Day room" free of charge to catch up on our sleep. And we did.Thank you. They contacted us at 3pm ",you're room is ready." We had a shower and went over to Bugis Mall for something to eat. The whole staff are so caring, diligent and attentive. The room had a great view of the harbor. The room itself, Calming and a nice mini fridge with free daily snacks and drinks. The Big bed was super comfortable,the shower and bathroom were perfect. Housekeeping were brilliant and the room was spotless after their daily

title: great stay
desc: pool was lovely. front desk staff so polite, helpful, welcoming. they answered all the questions (promptly!) we have even before arrival. Crib was ready in our room. Offered to heat up/deliver our leftovers even at 3am for a few nights...they always make sure all our requests are attended to during our 1+ week stay with them

title: uperb Location and Infinity Pool with Singapore Skyline
desc: Had a pleasant stay at Andaz Singapore. The location is superb, with direct tunnels connecting to MRT Bugis Station, making it convenient to travel without worrying about the outdoor weather. The view from the pool was stunning, with a view of the Singapore skyline. The hotel staff were attentive and friendly.

title: Fantastic Staycay
desc: Had a great staycay in Andaz. Room had a great view and is sparkly clean. It was very spacious too and everything was neat and tidy. The breakfast selection was one of the best we had on a staycay with good service from the staff.

title: Great Place
desc: Top of the Line Hotel, nice athmosphere, beautiful pool area with a great view, great rooms, friendly helpful staff, outstanding breakfast. Quiet and very nice designed rooms. I can recommend the place.

title: Friendly staffs and nice service
desc: I'm glad I chose Andaz Singapore for celebrating our anniversary! Everyone was so friendly and very accommodating. Especially, Hidayah, Georgina, Dayah, Eliza and farly were so nice to make some special arrangements for us and let us start the trip lovely with a beautiful cake and some nice tea in our room. The room was spacious and clean at all times! It's really close to everywhere you go in the city and we walked from Marina Bay Sands to the hotel once in the night and it was great with some breeze:) The lounge on 25th floor was a gem. We got to rest in the lounge every night having a coffee with some snacks. I'm surprised it is for everyone staying in the hotel. There was a little bummer during check-in but I forgot about it totally! I will definitely come back here for the

title: Andaz Singapore Stay
desc: What a pleasant stay while attending the Rapiscan Sales Conference. A good location and facility is very good. Prime location with easy access to the halal area. Definitely will again stay in this great hotel

title: good service
desc: good service, The staff is very friendly and enthusiastic.Breakfast is delicious and has many dishes to choose from.Room is clean and quiet. However, the swimming pool is right at the check-in area, so when using the pool, to pass many people, which is a bit inconvenient.

title: Not Value for money and poor service
desc: The room was not up to expectations and table was stained. They promised an update but had room that was normal. Seaview want not exactly Seaview that you paid for. Front office at check in was long wait with only one staff at 1230pm.

title: Great Location
desc: Excellent hotel in a great location. Taxi prices were cheap from and to airport. MRT is connected to the hotel which is another option to the airport if you have minimal luggage. All staff were friendly and helpful. Room was great and the bed was so comfortable. Would definitely stay here again. Thank You for the great experience.

title: Central location and excellent stay
desc: I was recognized and thanked for my Hyatt loyalty. Central location with Bugis MRT right below the hotel. You can take the MRT from Changi airport to hotel. There is a room to the left of check in area where drinks and snacks are available throughout the day. Extensive buffet breakfast of Western and Asian spread in three different rooms in "Alley on 25". Very helpful front desk staff available to answer all questions. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Amazing service. WONDERFUL STAFF!
desc: Everything was good. From the views from the rooms to the service of the Andaz staff. We misplaced 2 important glasses and Andaz staff was helpful and swift to locate and retrieve the glasses for us. Proactive and welcoming staffs. The rooms were clean and well designed as well.

title: Lunch at 5on25
desc: I was impressed on Shawn outstanding customer. I was dining at 5on25, my blouse‚Äôs button dropped. It was an awkward situation. Shawn got me a safety pin, saving me from embarrassment. I did not expect a restaurant to have a safety pin, but Shawn miraculously did it.

title: Great experience
desc: There is Loudge free drink and snacks if your room hasn't ready yet. Staff expedite my Room request as I am preparing for proposal. Salute to the teams! It was an amazing experience staying in Andaz. Would definitely recommend my friends and family.

title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: This hotel is absolutely amazing. The property is gorgeous and immaculately maintained. What make so special is the world class service they provide. Every imaginable detail is properly looked after. The rooftop pool is stunning the food world class. A big congratulations to the GM Stepahan who ensured my family had the best stay possible. Thanks to Gab and Harmon two folks that truly made our stay world class. My only regret is we didn't get to stay longer.

title: Very good experience
desc: Traveled for work in Singapore, Andaz hotel was great in all aspects, the morning breakfast was very good, and even the in-room dinner I ordered was great. The rooms are very clean, all equipped and this gave me a great stay

title: Great location and perfect room
desc: Really loved this hotel! 10/10. Location is great, connected to the MRT, near lots of shops and restaurants, and in the centre more generally. Very cheap to get a taxi anywhere else. The room was incredible. It was spacious, had lots of light and was well thought out. A particular favourite feature was the filtered water tap! Everything was easy to use, from lighting to AC. Breakfast had a good selection, including coffees made to order and the omelette station. Service was quick if you were in a rush. The hotel also provides access to the Virgin Active gym based underneath it, and has a free drinks hour from 5:30pm to 6:30pm. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

title: Perfect stay in Singapore :)
desc: Our stay was perfect! The hotel is modern and cozy like like all Andaz hotel standards. The highlights of our stay were the location of the hotel which was certo close to the subway station and the breakfast which was amazing! A mixture of european and asian breakfast with lots of food stations to choose from.

title: Extremely untrained concierge team
desc: 3 rooms were made under two reservations as Hyatt's policy does not allow one booking have 3 rooms. I arrived the hotel one day early (on points) and upon checking with the concierge team regarding the Hyatt Prive benefits at approximately 6.20-6.40pm (24 Aug 2023), the agent Mica was extremely uninformed about the Hyatt Prive benefits. She informed me ‚Äúas all 3 rooms I booked are all under your name, you and your guests will only have $100 USD credit across the 3 rooms under Hyatt Prive benefits, not $100USD per room‚Äù. I immediately reached out to my prive agent regarding this who informed me it is 100 USD per room. I then passed on the information to the agent who was rather offensively impolite and bad-mannered and have demanded written email record confirming this. I have

title: Very good stay
desc: Andaz Singapore has a great location and very nice facilities; staff is very helpful and friendly. Restaurants as well as rooftop bar are impressive. I strongly recommend Andaz Singapore for trips to Singapore

title: Amazing stay at Andaz
desc: Everything was amazing incouding the staffs thats always ready to greet with a smile. Check in was smooth. The guy who assisted me with the check in has a great and humble attitude. There was a rude guest before me and I saw that he handled professionally and still have a smiley face.

title: The best hotel to be in Singapore for so many reasons & advantages
desc: An amazing hotel in great location in central Singapore. Rooms are large, very beautifully decorated, with top facilities . The view is amazing . Quiet and tranquill. The stuff were very friendly and useful. As it written in the hotel slogan " you come as a tourist tou live as local. Spending 12 night in Andaz , i did fell at home. Definitely will be back there

title: An amazing hotel with excellent services!
desc: Andaz Singapore ensured we had the most luxurious and comfortable stay. The promptness of staff was amazing and the daily breakfast buffet had limited yet tasty Indian breakfast options. Would highly recommend!

title: Excellent hotel and location
desc: We really enjoyed this hotel and its location. Walking distance to many places of interest and shops and the MRT is below the hotel. The hotel style, cleanliness and location was excellent. Staff were very helpful and always polite

title: Disappointing experience
desc: Have to say i expected more for a five star hotel at this price point. Having been to many other five star hotels in this area, our experience at Andaz today has been disappointing and did not live up to our expectations. None of my requests for my husband‚Äôs birthday were honoured although I made this booking almost two months ago‚Ä¶ after I called guest services to leave feedback, two boxes of macarons addressed to ‚ÄúMr XX (my name)‚Äù were sent up. I‚Äôm a Ms..and we don‚Äôt like macarons :( not even a happy birthday from any of the staff or any personalised note. Room is also not up to standards.. the ‚ÄúBay view‚Äù is blocked and there is no smart TV. Called to request for assistance with the TV but it‚Äôs been half an hour and no one has arrived. Experience pales in comparison even to Pan

title: Housekeeping & staff service is good
desc: Check in process is quite slow, needs improvement, but overall, staff service is very good. Housekeeping is also very good. No mineral water bottles provided, but there is filtered water "tap" and an empty bottle for customers. There is a lounge (sunroom) that have complimentary drinks (coffee and cold drinks) and snacks. Swimming pool is quite big and same floor as lobby. Gym is 24hr access. Overall stay is good.

title: 4 star hotel
desc: Service level is far behind other 5. Star hotels, such as Ritz Carlton and Raffles. Room- Newly renovated MBS rooms are much better. I requested birthday cake on booking. But this was not confirmed in advance and on checkin this was not mentioned. The result was not birthday cake but 4 pcs macarons even though I asked them I would pay. Lounge with complimentary drinks and snacks is great.

title: Excellent Hotel in Singapore
desc: Great location on top of the MRT. Spacious rooms, mini bar included and free all day snacks. Open rooftop pool and great rooftop bar (Mr Stork). Floor to ceiling windows make the rooms light and airy.

title: Bad staff attitude
desc: The hotel and amenities are great. The biggest downside is the attitude of the staff. They are never interested in helping. You go for breakfast and it takes them a long time to find you a table. Then they don‚Äôt deliver cutlery to the table. If you ask for a coffee, you‚Äôd be lucky if it shows up on time. You call the front desk for something - 50% chance they will not even pick your call. Did not see anyone smiling for the 3-4 days we stayed at the hotel Overall, not value for money.

title: Found my go-to hotel in SG
desc: Absolute top-notch! They even provided a surprise birthday cake in our room. I'm also recommending the rooftop bar, which we tried on our final night. We didn't have reservations, but they were able to squeeze us in. The location is perfect if you want take the train. It's close to everything.

title: Sufficient, but was expecting better
desc: My family and I had been eager to stay at this Andaz for some time. When we finally made it back to Singapore, we stayed for 2 nights. Booked a regular double bed room, but I think we were upgraded to a heritage view room. Check in was relatively easy and on the 25th floor. The sun room with complimentary snacks and drinks was great. We got some free alcoholic drinks during the specified afternoon hour but for some reason the service and time to get something was very spotty. And yes the first night we stayed, there were 2 false fire alarms which were never mentioned. The room, lobby, decor were great, and as expected for a modern chain like Andaz. The room layout and design was very nice, really liked the powder room and ability to close off the sleeping area. The dotted

title: Worst Experience Ever
desc: I was expecting more than this. Check-in Process was terrible. There was no explanation for queuing and check-in personnel was so unhelpful. He did not explained anything about hotel's service, even I questioned the answer was terrible. The room condition was no in a good shape. It has stains on the table and never fixed and floor looks uncleaned. They never explained or give information about hotel's other enjoyable facility.

title: A Luxurious Haven in Singapore with Exceptional Service
desc: My family's stay at Andaz Singapore Hotel left me utterly impressed and rejuvenated. From the moment we checked in until the time of our departure, the experience was nothing short of exceptional. Upon entering the hotel, we were greeted with warm smiles and a sense of genuine hospitality that set the tone for the entire stay. The check-in process was swift and efficient, and we were thrilled to find that the room exceeded our expectations. This was at 2AM since my flight via Singapore Airlines landed around 12AM. The spaciousness of the room was a pleasant surprise, providing ample space for us to move around comfortably. The room itself was tastefully designed, blending modern aesthetics with a touch of local charm. The attention to detail was evident, and every element

title: Endless Breakfast and a Lounge with a Relaxing Vibe
desc: Another very enjoyable stay. Andaz hotels are medium sized, but cultivate a trendy, ‚Äúboutique‚Äù atmosphere. At check in, Gab recognised my name - which is always nice. We were upgraded to a bigger, sea facing room with a super king sized bed - thank you. Gab gave us a couple of drinks vouchers and we used these for evening cocktails in the Sun Room. The rhubarb gin was pleasingly sour. The Roku G&T had a zing and was decorated in a kad≈ç manner. Joselyne gave cheerful advice and charming service. The music is carefully curated. Breakfast was a buffet combined with endless √† la carte - as now seems to be the fashion. Jonas gave the service a gentle controlling touch. After eating we retired to the Sun Room for morning coffee and nibbles - including Midget Gems which

title: Exceptional Stay in Andaz
desc: Andaz by Hyatt has more amenities than many other 5-star hotels I have been into. They have a free snack bar in the room which is replenished everyday. And they also have a lounge at the 25th that is open to all hotel guests, with free snacks. Location is also strategic. Just below the hotel is the Bugis MRT station. The hotel is just 5 minutes walk to Little India, Haji Lane, etc.

title: Do not park - Expensive
desc: Does not help when it comes to complimentary parking. Staff will simply shrug it off and not provide a proper explanation or even try to waive off the first night of parking. Simply stated that it is just because they share the parking space with DUO residences. Might be the only 5 star hotel in Singapore without complimentary parking. Otherwise the rest of the stay was good. But that really left a sour taste

title: Great hotel, so close to everything!
desc: The MRT and the mall was only walking distance away, making it such a convenient location. The staff was amazing and helpful, and the rooms were very nice also. I highly recommend Andaz for your stay, whether it‚Äôs for yourself, your family, and/or your significant other

title: Nice hotel with great location
desc: The hotel is in a prime location with spacious and clean room. Nice infinity pool and free minibar. Almost perfect on the infrastructure part, however, not so much on the services part. You do feel the lack of services during check in and on the phone for in room dining. On a side note, they did not recognise globalist status and the best available room was not provided during check in. Checked the sea view room was available in app but staff claimed it wasn‚Äôt.

title: ANdAZ stay
desc: Great hotel, certainly my favourite in Singapore. Rooms are excellent and extremely well laid out. For those that select the breakfast option, the choice is really excellent. It's not cheap but then nothing in Singapore is!

title: Andaz Sing
desc: my second visit to this wonderful hotel - room was spacious with great view and everything clean and in working order with very helpful staff in all areas; rooftop bar a must; very well equiped gym and pool; excellent location above MTR;

title: A wonderful stay - great service
desc: I stayed at Andaz Singapore with my VIPs this trip - one of the most enjoyable stays I've had in Singapore. The location was great - we were able to find some restaurants/ dessert places that opened at 2/3 am. The hotel also was very accommodating to my VIPs and me which we really appreciate. Despite the incident of the false fire alarm one of the nights - the hotel tried its best to handle the situation and explained the situation thoroughly. The rooms are very spacious, the design is modern and the hotel is very environmentally friendly. I loved the lounge on the 25th floor (lobby) - the Pandan lemon tea was definitely my favorite. The breakfast had a range of selections. I also had dinner at one of their outlets and the dessert was amazing - I believe its the cheesecake with

title: False Fire Alarm in the Middle of the Night Twice
desc: The false fire alarm went on twice in the middle of the night twice during our two nights stay. No staff mention/address anything about it when we check out. This really put a stain on our overall experience during our short stay. Staffs are overall ok, we had experience staying at similar rank hotel Sofitel City Center, the rooms for the same price are much more roomy and the staffs are much more attentive and friendly.

title: Worth while staycation
desc: The entire staycation can be described in one word. Amazing. The view of the city view room was amazing both in the day and at night. The food at 665 was also above expectation. The staff went above and beyond to satisfy any requests as well. Would gladly stay again.

title: Very nice property with excellent food and terrible customer service.
desc: Big problem at checkout. Called to reserve help with luggage 1 hr ahead. Never arrived. Called again and was told "he is on his way up in the elevator", Called 5 more times at 10 minute intervals. Same lie each time. Had to pack and haul luggage and almost missed flight. Otherwise excellent location. Excellent breakfast. Easy access to subway through basement with access to anywhere in Singapore. Rooms clean and staff generally very friendly.

title: Had a great stay!
desc: High tech room. Equipped with filtered water which is so convenient. Room and bed is big with separate toilet/bathroom. Enjoyed complimentary refreshments at Sunroom. Only con - Breakfast was a little disappointing.

title: Great location
desc: Short walk to bugis junction/st, Arab st, haji lane and sultan mosque. Room was adequate. Service was a little lack lustered compared to all the other hotels we‚Äôve stayed at during our 3 week trip across Asia.

title: A Fresh Stay
desc: The hotel feels very young and modern with alot of sustainability initiatives which is great. The only downside is that it costs more than it feels worth. Location is good and just 2 stations away from the city and MBS.

title: Clean nice location. Easy to walk around. Staff very helpful. Bit longer to get all floor together for us. Manageable.
desc: Nice location. Very good staff. Hotel was clean. We can move around Singapore easier. Convenient to use transportation but very healthy just walking. As Muslim very nearby masjid sultan was really good historical place for visit.

title: Excellent hotel overall although check in was fairly slow
desc: 5 star experience overall rooms nice , friendly staff, super nice breakfast with wide variety (especially proteins like salmon, chicken etc) but check-in was very slow (long queue, inefficient, about 1 hour delay from the 3pm normal time) - maybe it was weekends

title: Clean hotel, subpar service
desc: Clean room. Modern style, great location and nice amenities. However, customer service is lacking. TV in room was not working but nothing was done to resolve the matter. The hotel sent some technicians to check on the TV but nothing was done to follow-up.

title: Stay here, it‚Äôs a wonderful hotel
desc: This hotel is amazing. Stay here. I booked 4 nights and arrived to find they had upgraded me to a sea view room. The room was beautiful. Huge bed, comfortable linens, amazing design, fabulous ensuite, lovely lighting, floor to ceiling windows, wonderful view, great pool and gardens, very central location and staff who go above and beyond. Stay here, it‚Äôs worth it.

title: For a 5 star hotel, our experience was pretty average
desc: For a 5 star hotel with really expensive room rates, we honestly expected a lot more from Andaz. Room and amenities were great, but the service was really slow. The phone hotlines were really hard to reach, we had to call multiple times for someone to pick up and reaction time to our requests were also really bad. Sleep quality was not great for us as the pillows were extremely soft. Breakfast spread was also disappointing and not as great as other hotels. Nonetheless, would commend on the room service food as everything we ordered were delicious.

title: Andaz stay
desc: Stayed at Andaz during June,23 with family‚Ä¶Next to Bugis Street market and Bugis MRT. Very well managed hotel with a Andaz and class of its own. Rooms were spacious and clean. Reasonably priced for a five star. The hand spray in toilet will be welcomed by any Indian guest. Overall an excellent stay and certainly recommend to anyone.

title: Not impressed with their Staff. Good location with a view!
desc: Location of this hotel was great! Lots of places, shops, restaurants to go to in the vicinity. The only thing I didn‚Äôt understand was the system in which you booked. There was always a long queue. Granting that I am aware of the season being at the peak when I was there, it shouldn‚Äôt take more than half an hour to check in. Also, when my card key didn‚Äôt work the following morning on the elevator going to my room, they wanted me to wait on the long queue just to make my card get activated when I‚Äôm already checked in as a guest! I didn‚Äôt understand where‚Äôs the logic to this! Either everyone in the front desk is just on autopilot or just plain lack of consideration! I expressed my thoughts on this and they gave me a bag of some stuff as a consolation which I truly didn‚Äôt need nor

title: Long weekend stay
desc: Hotel is comfortable and upscale. Room amenity is as expected. The best thing about this hotel is the location. Within walking distance to station, shopping mall, food court, market and tourist attractions.

title: The perfect base for a Singapore stay!
desc: Andaz Singapore was the perfect place to stay! The room was large, clean and modern with a spacious bathroom, separate toilet, and walk in wardrobe. The beds were comfortable and the climate control air-conditioning allowed us to adjust the room to suit our own preference. The observation deck, bar and infinity pool were all nice areas to relax after exploring Singapore. All staff were very polite and helpful to ensure we had an enjoyable stay. The hotel is a short 20-minute drive from the airport, close to all that Singapore has to offer and is located directly above Bugis MRT station for easy access to the metro lines to travel around Singapore (note there was no noise from the MRT and the rooms were sound proofed well). I would definitely stay here again!

title: Would never Stay again
desc: They would deliberately give you absurd room and when you ask for change they demand money.they are mostly showing irresponsible behaviour and trying to give preferential treatment to white people.I am highly disappointed with this stay and I rather recommend not to stay here.Hospitality is never practiced here.

title: Love the service
desc: Great services! Beautiful hotel. Convenient location for shopping and food and public transportation. Loved the pool! We would definitely be back. They made us feel very welcomed. Great for single or families.

title: Andaz Singapore never disappoints
desc: I have stayed here over several yea Rs and this property and the management are always top notch. This time we lost our new iPhone in a city cab. Intan, the lobby concierge, tracked down the cab company and the driver and retrieved the phone. She was on the phone for several hours despite her busy schedule. It‚Äôs people like Intan that turn an otherwise great hotel into a fantastic hotel. Thank you Intan and the Andaz management.

title: Luxury and friendliness
desc: The Andaz property was beyond gorgeous, the views were breathtaking and the location was perfect. The height of the tower made for an incredible vantage point while enjoying a cocktail and beer at the rooftop bar, especially if you love appreciating skylines. The breakfast was incredible, the freshest juices, and foods with so much variety, and the staff! The staff was so lovely, kind, helpful, and just a breath of fresh, crisp air. It was so great. All of it.

title: Excellent stay at the Andaz Singapore, exceptional hospitality and service
desc: Stayed 3 nights at the Andaz Singapore. the room was exceptionally clean, quiet and appreciated the high floor afforded to me. Excellent facilities and was very well looked after at the restaurant. I would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone on holiday or business, in an ideal city location and treasure an exceptional 5 star service at a reasonable price. Look no further, Andaz should be on the top of your shortlist!

title: Subpar
desc: The hotel rooms are small and when you book a room for 3 people, they only give you two twin beds that only for one person each. No sofa bed. When I questioned the if the beds can fit all of us, the front desk person said yes. It does not. The service is professional but a bit cold and serious which is a stark difference to the great warm friendly service at all the hotels in Bali we just came from. The design is nice but boring big hotel chain decor. Nothing stands out. The hotel is generally very clean which is nice (though expected for a 5-star hotel. They charged $45++ per person for breakfast and they do this trick where they offer you a discounted $35 at check in. However, they don‚Äôt tell you it‚Äôs an offer only at check in so I said I will get back to them. When I

title: Great place to stay- excellent Service
desc: Wonderful place in excellent location. All central places are very easy to reach. MRT station direct in the Hotel area, accessible from the Hotel. Wonderful selection of breakfast specialities- pool is excellent - rooftop bar is breathtaking with excellent view over the city. Great place to be with very - very - customer oriented and friendly staff

title: Great Hotel in a Convenient Location!
desc: This is a very modern and elegant hotel that is directly connected to an MRT station and walking distance from many of the attractions in the Kampong Glam/Haji Lane area. The pool area is very relaxing with beautiful views. The only challenge was initially finding the entrance to the hotel in as there are multiple spaces in the building, but that was only when first arriving.

title: Friendly and helpful
desc: Everyone within the hotel is friendly and helpful. The hotel kindly allowed a 7 am check-in so that I could get some rest after a red-eye flight. Breakfast: Coffee served in a time manner is helpful when you only get 5 min for breakfast. Lemonade during the day is a plus!

title: Modern hotel nice views and service
desc: Modern hotel nice views and service. Centrally located. Easy access to nearby malls and places of interest like Arab Street. Nice breakfast with good spread. Attentive staff at breakfast. Nice whole city view at top of hotel.

title: Loved everything about this hotel!
desc: So impressed with this hotel - we were able to not only check in to but actually get in to our room at 8:45am (having been on a cruise that docked very early). Location was great, with an MRT station below the building and a small shopping mall (mainly food and drink shops) there too. Loved the complimentary snacks and drinks, flip-flops, water bottle and cold drinking water! Pool was awesome too, especially under water speakers!

title: Good location
desc: Location is near to MRT but there is no complimentary parking. Room is clean even though it cannot be released after 3pm. Breakfast is acceptable and given discount for it. There is free refreshment upon check in.

title: Andaz Singapore is Extraordinary! A must when visiting Singapore.
desc: I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Andaz Singapore and I must say, it was an extraordinary experience from start to finish. The moment I stepped into the Andaz Singapore, I was immediately captivated by its stunning design. The contemporary architecture seamlessly blends with the local culture, creating a unique and vibrant atmosphere. The attention to detail is impeccable, and every corner of the hotel exudes a sense of modern elegance. From the chic furnishings to the thoughtfully curated artwork, the interior design is a true masterpiece. Every aspect of the hotel's design reflects a perfect fusion of style and sophistication. Furthermore, the location of Andaz Singapore is truly unbeatable. Nestled in the vibrant Bugis neighborhood, the hotel is surrounded by

title: Excellent buisness hotel
desc: Andaz is an excellent business hotel for people not in a holiday mood and good for a night or 2. Location is kind of ok as you are not at a walking distance from anything. Personally it felt like an upgraded ibis or some motel.

title: Back at the Andaz after a few years away
desc: I had a lovely stay at the Andaz after a few years away due to lockdown, etc. The hotel rooms were still off a very good standard. The staff were plentiful, friendly and service was excellent. Gym and pool facilities are always good at this hotel.

title: Very nice room and service
desc: The room is very nice, clean, love the layout of the room. Very sustainable hotel. Staff service is at par. Refreshment is very nice through out the day. Good to sit and relax they‚Äôre not suitable for working. Must try.

title: Close to perfect
desc: The hotel is really good. I was positively surprised. Unfortunately I did not have the opportunity to use the pool, but it's view is amazing, with convenient bath robes and towels available there. Just the restaurant options and in room dining were underwhelming. Very limited menus and opening hours not convenient enough. The in room dining service however is really fast and efficient.

title: Luxury
desc: I read the reviews beforehand and had my expectations set. The staff were very helpful beforehand as I emailed them with many questions. The staff at check in were very nice and helpful. There's concierge at the 2nd floor where you enter. They will always help as will the bellman at the door.
