The lounge is very nice, there are only a few snacks and they change but the snacks are very authentic Singapore. They also had TWG tea. Try the Singaporean breakfast tea. The pool was nice, a bit small. It is strange walking through the 25th floor in your swimsuit as people are checking in. As a Globalist I used my points and it was well worth it. I got a suite upgrade using my certificate. Otherwise, I don't think I wouldn't gotten an upgrade. The King Suite was huge and the

title: Especially breakfast
desc: Had an excellent stay. Great location for train to conference centre and to all the main places you want to get to. Good roof bar. Pool pretty good. Breakfast was excellent choice, quality and service. Rooms well appointed and roomy. A tip: they don‚Äôt tell you about not changing your bedding for 3 days unless you ask for it. Do that when you check in. Not only did they not change the bedding (which I didn‚Äôt mind) but they didn‚Äôt make the bed. Immediately rectified once informed. It‚Äôs an Andaz thing. Happened to me on LA too. Still a great stay though.

title: Very nice stay
desc: I ended up having a very nice stay here. Next time I'm in Singapore, I'll stay here again. Two thumbs up from this Globalist. 1) I was in an Andaz Residence Suite. It was a nice room, especially the bedroom room part which had beautiful views. The bathroom was well designed and large. The suite itself was stocked with tea and great popcorn. I'm a huge tea drinker, and it was great having so much TWG tea to drink everyday. There aren't, however, many suites so it might get difficult to get upgraded to one as a Globalist so set expectations. This is especially true as the Grand Hyatt is under renovation so the number of globalists is very high. Book what you want at this property. 2) the breakfast staff were great, with everyone knowing my name by day 2 and knowing my drink

title: Great Hotel to stay
desc: Nice service and hotel. Just walking distance to Halal food. The place also located near to Bugis MRT and just 2 stops to Marina Bay. So it is very convenience to go around with public transport. Definitely will come again!

title: Business Trip in Singapore
desc: Twin beds are small. Requested for large bed but was not accommodated. Same breakfast everyday. Gym is small. Pool opens between 8am to 10pm, could not do morning swim exercise or late night swim after whole day meetings and dinner. Staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms are big and quiet with auto blackout curtains. I think you can same rooms at better price. I even have to pay separate fees for breakfast, $30 per day. I thought already included in room rate.

title: Business trip
desc: I have stayed at Andaz hotels before but I think the Singapore hotel is my favorite. Loved my room, the service was great, and the breakfast buffet was really good with lots of choices. I would absolutely stay there again and would recommend to a friend for sure!

title: Amazing hotel
desc: From check in to check out, everything went well. Great views from the top floor. Wonderful service lots of staff, I really like the filtered water idea in the bathroom, so you didn‚Äôt have to use plastic bottles. I can‚Äôt wait to return,

title: Night at Andaz
desc: It was a spontaneous one-night stay at Andaz Singapore. The room was really great. Clean and neat, in addition to that the layout of the sofa and bed was well thought. ( I was staying at deluxe room overlooking the sea) The hotel location was accessible to MRT (Bugis) though getting there is still quite a distance if with huge bags. In all, id recommend the hotel.

title: Amazing location Amazing view Easy access
desc: we cant tell much more for this incredible stay at Andaz Singapore. The room was amazing with overlooking to the Marina bay on the 31st floor, i cant tell you more how happy I was when I stay with you. Thank you for the birth day cake upon check in, this really made me even happier. Thanks so much Andaz for making my short birthday cation memorable. The location is great as in the center of busiest city. Just 5 minutes walk to Bugis street, and MRT just down stairs, fantastic! I just cant describe more for this incredible hotel once again thank you Andaz, I'll be back again one day

title: Great business hotel for Sands conference center
desc: Modern hotel with excellent transport connections through subway to the Sands conference centre. I stayed 5 nights, ate breakfast in the hotel restaurant- good quality and varied, with continental or full English. We had a private dinner in 5 on 5, the food was of a very high quality and contained variations on local food. Lovely infinity pool with amazing views over the city.

title: Andaz Hotel Singapore
desc: All the service, location, foods is as expected from a luxury hotel. You sure will get as per what you pay for a high-end hotel. The hotel location is near to shopping mall and a lot of restaurants for variety of food option.

title: What an incredible stay
desc: state of the art condition, warm and beautifuldesign, great location, beautiful view, great food and beverage offering, and warm staff there to greet you :) ... enjoyed a 2 night stay and would definitely come back! you won't go wrong with Andaz!

title: When in Singapore.
desc: This was my first Andaz Experience. Andaz in Singapore is beautiful. I'm giving this a five star experience even though front desk did mess up my room situation. Upon check in on the app, I was upgraded to a sea view room but when I arrive they said it was only the heritage view room. I did screen shot it to let them know they were wrong. BTW, I am a Globalist. That's a big disappointment. I assumed they gave my room away. I didn't make a big deal put of it because I was just excited to be in Singapore again. Other than that, my stay was great, especially breakfast. The buffet breakfast was amazing. Laksa everyday please! They served good coffee and big variety from Western to Asian choices. The staff at breakfast remembered my friend and I, therefore every morning,

title: Great stay and fantastic location!
desc: The staff were very pleasant and upgraded my room upon request and with status. Hotel was clean and they constantly restocked the complimentary minibar. The location is great - you can take the elevator straight down to the MRT, and it‚Äôs very close to bus stops. The price is on par with other nice Singapore hotels.

title: Incredible Experience
desc: Andaz Singapore has quickly risen to my list of favorite hotels. Upon arrival in Singapore after 30 hours of travel at 8am, we were shown to the pool changing rooms where we could shower, freshen up, brush our teeth, etc. This was life changing after a long travel day. The room itself was stunning with views of Singapore, every amenity considered and prepared for. The rooms even had mood lighting. The shampoo/conditioner etc. smelled incredible. Beds were quite comfortable, and the room had blackout curtains for weary travelers sleeping during light hours. Breakfast was great - we ordered off the menu as the buffet was double the price. It was great food and service. The wifi for the hotel was strong and worked in our room, lobby, pool, and downstairs in the first floor of the

title: Wonderful hotel in Singapore, highly recommended!
desc: Amazing hotel, the room size is relatively big compare to other hotels in Singapore. The hotel is very clean and looks very new too. The design is a mixture of hints of Singapore tradition and modern elements. The bay view has been amazing, we spent lots of time looking out once woke up every morning. The reception area offers free drinks daily, with the heat of Singapore, those signature ice teas do chill the heat down. The location of the hotel has been great, just opposite Bugis Junction Shopping centre, and has direct access to the station of 2 main Metro lines as well. The hotel is also full of environmental concepts, they offer filtered tap drinking water instead of bottles water, and providing us a free bottle container to take out. Also, they offer a free nice

title: Motel service
desc: Stayed here early May 2023, very disappointed with this hotel. It looks clean and nice, but lacking customer service, workers just standing around, not greeting guests or being helpful. The AC unit is Definitely an issue, had two workers at the same time, trying to fix the issue, then told me that they have to come back another time for an hour, to try to fix this known issue. They never even offered me a different room. I checked into the hotel a long flight and was advised from front desk, no clean rooms available. I even offered to pay extras for whatever room is available. I explained to them that I‚Äôm exhausted due to the long flight, they acted like no urgency or understanding. So what you pay for is definitely not what you get here!

title: A lovely hotel away from the crowds
desc: My wife and I spent 5 nights at the Andaz Singapore on a stopover to the Maldives. I really enjoyed the location of this hotel. A lot of reviews talk about how it is "away" from stuff but with the public transit of Singapore, it isn't tough to get anywhere. I think a better description would be that this hotel is away from the crowds. We were torn between this and the Fullerton, but ended up having a lovely stay. The rooftop pool and hot tub are great. It can be a little tough to find for some individuals, but a train station in what is essentially the basement of the hotel is extremely convenient. The beds were comfortable and there is an extremely fancy bar right across the way to have a high end champagne flight. The breakfast here was better than I thought it would be, and

title: Super nice hotel bas staff
desc: Bar level check in staff is super rude. Lacking of information about restaurant open hours or bar, was keep informeing wrong times. Food close at 11pm however they don't let you order at 10.45. laundry service is horrible clothes come back dirty, there were days when took them almost 2 days. They also ruined clotes. The hotel looks amazing really good location and the room is amazing.

title: Mr Stork experience
desc: I loved the view from Mr Stork and the cocktails. The lights bulbs that flash near the lifts will tell you which lift is coming up or down. A fellow guest showed me this as i was confused initially. Would definitely visit again in the future.

title: Recent stay at Andaz Singapore
desc: Excellent breakfast buffet, spacious rooms (got two 2-Twin Beds with Heritage View room). Probably the best value-for-money hotel lounge I've visited (free flowing refreshments, coffee, tea, and light snacks). However, staff at reception and lobby did not feel all that welcoming or warm as I would expect in a 5-star hotel.

title: slipper provided is a good idea
desc: I like the slipper provided in the room which is more useful during talking shower; the tea and cookies tasted very good at floor 25th; the location is near to Marina Bay Sands and I took a 5km mooring outdoor round trip workout ...

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Staff amazingly friendly Thank you Margaret - guest experience manager for your knowledge on all things Singapore and Andaz Hotel amenities and room clean Bed comfortable but pillows flat to sleep on unfortunately like other hotels Close to all attractions and various shopping centres and places to eat Recommend to stay here and if returning to Singapore will be booking Andaz again

title: Poorly managed hotel
desc: Despite a few emails to inform them that we are staying for 4 nights, with 2 nights booked under my partner and 2 nights booked under me, they could not even get this correct. Check-in was a little messy due to their lacking. We checked in about 4pm and welcome amenities were not set-up in the room. Housekeeping did not set up our preferences for pillows and humidifier and only did so after we checked in. Embarrassing hole in bath towel. (See picture below) Laksa served with pak choy during breakfast is certainly a first for us. (See picture below) Requested housekeeping staff outside our room to send a new shopping paper bag (which they never replace for the entire stay) and was told to call housekeeping department ourselves‚Ä¶.wow‚Ä¶ Rude Chinese receptionist during

title: Connie
desc: I stoped in Singapore for a few days after my trip to Bali with friends. The hotel was clean, service was excellent. Everyone from front desk to restaurant staffs were courteous and efficient. Made my trip much more enjoyable!

title: Amazing team ‚Ä¶
desc: Great rooms - expansive breakfast - well made cocktails - amazing pool - and a management team that moves mountains for their guests in a tight spot with their travel arrangements. The rooms are excellent.

title: Best avoided
desc: The rooms and amenities are fine but the food not so much .The availability of food as well the preparations are not worth it . People suffering with food allergies , watch out , you are going to go hungry for the extent of your trip. I understood that I chose the wrong hotel the night I walked in but as it was a short stay I just went with it . You have better options for the charges levied .

title: Comfortable convenience
desc: I thoroughly enjoyed my time at this hotel. The room was comfortable and well-appointed (not to mention spacious). The location is great and walking distance to many restaurants, bars and shopping. The staff were helpful (although I did need to go to the lobby). I didn‚Äôt dine much at the hotel but enjoyed the cocktails at the rooftop bar which has great views of the city. My only recommendation would be for a better layout leading to the pool area. It‚Äôs odd that there is no separate / private way for pool guests to get to and from without walking through the restaurant and lobby area. Other than that - I highly recommend staying here.

title: Did not live up to expectations
desc: What went well 1. Location was ideal to access the MRT as it was sheltered to the EW line and DTL 2. Breakfast staff was friendly, helpful and responsive What could be improved 1. Stain on pillow case 2. Hot water was not working for the rain shower. 3. TV was down for software upgrade from 12am to 6am without communication before the stay

title: A nice hotel but with poor services
desc: The hotel cleanliness is very good, the rooms are clean and spacious. The breakfast is really good and the staff very responsive. The staff at the restaurant (lobby) was very kind and helpful. The check-in was long and you have to wait standing up. There was not enough staff at check-in. The location of the hotel is not great, unless you only use the metro. it is not very convenient. It will be great in the next 2 years when the constructions around will be done. For family it is easier to stay near Raffles city. In terms of service, the hotel is quiet impersonal. you don't feel like in a 5 star hotel. nothing bad but nothing great for the rate.

title: Thank you Andaz Singapore
desc: it is the best service for me during my Birthday trip at Andaz Singapore, they know my Birthday even though i did not mention during check in. A small Birthday cake setup during turn down service make your day are more memorable. Something small but make your stay is never forget

title: Just okay
desc: We really wanted to like this hotel, but after staying here a week, I would put the hotel at about "average". For the price we paid - about $250 US plus tax a night, you can probably find something better. Our first time at an "Andaz" and we had thought it was a higher end of the Hyatt hotels but it's definitely below what we would expect from a Grand Hyatt and it's slightly above a "Hyatt House" in the US which we were disappointed by (which we would not pay $250 plus tax for in the US). Pros - 1) In a good location with the MRT in the basement of the hotel (about 5 minutes walk) 2) Friendly check in 3) there is a snack bar area where you can sit and the snacks are complimentary for all guests but there's just coffee/teas and some cookies that you can get 4) Strong shower 5)

title: Probably highly overrated
desc: With hundreds of hotels to choose from our Hyatt Lifetime Global status had us stay at the ANDAZ in Singapore. A disappointment from arrival to departure. Perhaps we have been spoilt in many other Hyatt properties but this is a never to return to the ANDAZ trip. Having lived , worked and stayed in Singapore often I can‚Äôt imagine that with service levels similar to what we experienced will help this hotel rate much better than very average. I‚Äôm sure that with the attraction of Singapore, the volume of visitors and guests from around the region my comments won‚Äôt matter but I‚Äôm sure that we will vote with our feet and not return

title: Great place to hold a wedding
desc: We recently held our wedding at Andaz and the experience was worth every cent. Food was great, rooms were stunning. Very pleased with the choice of Andaz as a wedding venue. The event staff were also always very helpful with every request!

title: GOOD HOTEL BUT SERVICE IS AN ISSUE
desc: Well maintainace hotel, in a good condition but the service is not Hyatt standard. The booking app for corporate is confusing and there is no feedback or explanation given to guests even there was a request. When I requested something, it takes forever, I have to call and remind few times, seems like they ignored my requested

title: Excellent 5 star hotel
desc: Andaz was an excellent clean and very modern hotel and rates highly amongst the top end hotels. The rooms are very clean and modern. Whilst located a short distance from the central area it is close to Suntec City and a short walk (15 minutes) to Raffles. Taxis are easy to obtain and relatively inexpensive to other areas

title: Enjoyed my stay
desc: I booked Andaz because of it‚Äôs right above the MRT station and connected to the Bugis shopping area. I was impressed with the stylish room and the comfy bed. Will stay here if I visit Singapore again.

title: Great hotel to stay in Singapore
desc: I stayed at Andaz Singapore for three nights with my family. The staff at the lobby didn‚Äôt look like a staff as their uniform is a bit too causal. They look like high school students in school uniform. The size, colour and design of the uniform was so bad. It doesn‚Äôt match with the image of the hotel (my personal opinion). The check in process was quick. The room was clean but it was a bit smaller than I expected. They offered complimentary happy hour (once per stay). It would be better if it could be once per night. The breakfast was good with plenty of food selection. They even served satay and laksa. And the taste was great! The view of the pool was great, but it was surrounded by several rusty pillars. I belief those pillars were used for hanging the gondolas for

title: Highly recommend
desc: Our travel agent recommended that we stay at the Andaz. We were travelling as a family group, 3 couples(one elderly),2 teenagers and a 2 1/2 year old child. Extremely happy with the service we all received and made very welcome. Would highly recommend this hotel. The hotel and rooms were very modern and clean.The view from our sea view rooms were stunning.

title: Unbelievable City Stay
desc: Andaz is a fantastic modern hotel situated a short walk to the famous Marina Bay Sands and directly across from the bustling laneways of Kampong Glam. The hotel is clean with fantastic ammenities as well as a rooftop bar that offers spectacular views of the city. We stayed on a high level floor that looked directly out on to the adjacent Park View which provided us with some spectacular morning views.

title: Poor service. Don't expect a rollaway when it is confirmed
desc: Don't expect a rollaway when it is confirmed by the hotel. I had confirmed it with the hotel 7 months prior only to be told "sorry we don't have any rollaways left" when checking in. Only when pushed and showing 3 separate email correspondences confirming the rollaway did they reluctantly sort it out taking over an hour at the front desk. Not a great way to start a stay.

title: The Andaz - Singapore was absolutely stunning and gorgeous.
desc: If you‚Äôre even remotely considering to book Andaz - Singapore, just do it. The Andaz - Singapore was absolutely stunning and gorgeous. This was also one of the top hotels I‚Äôve ever stayed at, especially as far as the Andaz brand goes. The rooms, lobby, pool, community areas and staff were phenomenal. From start to finish, the staff was thorough, professional and more than accommodating at each interaction. The best way to describe it is that everyone exuded a sincere, genuine warmth well fitted for a luxurious hotel property without an ounce of uptightness. We felt right at home. As far as design goes, one can tell that were was an incredible amount of time and thought put into every single detail and decision. Everything was very thought out and I was a huge fan. From the

title: Three Night Stopover
desc: Excellent choice for a three night stopover on way back from New Zealand to UK. Very friendly, attentive and helpful staff. Very comfortable, spacious and well appointed room to a high level of luxury for a competitive price.

title: Wonderfully comfortable
desc: A great choice for a week's stay. The bed is generous and extremely comfortable, the amenities are contemporary, and the view is fantastic. I highly recommend taking advantage of the pool for dawn swim. I would stay again.

title: True 5 stars hotel
desc: A true 5 star hotel. I land in Singapore at 4am and get there at 6am. The front desk was nice to give me a temporary room for me to sleep. After 3pm, they call my call and notify me that the room is ready. Whether traveling for business or family trip, Andaz Singapore got you cover.

title: Excellent
desc: Loved the pool area and the free minibar and snack area. The mattress was superb for us, firm and very comfortable. The hotel is on top of two subway stations which makes it quick and easy to get around.

title: Andaz Singapore
desc: Fantastic hotel, great staff and our contemporary room on Level 28 was amazing. They have thought of everything there are even automated blinds that close themselves on a push of a button. Location fantastic right on a MRT station under ground so you can travel anywhere at anytime.

title: Beautiful hotel with subpar service
desc: Stayed for 3 nights and loved the hotel and room. It was beautifully designed, eco friendly and it was a huge plus that the mini bar snacks were included. However the service was so poor it surprised me. We asked for an extra duvet at the front desk when we checked in ‚Ä¶ no duvet was delivered that night. The only people that said hi to us in the hallways were the housekeepers. The men at the front doors gathered around one door and not both so when we walked in no one spoke or opened the door. When we called and they brought a duvet with comforter they didn‚Äôt even put the duvet on the comforter. Maybe it‚Äôs because we had just traveled from Vietnam and Japan but the service was horrible and led me to believe the Andaz just isn‚Äôt for me despite the delicious breakfast,

title: Amazing short-stay
desc: I had a short stay at Andaz for 3 nights and I really enjoyed my stay there. There are ppl standing around the entrance on the 2nd floor and the 25th floor to help with check in and help to navigate the hotel. The room itself was spacious, clean and had a great view overseeing the whole of Singapore, though most of the best views are blocked by high-rise buildings. Would definitely be back to stay at Andaz again.

title: After sloppy check-in, all else was good.
desc: The Andaz is located on the top floors of Duo Galleria, a mall and office complex, so views from the floor to ceiling windows is great. The hotel is also conveniently located above the Bugis MRT station. Our check in was sloppy, wrong information on rooms, our 2 rooms were on different floors and we were told we could go between rooms when key cards only allow you on the designated floors. Also, confusion about buying breakfast package. Once this process was over, the rest of the stay was satisfactory. Staff were wonderful, courteous and helpful, hotel rooms spacious, housekeeping efficient and thorough, and convenient location. Prices were high, but that is normal for Singapore. A definite choice when in Singapore.

title: Great place to stay with your family
desc: Andaz Singapore was a great place to stay. We had the Andaz large suite, and it was perfect for my wife and 2 kids. The service was 5 star +. It was my wife's birthday and they brought a cake and a bottle of red wine to the room. We also had breakfast included, which was great every morning. The buffet had a lot of options every morning. The food was fresh and delicious. Overall, the staff was welcoming and friendly. I would recommend anyone stay here. Not to mention it is on top of the Bugis metro station.

title: Amazing stay at the Andaz Singapore!
desc: I was in Singapore for business and had the pleasure of staying at the Andaz. From the location, food, pool, and other amenities, it was a truly wonderful experience. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone in the area.

title: Modern Concept Hotel in Singapore
desc: As expected for Andaz Hyatt level of services, everything was good. I personally like the little touch in the room that comes with free mini bar and a dust roller to clean my jacket/coat. Food can be better though, breakfast item are the same throughout my stays and can be improve with more verities and changes but will still come back for the stay,

title: Stay at andaz
desc: Room was new and clean. Could be due to the fact that it was a new hotel. However service was average. They need to improve on the check in service. Staff were either too young or inexperienced. This could be due to issues with communication.

title: Meh
desc: Over-priced and nothing fancy. Check-in experience was awful. Took more than an hour to check-in. Taking 2 different elevators to get to your room is annoying. Rooms are decent but nothing special. Hotel location is good, pretty convenient.

title: Great
desc: A very good quality hotel; quite centrally located with a lovely outdoor swimming pool. Friendly helpful staff, excellent food and drinks. If travelling back to Singapore I would definitely stay there again.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Comfortable room with amenities all fully equipped. Free mini bar daily too. My family enjoyed the lounge for free drinks and snacks to relax and chit chat. Swimming pool wasn't crowded and my girl had a fun time there. There's 3 stations for breakfast and we were spoiled for choices. Very friendly staff and excellent service in Andaz. Recommended!

title: Nice cost stay at Andaz Singapore
desc: Had a pleasant experience. Facilities at new, working and staff are friendly, helpful from janitor to check in staff to waiters and bellhop. I accidentally cos the sink to get stuck, and a very cheerful plumber came within 5min and took 20min to fix it, apologising throughout for causing me inconvience.

title: Wonderful facilities and excellent location
desc: Great rooms and service and views. Pool is fantastic with views out over the city and straits. Staff very friendly and helpful. Cocktail menu is sophisticated and designed around Singapore. The restaurants were first class. The rooms are more than adequate in size and very comfortable. Would definitely recommend.

title: Better Arrive 2 Hours Earlier for Your Check-in
desc: Put services & long waiting hour for check-in aside, all others are fantastic! Nevertheless, I can't afford to pay for this much and expect this level of service standard. So, think thrice before your booking.

title: Positive memorable experience
desc: From the beautiful artistic room and common areas, to the high quality food, a kind and professional staff made my stay a positive and memorable experience. I will book this hotel for my next trip to Singapore without any hesitation. I highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great room!
desc: A perfectly designed room, great views, friendly staff and a beautiful pool. Loved the sunroom and the beverages and snacks available at no cost to guests. A nice touch to grab some fruit infused water or coffee in the afternoon. Enjoyed a free cocktail at sunset and loved the rooftop pool!

title: Lovely Hotel
desc: Really lovely hotel in an ideal location in the centre of the city. The MRT (underground station) is right next to the hotel so easy to get around. The service and helpfulness of the staff was great. Breakfast had everything you could think of. They have complementary snacks and hot and cold drinks by reception which was a nice touch, especially after a long day sightseeing. The rooftop bar was great too with fab views, although expensive, but then again all bars were expensive. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to anyone.

title: Great location to explore Singapore
desc: The hotel is located right above the Bugis MRT station in the DUO Building complex. This easy access to Singapore's efficienct subway system makes the Andaz a perfect choice to easily explore the city. The lively Arab Street/Kampong Glam is just a 5-10 min walk out the back of the Duo complex. The rooms are clean, modern and well appointed with all the necessary amenities. There is a lovely refreshment lounge off the lobby that offers coffee, tea, cold drinks, fresh fruit and snacks for their guests. We would often stop by for a cold drink to cool off before heading up to our room. We also enjoyed the daily breakfast buffet. Great variety of fresh tropical fruit, salads, baked goods, waffles, eggs, omelets, and delicious local dishes like dim sum, satay and made to order

title: Worst experience
desc: Would not recommend this hotel to people who are after 5 star service and good room conditions it is also not very close to anything The service at the hotel was really bad, nothing gets attended to, no follow ups, you have to keep calling hotel services to get something done

title: And That's‚Ä¶
desc: To Cut A Long Story Short. In A Nutshell. I Had An Awesome Stay at Andaz! In-Room Dining Was Good. Breakfast Spread Was Wide. Service Staffs Were Great To Max. ‚Ñú√¶ Will Be Back For His Birthday. And...

title: A Gem in Singapore.
desc: One of the best Hotels to stay. Hotel Hotel layout is a very nice design. Nice to have the toilet and shower separated. Conveniently located near the MRT. Near the Bugis Junction location helpful especially when it‚Äôs raining. Lots of of places to eat and dine.

title: Comfortable and exceptional stay
desc: Clean, modern, relatively new hotel centrally located in Bugis, a short walk to the Arab district. Appreciate the hospitality and service of the front desk and bellmen staff. Enjoyed the lounge area with complementary refreshments / coffee bar, and snacks. Particular acknowledgment and thanks to Bryan Ferry, Katrina, Nizam, the entire bellmen team, and the refreshment lounge staff.

title: Great experience with Andaz Singapore and team
desc: Andaz staff and their services are awesome ! The foods and hotel room are great too. My clients loving their stay here. The sales team, event team, F&B team from Andaz, Smoke & Pepper, Garden Studio and Studio II are awesome, everyone extended their greatest help to me when my company held events on both 28th Feb and 1st Mar. I received great feedback from my clients and fellow colleagues. Thanks! :)

title: Singapore Sights from Andaz!
desc: Contemporary, bright & delightfully helpful staff! The Andaz Singapore is refreshing and exquisite in everyone way. From a plentiful and delicious Breakfast spread over three different rooms, to unique dining in Tepee‚Äôs on the rooftop at Mr. Stork, you will not be disappointed with your options for meals and views. The staff is extremely helpful and pleasant and the rooms are spacious and bright. If you are fortunate for an upgrade or just splurging for yourself or your family, the large panoramic view of downtown and the marina are astonishing! I choose this hotel whenever possible on my trips to Singapore and I cannot recommend it enough for those in search of quality and class at a convenient location within Singapore. And on top of all of this, the MRT station is in

title: Definitely going back
desc: Stunning experience, 100% would come back/recommend to friends and family. Everything was truly amazing but the breakfast especially was mind-blowing. Best breakfast spread I've had at any hotels. Thank you Andaz Singapore for a wonderful stay!

title: 1st timers
desc: 1st time to Singapore. Very impressed. This hotel is just perfect. Great staff and location. As for the breakfast, delighted they have something for everyone. We have been to many hotels, this is one of our favourites for breakfast. My husband likes his food and he loves it. The rooms have all you need. Very impressed.

title: Exceptional hotel stay
desc: We were a group of family and friends visiting Singapore and stayed at this hotel. Staff were amazing and provided exceptional service. Hotel was amazing with infinity pool overlooking the skyline of Singapore Harbor front.

title: Great stay near Bugis St
desc: We stayed for four days. We arrived super early before check-in like 9:00am and to our surprise, our room was ready. Hotel was clean and with nice view. Staff were friendly and accommodating from valet, bellman, Ivy at check-in to housekeeping. Made our stay memorable. Will stay at Andaz Singapore again when we return to Singapore!

title: Great Experience
desc: The Andaz is the perfect stay if you‚Äôre visiting Singapore. It‚Äôs near a bunch of fun stuff but it doesn‚Äôt have the Vegas like feel of Marina Bay which can get overwhelming and too busy at times. I loved it here and the staff is incredible. Shout out to the Dr who works at the front at guest check-in. He‚Äôs amazing!

title: Cheap materials finish, facilites are poor weak f & b
desc: For andaz standard this location fell short. Common areas felt cramp and the f&b was weak (i went to order coffee but all i found was a self coffee machine). Check in took way too long. There is a fountain u drink out of instead water bottle and shower water flow is restricted. One night i tried calling guests services but all the phone lines were down for entire night. Hotel doesnt have its own car service to airport so they will pull one from the street.

title: Great Hotel But Lousy Value
desc: Hotel is very nice, rooms are spacious but in some ways not practical for a business person. Location is iffy, room rate very high. Comparable hotels in better locations charge much less, but if these people can get away with it, good for them.

title: Singapore is Beautiful
desc: Our stay at the Andaz was unplanned, but I am so happy we stayed there, it is located within walking distance to Arab Street, Haji Lane and the Atlas Building. Additionally, you can transit from Changi Airport via the MRT - Bugis stop. Our room was well appointed and looked toward the Sultan Mosque. The hotel flip flops were cute. My spouse enjoyed the pool!

title: Looks from outside better than from inside
desc: Unfortunately this Hotel did come into the years. Our first Room had a bad humid smell. Later in the evening we discovered a wet spot at the ceiling where water was coming in. We changed room. Is looks all pretty old and used. I would not recommend to choose that Hotel specially if you are on a business trip. Nearby is the arabic quarter, which gives you access to some bars. There is also a mosque, which you can hear in the morning if your floor is not high enough. Breakfast was good enough. Checkout took pretty long. Personnel needs to be trained better.

title: Wonderful hotel and convenient location
desc: Beautiful and comfortable hotel. It was quite difficult to find the hotel entrance in the beginning. Very expensive I must say. I didn't try the pool because of the weather. Breakfast is good but could have been better.

title: Nice overall experience but slight disappointment in some service staff & faulty nespresso
desc: Overall nice atmosphere & experience. Just minus on some staffs service, specifically it‚Äôs an Assistant Manager hence disappointed. Needs & hope to see improvements. Faulty nespresso spoils the day. Need to carry out checks on the in room appliances & facilities. Certain food way too salty & very small portion. Sleep disturbed at 4+am by hotel fire alarm announcement. But chicken satay is nice Overall nice hotel

title: Excellent Stay
desc: I had stayed for a business trip recently and I got the best of service. I think that all the staffs that I had interacted during my stay were very good. The staff on the 25th floor servicing during breakfast were great and the food was also excellent. The action station serving different choices of eggs were also great. I must recommend this hotel as it boosts both great leisure & business stay.

title: Stay in a style
desc: Nice hotel to stay with modern interior design. Friendly staff and relaxed atmosphere. Quite a generous hotel with complimentary refreshments all day, free coffee, tea or iced tea with nibbles near the check in hall. Plus complimentary snacks and drinks in the room as well. Good location with easy access to many places.

title: Very good situation and caring staff
desc: Between the different interesting districts of Singapore, the hotel offers very good services for breakfast and bar with very beautiful views. As well as for the rooms which are very comfortable. I recommend without hesitation

title: Enjoyable stay at Andaz
desc: Nice, spacious and bright rooms, although the windows were a bit tinted so it did affect the view a bit . Love the complimentary sunroom 'lounge'. One issue was that some of the staff had to "check" for every question that we asked them (eg: when we asked the restaurant to remove certain foods from a dish due to allergies) Chinese restaurant had decent food, but a bit expensive. Otherwise, a pretty good stay!

title: Great Experience - Great Hotel - Great Staff - Great Location
desc: We just visited Andez Singapore few days ago (now in Bali) and I have to say that when returning to Singapore - next hotel is already in mind. As headline says, it was great experience, hotel location is great (walking distance to Orchard shoppings etc. Ok, you need a bit time and patient, for us no problem), facilities are new, clean and in very good shape, staff very friendly (ok, coming from Northern Europe all Asians are gems in customer care!). So, all in all - very enjoyable stay. Recommended

title: Andaz Singapore
desc: Great hotel with amazing staff, impressive breakfast buffet and modern look and feel in prime location. Love the hotel and will go back soon. Room service was quick and food was very tasty (can‚Äôt miss out on a good laksa)!

title: Many other hotel choices in Singapore.
desc: Front Office All the staff I have met have forgotten how to smile. Every interaction is cold and expressionless. Check-in staff have almost zero eye contact, don‚Äôt smile, speaks poor English and I have to ask her to repeat a few times. Most of the staff are dressed in badly fitted maternity like clothings, looking like in their third trimester and having mood swing like one. Breakfast Better service and attention by staff at cafe during breakfast. Big variety of food but of average quality and taste. Housekeeping Unfriendly staff when delivering ice to my room on 3 occasions. One star goes to the F&B breakfast service team and another star is for the Grand Hyatt Singapore staff who is working there and knows how to render proper Hyatt Service Standards.

title: Great room - terrible bed
desc: Feather quilt in a tropical country - shouldn't be surprising that it was a hot bed and that sleep was a challenge. Asked for lighter quilt, but got a really old, too small and very thin blanket for my troubles. Bed is also generally quite hard. Very nice room, but not good for sleep.

title: 2nd stay, but never again -- awful service & mildew smell
desc: I stayed here before the pandemic and really liked it, so I (made a big mistake and) returned in January 2023. Under the new general manager, Andaz Singapore has abandoned its standards, thrown in the towel, and is now simply an aging midrange hotel for regional sales meetings. In front of 6 guests (including me) waiting for the elevator, a bellman pushed his empty luggage cart ahead of all of us to take the cab first. The hotel manager acknowledged this. Later on it took 10 minutes for a bellman at the ground level to even make eye contact, much less say hello or do anything useful. To add a bit of humor, the hotel staff all wear shapeless bright blue uniforms that look like upside-down recycling bags. Haha, I give them credit for the levity. My first room smelled of mildew

title: My lovely stay during my business trip
desc: Andaz hotel singapore is a beautiful place to stay, reception, restaurant and pools at 25th floor. I stayed 37th floor the staff at check in my room a chinese lady with great smile on the face and the room is awesome with free mini bar drinks. Reception staff all very friendly and staff without name on their uniform concierge team at the driveway lobby who handle my luggages was too friendly and especially the Indian young big guy who send my luggages to my room gave me good ideas where I can go for shopping dinner and sightseeing places, such a knowledgeable and well experience guy. I didn't manage to tip him for his service but he told me this is part of his job to make the guest have a wonderful and memorable stay andaz . This kind of staff need recognition and need more

title: 5 days in Sigapore
desc: The Andaz Singapore sits in a perfect location to explore the major tourist attraction on foot or with the Metro. The Metro station is below the Andaz hotel, and it is easy to get around. The rooftop bar is fantastic with an incredible view and good drinks.

title: Andaz didn't shine
desc: Given their 5-star status, it was with much disappointment the family checked out of the hotel after 3 nights of stay especially since the family had not visited since COVID and the hotel options available to choose from. One of the room's a/c did not work and despite multiple feedback to staff, only a dehumidifier was sent up to "freshen" up the room. Servicemen identified it to be a filter issue when clearly it was a faulty A/C after coming thrice to check on the matter made worse by a long wait checking in only at 5.35pm. Only after dinner the next day did the hotel staff finally acknowledge the issue and we had to suggest a room change rather than them proactively resolving the issue or offering a room change to us. Certainly a warm welcome home. :(

title: Beautiful üòç
desc: Staying at Andaz was a lovely experience. I met up with a dear friend whom I hadn't seen since early 2020. We found the rooms very comfortable, the staff incredibly friendly and helpful, the sitting areas vary comfortable, and with a variety of breakfast options, it truly was a special stay. The hotel location is also very convenient, being close to both MRT (rail) and bus transportation. All in all, a wonderful stay and I highly recommend Andaz Hotel.

title: great Hyatt experience
desc: We like this hotel in Singapore. Good location and convenient transportation, kind people and clean spacious rooms. We use Hyatt upgrade cert to a suite with great view. We really enjoy our stay there. Will come back again.

title: Just great
desc: We stayed 3 days and we don‚Äôt have a single negative comment. The breakfast was the best I have Deen in years. The people were friendly and the rooms and views where spectacular and clean. Only thing I don‚Äôt love is that lobby is in the 25 th floor but this is by design.

title: Thank you Andaz for a great stay
desc: Situated perfectly and directly connected above the Bugis MRT Andaz‚Äôs location can‚Äôt be beat. The hotel was welcoming, offered a wonderful home away from home with free wifi, gym, infinity pool with impressive views and neither too busy and a plethora of dining options just an elevator ride or a 5m walk away. For a period of nearly two weeks our family occupied two rooms on L30 that interconnected overlooking the downtown city, marina and infinity pool located on L25. Each day breakfast which offered a range of different cultural foods was offered until mid morning, your mini bar was replenished free of charge and there was a good offering of TV programs to watch from up to date blockbusters, children programs, lifestyle and news / stock channels. Our family had a most

title: Awesome Experience
desc: The bed was huge! The staff service was excellent, friendly and professional. Room was clean and crisp. Easy check in and check out. Location was excellent. Nearby bugis. Everything was connected. Will stay here again. Highly recommended.

title: Fabulous Stay
desc: Hotel was clean, centrally located and always a great place to come back to at night. Having the MRT be directly under the hotel was great for us to explore the city and always know how to get back without needing internet/cell service. If ever back in Singapore it would be a no brainer to stay here again.

title: OK, but some problems that I‚Äôm not sure can be fixed
desc: Quality of accommodation & sleep, were very good. I loved the location for easy access to shops, and just a short taxi ride to anywhere I wanted to get to (if not using public transport). Received a nice upgraded sea view room as a Hyatt Globalist, and a coupon for a free drink between 5.30-6.30. And here‚Äôs where things get a little off track. The lounge area at 5.30 was completely full. This smaller area is in-between the restaurant and the bar. The server, upon seeing my drinks coupon, tried to show me to a seat/table in an unused part of the restaurant. I felt like a leper and told him this would not be somewhere I would enjoy sitting. I walked over to the bar area only to be informed my DRINKS COUPON is for the lounge. I told him it was for a drink, and that as the lounge

title: Staycay
desc: Its a Hyatt hotel. Service and cleanliness as expected The toilet bins could be more hygienic though. Since it was made out of weaved basket, i wonder if it was thoroughly cleaned without destroying it.

title: Very nice and luxurious experience though small little details might affect the overall experience
desc: Stepping into the room was a wow moment for me. Loved the large wardrobe area that is separated from the bedroom with a door. Bathroom was also nicely laid out with lots of space. My only disappointment was the watermarked table which made the room feel much less well-maintained. The drinking glass at the sink also had a small dried bug at the lip of the glass. Breakfast service and quality was VERY good. While the variety is not widest, there is sufficient choice but more importantly, I felt that the food was of good quality and the chefs preparing it seem to take pride in their food. Loved the large swimming pool (only downside was the path to the pool cuts through the restaurant, makes you feel a little conscious when you walk to the pool with your swim gear while

title: Pleasant stay at andaz
desc: Facility are superb and room was definitely comfy. Service staff were not knowledgeable maybe due to a lack of training? Eg we ate at the chinese restaurant 5 on 25 but every request we had like whether they could debone the duck or remove the scallops from a certain dish she had to check. A bit pricey as well $28 (?) I think for 6 pieces of roast pork. Even for payment I felt the staff was very unsure. Likewise the sunlounge the staff had to check everything i asked with the manager. Our rooms duvet were slightly dirty but they promptly solved it and gave us a higher floor.

title: Awesome!
desc: More than expected. Service and stay is excellent and food is very nice (wide selection). Hotel staff are friendly. I really enjoyed my stay. This hotel is highly recommended. You can never go wrong choosing this hotel. Value for money.

title: Amazing Quality As Always, But Lacking in the F&B Department
desc: Andaz has always been our go-to place for our yearly birthday stay in Singapore. Simply because service has always been top notch and the rooms are comfortably spacious and beautiful. Our heartfelt thanks to Ms. Shaqilla Pauzi for making us feel welcomed and for sending us a birthday cake even though we did not request for it. We are truly appreciative of this little gesture and certainly made us felt welcomed. What we liked: Everything is photogenic in this hotel, and especially the rooms. Bed is really comfortable and the room is really spacious for the 2 of us. The room is very clean and everything is simply perfect. What could be improved: We felt that the quality of breakfast has dipped since the last time we came, and especially when being charged 45++ per pax there

title: Constant service problems
desc: Hotel is modern and beautiful. Unfortunately the hotel has poor operations. Items in room don‚Äôt function. Clock is broken and staff don‚Äôt know how to operate it. Shampoo bottle in shower is empty upon arrival (fun to find out during your shower). Need something? It may require multiple calls for it. Managers are not equipped to solve problems.

title: Andaz Singapore - not what it used to be
desc: Sad to see that post Covid hospitality service takes time to recover. Food is a bit of a disgrace for Singapore, where it‚Äôs hard to find a bad meal. Now you know where to go ! Breakfast selection looks lavish but actually few nice hot dishes, healthy options are quite dry too. The lady welcoming breakfast guests should find another job that excites her more. She obviously doesn‚Äôt like what she is doing now.

title: Comfortable hotel
desc: Well located in the city, good service for the money paid. Breakfast is fair. Good upper roof restaurant. Rooms are fine, internet is working properly. Good quality of the sleep. A little problem with the staff from reception. Not quite efficent.

title: Short Stay at very nice hotel
desc: Great location, has 39th floor observation roof deck. Clean and very professional services. Above the MRT station. Walking distance to mall and restaurants. Complimentary minibar, free lounge for coffee and snacks.

title: Convenient, comfortable and clean hotel in Singapore
desc: I stayed at the Andaz in late Dec 2022, including New Year's Eve. The hotel was exceptionally clean, and the rooms were well-laid out, comfortable, and exceptionally quiet - I slept without interruption. The breakfast spread was great, and the hotel staff worked really hard to manage the traffic at breakfast despite the narrow walkways and buffet in multiple rooms.

title: Completely Dissatisfied with Andaz, Singapore!
desc: Check-in to the room was provided almost 2 hours late of the standard check-in time. Non availability of hand sanitizers either in the room or in the public areas. Rooms are not being sanitized properly following the standard protocols. Elevators are also not being sanitized properly. Restaurants staff's attitude during the breakfast hours is quite rude and uncourteous. Any guest services in the room required a long waiting time before it arrived.

title: Amazing hotel on so many levels
desc: This hotel has an outstanding location to the Marina, Raffles and shopping on your door step. The staff are attentive, the rooms beautifully appointed, amazing breakfast and it just has a lovely vibe!

title: Great hotel to relax and have fun
desc: It is a great hotel. The room is very intelligent presenting lots of devices and extreme cleaning. The pool is beautiful but it lacks music. The breakfast is sensational and the location is close to every attraction

title: Great place for leisure or business trip
desc: Andaz Singapore is conveniently located in an strategic spot in Singapore. Walking distance to many must-see areas, and with underground and bus in the same building. Staff is helpful and ready to support with any queries. WIFI works really well through the property no matter if common areas or rooms. The vibes and atmosphere invite you to feel at home from check-in.

title: Very pleasant stay
desc: Hotel is located at a well connected location, close to MRT and shopping and lots of food close by. Room is very clean and bed is super comfortable. Hotel provides plenty of free water bottles, which we appreciate very much for the convenience. Staff are very friendly and helpful. We had a great experience staying here.

title: Andaz Singapore
desc: A great hotel in an amazing location. Modern high-rise building with stylish decoration and interior design. It has lot of great choices for food along with a rooftop bar with awesome views. My 2nd time here and I highly recommend this hotel!

title: Nice Hotel
desc: Overall, very happy with my stay, great room and complimentary drinks and snacks. More check in counter would be great. just a pity that complimentary parking ticket is not available. would be quite expensive if you stay for few days.

title: Most Wonderful Experience
desc: We booked Andaz for our 1 year anniversary and every moment was absolutely wonderful since the minute we stepped into the hotel. The staff is very kind and really go the extra mile to make your stay with them amazing. The rooms are super clean and have quality products. The location is also excellent and minutes away to tourist attractions. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Singapore. Cannot wait to be back here again someday.

title: Awesome hotel stay!!!
desc: The hotel stay was a wonderful experience. The interior of the room was really beautiful and the hotel stay came with a lot of complimentary services including beverages, wine, and breakfast! The amenities include pool and gym which were wonderful as well. It's also very convenient to travel from Andaz as it is right above a train station.

title: BEAUTIFUL!
desc: Absolutely fantastic hotel in a perfect location in Singapore. The staff were so accommodating and helpful! All the amenities were modern and up to date. One of the best city hotels that we have stayed in.

title: 5 stars to everything: room, bathroom, view, service, breakfast, amenities
desc: + Spacious well-appointed room with super king bed + Floor-to-ceiling windows offer great view + Large walk-in closet within bathroom, our room didn't have a bathtub though (that is only for selected room types) + Complimentary mini bar; drinks and tasty snacks at sunroom lounge + Good overall service during check-in and at the breakfast restaurant, pretty aptly staffed + Best buffet breakfast I had in my recent hotel stays (we were walked through the four sections: salad & bread, juice station, western and asian), empty plates on our table were also cleared pretty fast. The breakfast not just had variety, the quality was there as well (delicious local laksa, freshly cut ham, cafe-style eggs to name a few). A pity we only stayed one night, could have tried more food with more

title: Falling short
desc: Hotel competition is high in Singapore. The Andaz is a modern hotel and we decided to splurge and take a larger corner room to enjoy the additional space and views. The rooms are nicely designed, clean and comfortable. Unfortunately the lounge in the room had spots where the material was worn and torn. The shower was over engineered and you either had scorching hot water or it was luke warm. The concierge is located on level 2 with the reservation desk on level 35. We found it a bit disjointed, chaotic and disorganised, so not the smooth experience one hopes for on arrival. It means coming out of the taxi, navigating where to go, then schlepping up with bags to reception. These issues unfortunately were a source of disappointment. On the positive side, a lovely pool area

title: Family getaway
desc: We stayed in the residence suite which was perfect for 2 adults/2 kids - plenty of space. Great view, black out curtains, 1.5 baths in the room. Hotel also has an area you can get coffee/tea/lemonade and snacks basically all day which was really nice after returning from someplace or just "grabbing a coffee". We did have a nespresso in the room but this was just easier with the kids. Pool was lovely as well. Understand they were quite busy as it's right before Christmas so the room wasn't available until after 2, but there's so much to do in Singapore wasn't a big deal (and technically check in was 3). Overall, recommend - great location as well.

title: Very pleasant stay as always
desc: My 4th stay at Andaz Singapore! This time we booked the King Room (was staying the suite rooms during previous stays, enjoyed it so much) and was allocated a room with Heritage View. The room and bed size were spacious and the view was beautiful too. Cot and kids‚Äô amenities were provided promptly upon request, for my baby. Swimming pool was great with a skyline view! Always looked forward to chilling at the lounge, having their signature iced tea :) Lots of options for their breakfast buffet. Walking distance to many eateries and shopping/heritage areas. And lastly, all their staffs are very welcoming and attentive. Overall, I will still look forward to going to Andaz Singapore for more staycation in the future, as always :)

title: Disappointed and will try another hotel
desc: The Andaz was my property of choice when visiting Singapore. But this time, there were too many misses to rate this property high. From serious issues with the pickup, the room and the service levels. All aspects were below the expectation for this property. I can appreciate that when you are busy, this is difficult to do. I used to expect an excellent experience but after the last 3 times, my expectations have been lowered. For a globalist who travels frequently, this one is no longer a property of choice.

title: Staycation with loved ones
desc: It was a wonderful stay with my wife and baby at the Andaz King Suite. The staff, from level 2 lobby to the reception at level 25 have pleasant characters and friendly. The service crew from Alley on 25 are top notch. They are cordial, warm and amicable towards us during our early morning breakfast. Special mention to Kasturi and her team for the pleasant morning breakfast experience during our stay.

title: Beautiful View But Missing the Hyatt Service Levels
desc: We love staying at the Grand Hyatt but it is under construction. Sadly, for us, this property does not live up to the same standards. The location is convenient - right at the Bugis metro and close to Marina Bay Sands. The service was a bit below par. We do not like the mini bar concept vs the lounge that Hyatts have. We had 2 snacks for 3 people. That said it was clean and the view from our room was beautiful. Their own amenity line, Singapore #19, comes across as pretentious and nothing special.

title: Staycation At Andaz Singapore
desc: Everything was almost perfect except for minor hiccups during my stay. Staff were attentive to details, responsive and friendly. Staff contacted me before my stay to keep me informed. Not kids friendly, keep knockings into the side table lamp, pool have only 1 depth (1.2m) and limited TV channel (will like to have more kids channel and chinese movies).

title: Splendid view and comfortable stay
desc: Went there for a short 3 days 2 nights stay. The high floor view is spectacular and the bed even make me feel like I'm sleeping on my own bed‚ô° would definitely want to go again if I have the opportunity

title: Disappointing Andaz stay
desc: Very underwhelmed by this hotel actually. We felt it was very poorly run. The food and beverages were average quality and way above average price!! On the plus side the rooms excellent and well appointed and the beds were comfortable. Good location.

title: WORST CHECK-IN EVER
desc: I booked the Andaz Suite King for my recent stay and had the most terrible check-in experience of my life. Official check-in time is 3.00pm and I arrived at the hotel around 3.30pm, expecting to be able to check in immediately. However, front desk told me that the room is not available as the previous guests have not checked out, and they were given late check-out till 4pm. I was upset but I understand the front desk‚Äôs situation, so I told her that it‚Äôs fine and I am willing to wait till LATEST 5pm. However, when we head back down to the front desk at 5pm, we were told that the room was not ready and we kept getting pushed back. What I don‚Äôt understand is, how can the hotel not respect the official check-in time? If they are unable to fulfil the official check-in time,

title: Excellent Services
desc: The hotel overall is clean, and the customer service provided by the hotel is superb too. Andaz never fails to please my wife and me during our stay. I would love to go back again for my staycation in the future.

title: Andaz Residence Suite King
desc: The residence suite king is spacious and comfortable. The scenery is great and the staffs are all very friendly and helpful. Bugis junction is just across the street and there are many food choices near the hotel to choose from. My only concern is the bathtub. The bathtub is quite high so have to be careful climbing in and out of the bathtub. Overall, the whole stay was great!

title: Better than Marina Bay
desc: Got a corner suite due to globalist status and very impressed with the room! Had two bathrooms and big living room area! View was amazing and staff came often to clean and restock room! Amazing service! Right above green and blue line so easy access to rest of singapore and walking distance from many local spots!

title: Perfect business location
desc: The Andaz in Singapore is perfectly located, just 18 minutes from the airport and a short 5 minute hop into Raffles Place and Marina bay. The area is lively, with Arab Street on one side and the Midtown and South Beach developments on the other. Works really well for a visit to Singapore.

title: Great service & experience
desc: ANDAZ Singapore. Had a wonderful experience during breakfast from your staff, Mr. Thiruna. He put attention to details, took care of every table during the breakfast in his area; he even noticed I had not taken any drink and initiated to bring me a cup of detox juice. Such service makes Hyatt a place for great stay.

title: Great stay in the heart of Bugis
desc: Hotel lobby is very chic. Got a double bed room. Amenities are new. Room fitted with Bose speakers which makes for a great room ambience. I had a pleasant stay. Alot of food options which are walking distance.

title: Great to be Back
desc: Andaz branded hotel are truly a unique experience which I love. Andaz Singapore is centrally located and has great views of a beautiful city, a fantastic infinity pool and roof top bar with expectational staff. Rooms are very comfortable and are equipped with an Nespresso Machine :)

title: Excellent staff, enjoyable stay
desc: Staff was very patient and helpful when we registered into the hotel. We stayed at the corner room and was not disappointed with the wonderful view of the city. The hotel is linked to The MRT station and getting to Bugis or Marina Bay was a breeze. We could even have lunch at Bugis! Very good location and throughly made our stay so enjoyable.

title: Awesome service
desc: I been to andaz hotel many times and I always happy with the service especially to NORIE for the warm welcome and accomodating us.even the lounge is so busy she is very ATTENTIVE to guest and visit us to check if we need anything.the food is totally FANTASTIC.I normally eat a bit but I cant resist with the quality,very delicious and yummy dishes.lemonade at the lounge is my TOP FAVORITE.the hotel ambiance is elegant,new and nice decor.Thanks also to SAMANTHA for welcoming us and always there to assist usüòä.

title: Style Over Practicality
desc: The rooms are undoubtable stylish, clean, spacious, and modern. The hotel in total felt premium and the location is great. Unfortunately, a commitment to provide us with a welcome amenity to celebrate our honeymoon that ultimately wasn't followed up on at any point during our four night stay left us disappointed, especially considering the price paid. Additionally, some small stylistic details really had me questioning the decisions they made in the rooms. To start, it is truly puzzling to me how a massive hotel such as this which is part of a major international hotel brand, and is located in one of the most frequently visited cities in the world only utilizes the local Asian outlets. Any visitors from US or Europe may require adapters to charge devices. Other hotels I stayed

title: Bad service from concierge staff
desc: There are many staff on their internship and one of them even told us ‚ÄúI‚Äôm on my internship‚Äù and therefore didn‚Äôt bother helping us (our room card had a problem). When we asked if she could help us find a perm staff as the concierge had only 1 (busy) staff, she just SIGHED, stood around and did NOTHING. The other staff service was also only mediocre as compared to other hotels we‚Äôve visited in Singapore. We booked a large suite for wedding anni but there was no special service or treatment or set up, so this place might not be the best to splurge for your special occasions. Room was very big and clean so, that was the only saving grace.

title: HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED FOR WEDDINGS STAYCAY
desc: Backstory, my sister chose Andaz as her wedding banquet venue because of the splendid glasshouse hall. The immediate family were given a choice to get discounted room rates together with the wedding package. ‚óÜ DIRECTION Hotel Entrance at Floor 1. Hotel Lobby at Floor 25. Which floor do you think the reception is at? Most of the guests, like us, went to the first floor for reception. Thank goodness there was a nice staff there to usher guests to level 25 for check-in. At level 25, Hotel Lobby level, I doubt myself that the kitchen counters were the reception because.... NO reception or check-in/check-out label is at the viewer's sight the moment you exit from the lobby. Good thing is, the other wall brings you to the Andaz restaurants so if you are lost, just walk one round and

title: Great hotels
desc: A very modern and trendy place to stay. Location is ok and trendy. Efficient staff and modern rooms I would stay there again very handy having the train accessible from the hotel Staff were very helpful

title: Will comeback
desc: As a world class, I feel that still have room to improve, like increase of the facilities like children needs or teenagers likes or attract the crowd like pod parent, in world class you consider all from young to old. Spending power always coming from midddle ages, they will bring children & parents too

title: Convenient location but lack of complimentary car park is a big turn-off.
desc: The hotel is very conveniently located near Bugis MRT station, where two MRT lines intersect. The Bugis MRT station is connected via an underground mall walkway. In addition, Bugis Junction and Bugis + malls are also within a stone's throw and are connected via the same underground walkway. The pillows are too soft for me so the sleep was not the best. The pool is a little pathetic. Breakfast range was okay, but I have had much better in many other hotels. I drove to and parked at the hotel, so having to pay a big sum because the hotel does not provide complimentary carpark is the major reason why I would not recommend anyone else intending to drive to stay at this hotel.

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: It was a wonderful hotel ‚Ä¶ very near to Haji lane, Arab street and Bugis Juction. I like the shortcut from B3 to the MRT. The room it self very clean and have a great view ‚Ä¶ minibar are complementary from the hotel and refill every day with a snack. Definitely add this hotel to my upcoming list..

title: Superb hotel
desc: A very modern and comfortable hotel with excellent facilities and friendly staff. The rooms are clean and comfortable and well laid out with attention to detail. The breakfast resturant is awesome. The views from the rooftop bar are fantastic. The staff are responsive and extremely helpful.

title: Hospitable staff-Good mrt connectivity
desc: we stayed at the Andaz for my wife birthday and our anniversary in November. wanted to take a moment and appreciate the hospitality extended to my family and me during our stay. It was a wonderful experience and we have many memories to cherish. wanted to especially recognise a few individuals who stood out - breakfast cafe - coordinator-shaun, servers- thiruna and vasu - front desk - shaqillah - chef - T reddy what stood out the most was the impromptu birthday song sung by the staff during breakfast for my wife which made her feel very special. apart from this we loved the connectivity with Bugis MRT, the location of the hotel, and of-course the room which was very comfortable. whenever in singapore we would love to stay back at the Andaz.

title: Old and tired
desc: Unwelcoming lobby, smelly poorly ventilated elevators and unwelcoming entrance and cramped reception space with old small cramped rooms in a location that is far from the central attractions. Breakfast was acceptable and staff appear to resonate the character of the space. Needs a major refurbishment of the entry and lobby and the rooms ms

title: Best staycation ever
desc: Best staycation, good experience from check in to check out. Convenient, at mrt and near eateries. Walking distance to bugis and suntec for nearby shopping. 20mins walk to marina bay area. Nice experience with the family. 2nd staycation with my family this year

title: So Not Worth It
desc: For the amount of money being charged for a room at this hotel, I expected services Have actually been treated better at hotels that cost 1/4 the price. The gym was very nice (better than most). But the rest of the experience was an overwhelming disappointment. This is one of those cases where a place COULD get away with overcharging, but really needs to look at whether they SHOULD get away with it.

title: reesor
desc: expensiveÔºå service is not good. I stayed for 4 nights paid 7600 SGD and did not get breakfastÔºåTalk to the counter and he said I didn't mention it when I booked, so there is no way to giveÔºåLet me go back to the platform I booked and ask them to re-book. I am not a beggar. How can I pay so much for this breakfast? make it so complicated

title: Not worth, much better hotels in SG, hotel status as Explorist not respected, every request denied.
desc: * Check in staff would not provide best room upgrade for Explorist. * Other staff would not perform cash out for cash only needs during my Singapore business trip. Small amounts to tip. Instead refer me to a currency exchange machine in the lobby that charges 20% commission. Every hotel in the world has the concept of cash out including Hyatt hotels. It was unfortunate and inconveniencing me to have such a nice Hyatt property not have the concept of cash out, charging against my room for small amount of cash. * Every request denied at this hotel. Does not feel like my Hyatt loyalty is respected at all at this property.

title: Just ok
desc: But of an underwhelming hotel. Perfectly fine but nothing excellent. There is no ‚Äúwow‚Äù factor. Started by giving me a harbour-view room that didn‚Äôt have a view (trees blocking the view of the water) so I had to go back to reception. Inconvenient route to bedroom due to being in a mixed-use building (escalator to first lobby, elevator to main lobby on high floor, then another elevator to bedrooms). Bedrooms feel a bit dated now though perfectly adequate. Staff fine.

title: Andaz Singapore
desc: I had a birthday stay and it was very enjoyable, and I had a surprise cake from the hotel which was a nice gesture. The room was spacious and the staff is very helpful. It is also in an excellent location with great food nearby at the heart of the train network.

title: Very comfortable and good location
desc: Celebrated my wedding anniversary with a staycay and was given free upgrade to heritage room. Very nice hotel, mini bar is inclusive, service is excellent, breakfast is great with nice spread, location near bugis junction. will definitely stay again.

title: They gave me the worst experience
desc: We arrived the hotel around 11 am .Its not the time for check in Then we went to china for a lunch.Meanwhile I leave a message to the reception that I have some wine delivery to the hotel.They confirmed 2 times with me that the concierge know this case.But when I had lunch.The wine celler inform me that the concierge don‚Äôt know and they can‚Äôt check our information. After we came back from lunch.It‚Äôs around 3:30 PM When we tried to check in.They inform us that there was no any suite room available.We need wait for 1.5 hours for them make up the room. And when I asked why.They informed me that they have a VIP guest just check out. Then they let us sit in front of the reception for half an hour without anyone come to take care of us. I have to ask them what shall we do.Then they

title: Andaz Singapore - Overpriced and Disappointing
desc: Welcome was routine and really just felt we were just a number High price for a old hotel under some refurbishment We had issues with a leaking toilet and disgusting smells from it - also water pressure was very low We stayed two nights and it was disappointing - I would have preferred to extend my stay at The Clan Hotel and The Outpost Hotel - both offering much better value and customer care and interest

title: Be careful when you book.
desc: The worst experience was at check in. I arrived at around 11pm when there were 2 staff at the check in space, one busy with a customer and the other one was on his computer. He turned around, looked at me then continued to work on his computer. No greetings, didn't ask other staff to help and just let me stood there. My original booking was SGD598 per night for heritage view room. when I had to extend another night, I was told the only way is to pay for SGD651.85++ for a city view room. I had no choice but to accept but felt like a huge rip off when the room I had was heritage view. Since this is a very busy business trip and I got to my room it was very late already , I didn't want to waste anymore time questioning your team but still felt like I was conned as the entire hotel

title: Nice staycation
desc: Clean and spacious Cosy and nice lighting Gorgeous view Ease of access to nearby amenities Bugis junction Bugis village Bugis plus within walkable distance Mrt nearby Alot of eateries Alot of shopping

title: Superb Hotel
desc: I had one week at this hotel, returning to Singapore for a wedding and to celebrate my upcoming 60th birthday. My room was excellent on the 36th floor which gave me stunning views of Bugis and beyond, with a HUGE bed and all the amenities I could have asked for. Loved the fact that there was a proper hairdryer (not one of those hoses attached to the wall!), a decent iron and ironing board, plenty of coathangers and even a light up magnifying mirror for doing my make-up!!! Staff were friendly and helpful. One young man walked me to the MRT so he could show me the route via the underground walkway and anther helpful lady carried my shopping up to my room. Make sure you visit the roof bar Mr Stork, sit in a teepee and enjoy spectacular views.

title: Beautiful
desc: Beautiful hotel, clean, loved the wood floors. Breakfast was great. Pool was relaxing with a spectacular view. Bed was firm just as I like it. Cable was intuitive and offered plenty of selections, especially nice when jet lag has you up at 2am

title: A good hotel to stay in Singapore
desc: An excellent and pleasant hotel to stay. My wife and I are very much impressed by the room cleaning service. We have been through quite few top notch hotels. Andaz's room cleaning service is the best we ever experienced. Complement to the management and its diligent staffs.

title: Not worth the price
desc: This is in the Hyatt group but it felt more like a high end college dorm. Breakfast is disorganized as it is spread across 4 restaurants. The room is small and my ‚Äòupgrade‚Äô was from a garden view to a city view of construction sites. For the price of this hotel I could have stayed in a much nicer real 5 star. Staff were pleasant but dressed to go to a fast food place. I know it is a ‚Äòconcept‚Äô hotel but I guess I am not up with this concept. Won‚Äôt stay here again.

title: Weekend staycation
desc: Our second time staying in this hotel. Good location with easy access to MRT staton and Bugis area. Nice & cosy ambience with sea view. Good breakfast spread. Received complimentary cake for my husband‚Äôs birthday celebration. The only

title: Wonderful stay
desc: My parcel arrived the hotel 1 day before my stay and the concierge were so nice to keep aside for me till i checked in. On the day itself, i came early and the room was ready for me. I'm so glad because i have a meeting to rush after that.

title: Do Not Recommend for Weddings
desc: Room did not even have a greeting or wedding message for the bridal couple. Wedding greetings only arrived after we returned to the room after the wedding dinner at 11 plus 12 midnight. Among the other mess ups during the dinner, untouched dishes of the Bride was cleared without checking, which shows a lack of initiative. Wrote a long email feedback but the events manager simply ended the email with a shallow ‚ÄúThank you for your valuable feedback‚Äù without any accountability. Unprofessional standards equivalent to a 3-star hotel. Only worthy mention was the helpful and pleasant banquet manager Kishen. Would‚Äôve booked another wedding venue if we knew this hotel‚Äôs service standards.

title: Amazing stay 10/10
desc: Andaz is simply world class. From the smooth check-in, to the amazing suite, we really enjoyed every part of this establishment. Beautiful contemporary design, all topped off with a complimentary minibar. Special thanks and recognition to Evelyn Kwan who went above and beyond to cater for our requests. You truly made our trip memorable and special. Thank you again Andaz!

title: Enjoy the stay
desc: It‚Äôs very nice stay we had. The staff are very friendly and helpful. It‚Äôs very convenient to get lots of restaurants and so on‚Ä¶ The room is vey clean and we also get free upgrade to ocean view room. The rooftop bar is very pretty with fantastic view.

title: Andaz - good location
desc: Condiiton of hotel is good but could do with a deeper clean in shower where you can see mould growing in hinges and wall. Good location if you don't want to be in heart of Orchard but still have easy access to the train.

title: it is likely an A* for Andaz, if not for the Accident-prone area
desc: I like the size of its rm and panoramic window!!& yes, its quality slippers for u to wear it to the pool. (it reminds you not to steal it home) Alley on 25 (a multi-cuisine mid-price range restaurant) While the food is not bad, the 100sgd dining credit is spent fast after adding in svc charge and gst!!! Food are pricey to me! Wish that the hotel or klook offer even better deals without the dining credits!!!! The observatory / bar area is too dark, could have install more ground light to brighten up the area appropriately?! I hurt myself by hitting on something at that area! Was bleeding profusely till the following day!!!!have a hard time calling ops/hsekeeping to get me more tissue papers and plasters, they only responded the next day ...What a bloody staycation for an

title: Wonderful architecture with dull atmosphere
