desc: We had a very high expectation for this hotel knowing its beautiful architecture and quite a promising Andaz brand. But our experience fell flat. Aside from the exterior and interior, the staff, which supposed to be genuinely dynamic and engaging, were robotic. We experienced no bad service by any means, but it was like we were staying in a highly mechanised hotel with no sense of warm hospitality.

title: my 3rd time stay at Andaz
desc: I stay at Andaz, was because I was familiar with that area. And genuinely had a pleasant experience. Overall was still great. But I think the standard could be better. Message that was pass to the lobby to have certain things prepared was not done. Had to give an extra call to get it settled

title: Hotel w Bidet is a hotel I will stay
desc: That‚Äôs it that‚Äôs the review. It‚Äôs so hard to find hotel w bidet here. It‚Äôs like hotels forget you have to cater to clients from Muslim countries. Or rather think cleaning w tissues for ur poop suffice. Hence this is my go to hotel for occasions. Apart from that, excellent staff, quick to resolve issues. Clean space.

title: Return to Andaz Oct 2022
desc: Very happy to return to my "home away from home" in Singapore. The warm welcome, the room and amenities and breakfast venue and service staff are excellent. Of course, cost is quite pricey. From the check-in front desk service and when I checked out, really felt well served and taken-cared of.

title: Fantastic experience, highly recommended!
desc: Spent 2days1night staycation. Had a free upgrade to city view room! Also, received special birthday blessings from Andaz team, very kind gesture & heart warming. Was out in the afternoon with do not disturb sign on; however hotel staff went extra mild & was kind enough to deliver the special greetings before she gets off work - is the same staff who helped during check in; very dedicated staff! Thank you receptionist (&crew)!

title: Great banquet services!
desc: Attended a wedding banquet at the Glasshouse! The banquet service was exceptional, especially one of the staff Daniel from Bar. His service was on top, every request we made was delivered on spot and he is also quick with his actions! Well done!

title: Andaz Singapore review
desc: Location was great, close to Sentec City and Marina Bay. We stayed there as it was close to F1 entry gates. 1 or 2 MRT stations to F1 entry. Staff were friendly. Clean rooms with panoramic views. Breakfast superb.

title: Andaz experience
desc: I like the difference with Andaz, a little less formal with class. The room was very clean and tidy. Was slightly disappointed in its size, was thinking it would be larger. Having said that the bathroom layout was fabulous and spacious plenty of storage for clothes and cases.Bed was huge (King)a little firm still slept well, windows- floor to ceiling with absolutely fantastic drapery, full block out with a sheer option. Stunning views.The staff at reception were always very friendly and obliging. Staff in food/beverage areas somewhat lacking. Not as friendly and forthcoming to help. Pool area- very small and limiting. Would not visit for the pool. The access is also through the reception which is uncomfortable walking through in pool attire and congested at times.

title: So disappointed, mostly chaotic indifference
desc: A lack of interest by anyone in this hotel. it‚Äôs a soulless place, even a Starbucks inside a safeway has more authenticity than this property. No one is in charge. Or maybe just not paying attention, the absentee general manager who is posted here from Hyatt headquarters? Seems like a Las Vegas strip type of hotel. I am aghast at how much the daily rate was, I guess I should have come with very low expectations. I am embarrassed to have chosen to stay here. Various problems from airport pickup to laundry, and housekeeping. It‚Äôs kind of strange each individual staff member is polite and friendly but inauthentic and powerless but for lip service. Kind of creepy. Reminded me of that scene in HG Wells The Time Machine (1960j and the depiction of the Eloi. Having been to

title: Exceptional Staff / Superb Location
desc: Exceptional service oriented staff, eager to meet guests‚Äô needs. Clean, modern, comfortable rooms. Views of city are spectacular! (Hotel occupies floors 25 - 39 of building). Superb location with underground tunnels connecting hotel to subway system‚Äôs Bugis Junction (‚ÄúMRT‚Äù) with plentiful shopping & groceries. In addition, street level buses just outside of the hotel provide convenient and affordable access to all corners of Singapore.

title: Outstanding Hotel Experience!
desc: Highly recommend the Andaz in Singapore... not only are the rooms and facilities immaculate, it was the staff's attitude, genuine care and demeanour that made the stay one of the best I have ever had.

title: Customer service needs A LOT of work. Look elsewhere!
desc: This is strike 3 for this hotel, and I‚Äôve complained to Hyatt because what in the world‚Ä¶ First off, I had booked this hotel from Tuesday to Saturday (paying a pretty penny, I‚Äôll assure you) and booked flight later which would be arriving at midnight. I asked if I could get an early checkin, pay half a night or some other option ‚Äî getting in at 2 or 3am but they refused. Their right of refusal, though I‚Äôve never seen such a stringent place? I book a different hotel in that case. Second off, finally arrive to the hotel for checkin. No concierge. (I have two luggage and lots of shopping). Walk into the front and there‚Äôs a solo person telling me concierge is on the second floor‚Ä¶ but how will I carry all my bags to the second floor without assistance? He sees the error in his

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Amazing view, so easy to travel as the MRT is connected to the building. Great facilities and was welcoming to our anniversary, would certainly return. Hyatt touch definitely shown and breakfast had a great choice. Great hotel overall would recommend to a friend

title: Excellent!
desc: Booked a staycation for our wedding anniversary & the staff went above and beyond to make our stay pleasurable. & the unique room slippers were a nice touch! the room & food was great too! Wished the pillows were more plush and not too flat and lumpy. Also wished the dinner menu didnt end at 10pm, missed out on some food we wanted to try.

title: Personal Staycation at Andaz
desc: Overall staycay experience has improved but still there is a little improvement required for the housekeeping. However, the customer service is not as what expected. Late check out was granted over the phone but the OIC didn't update my room card access and also someone came to knock on my door to ask me to check out while I was still in shower. What an AMAZING experience!!

title: excellent hotel, very friendly and nice staff
desc: Annas can be recommended quite central, good mrt and easy grab access. Great breakfast, pool area a bit small but ok. rooms nice and new. the bar on top is very nice and has a great view as well as friendly staff and exzellent drinks selection

title: 2nd staycation in Andaz Singapore
desc: It was my 2nd visit to Andaz ( first visit was during the time most movement was restricted and inconvenient, gym and restaurant closed , no buffet) Andaz is my favourite because room ,table ,sofa ,lighting ,mini bar so awesome Before begin my stay ,I pre order 3 dim sum items from 5 on 25. ( although there are few cheaper dim sum restaurants in Bugis, i prefer to try special dim sum meal in hotel Chinese restaurant) On my arrival at Andaz , i sat on lobby to wait till 1.15pm .then i went to reception counter. After getting room located at 26 floor, i entered the room , i was impressed by room layout and brightness of light Went to 5 on 25 restaurant at 25 floor . Was told my meal not ready Thus went to see swimming pool, some part under renovation, then went to sun flower

title: Dinner gathering with friends.
desc: We went to Alley on 25 to have dinner and we ordered a bottle of wine. Nice ambience. I was amazed by Mr Ramon for his excellent service and his thoughtfulness. As i don't take alcohol drink, he served me a glass of free alcohol drink, so i was able to have a *cheers * with my friends He even helped us to made a reservation at the roof top bar and came to check on our dining experience. Mr Roman is really professional and good sense of humour. A memorable visit and surely will be back again.

title: ANDAZ Perfect
desc: Beautiful modern hotel. Very spacious room, with huge bathroom. All the features expected in a high quality international hotel. Great views of Singapore from this hotel as all rooms are above level 25. Staff were exceptional and super friendly. Room was refreshed daily with additional towels and water. Bed was extra large and super comfortable.

title: Enjoyable overnight stay at Andaz Singapore
desc: My wife and I had a very pleasant overnight stay at the Andaz Singapore, where we had an overnight stay en route to see our daughter and her family in Sydney. Everyone, from the manager, Mr Jonah down made us feel welcome and were always attentive and helpful.

title: Very good hotel in Singapore.
desc: This is my family and I first time to Singapore. We lived in 3 different hotels( Marriott Tang Plaza, Conrad, and Andaz). Andaz‚Äôs location is very good. You can take MRT by the lift to B3 directly. However, they do not have executive lounge, but they provide one time daily refill minibar and small lounge for all guests for specific time. The 39th floor observation is very good. The staffs are very friendly. Andaz will be one of my top choice in Singapore next time.

title: There should be better 5 stars hotel out there‚Ä¶
desc: 1) Room service stops at 10pm 2) No one walks us to the room after the check-in .. we brought up our suitcase and looked for the room ourselves felt like a 4-stars experience 3) No one will help u bring up your food delivery (ordered grab food since there is no room service) I was in my pjs collecting my food from level 1 , stuck in a lift full of people dressed to their nines 4) Maybe they are understaffed ; requested for bedroom slippers as the floor was cold , waited for 30 mins , had to call a second time to chase up 5) Do not bother w 665F restaurant ‚Äî unless u just want to only have starters . Starters were amazing , but mains were a letdown . Octopus way over cooked chewing it felt like a workout . Do not order onion rings - extremely sweet made us retched after

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: This was my 2nd stay at this hotel and again I was impressed with the quality of service and cleanliness offered. The location of the hotel is perfect, close to the bay, close to many really good restaurants and shopping. The rooms are nice, clean and modern but, not as spacious as other Hyatt hotels I've been to. The management and staff are courteous and accommodating. I will continue coming to the Andaz on future trips. Excellent hotel!

title: Lunch at Alley on 25
desc: It was my first visit to Andaz. As it was new to me, so I plan my visit there before I dine at Alley on 25. It was a happy visit especially when Shawn, a manager approached me to address my concern willingly. He also assisted me to reserve a table for my next visit. On the day of my visit with my mom, he even came over to greet us, making us feeling at home. Since my last visit, it was a few days away, I never thought he would remember me as he would have met so many customers. Can tell he is very passionate about his job and his service is indeed superb. Another staff that made us a pleasant and happy moments was Horman. He was very attentive as he apologised for the delay of my mains. He gave us bread while waiting for my mains. The restaurant was quite packed and

title: My Stay @Andaz
desc: Overall above my expectation. Anyway its mine 4th time stay there. Hotel near many restaurants and shopping centre and also connected to underground subway station. Looking forward for my next stay there.

title: Beautiful location and nice bed, but hard to find and overhyped
desc: Beautiful property, but I don‚Äôt really know how this hotel is raved up so much. Amazing reviews on Google Maps, TripAdvisor, and even reddit itself. Unfortunately, I didn‚Äôt find it to be worth of 4 and 5-star ratings. The service is almost non-existent. The room is on the smaller end ‚Äî I‚Äôd actually prefer Alila Bangsar in Kuala Lumpur which is the same layout but priced at 1/4 of Andaz Singapore. However, this isn‚Äôt a fair comparison. The location is also weird. The directions to the property aren‚Äôt really clear. From the MRT, you have to head on the escalators to the second floor for Andaz. Don‚Äôt get confused. A few issues came along our way ‚Äî the minibar wasn‚Äôt properly stocked the second day and the rain shower was weak. Overall, I am disappointed and won‚Äôt be returning.

title: A great stay for any occasion
desc: The room was big with ample storage spaces. The interior looks stylish. You‚Äôll be equipped with bath robes, slippers and even iron/ironing board. Refreshments were available before you check-in and in-room mini bar is all yours. Overall, it was a great staycay for anyone looking to relax and get away for the day.

title: A dismal stay.....
desc: For context, I have stayed at Andaz Singapore many times before, usually 3-5 nights. I am also Globalist level at Hyatt Group so I stay regularly in many properties in Europe, the US and Asia (so far this year, 72 nights). Andaz Singapore used to be one of my favorite hotels in Singapore since it has a cool design, good location and comfortable rooms. However, the service, staff training and quality of the food (breakfast, lunch, room service) have declined significantly; of course there are exceptions (for example the restaurant managers were quite competent) but now the reception, operations, GM (no idea who he/she is since never saw anyone approach), check-in and check-out process, etc, etc are now very substandard vs. other 5 star Hyatt properties. Even a busy hotel

title: Excellent stay
desc: The Andaz exceeded my expectations it was a clean hotel with friendly staff. The food and drinks were great. It was easy to get where I needed to get to and there were some great little restaurants very close by

title: Great hotel - excellent service
desc: I was initially put off booking this hotel because of the location. But there are several bars and restaurants around Arab street which gets lively in the evenings, and taxi rides to other areas are not too far. The hotel facilities are excellent, big rooms and all new. The staff are also excellent.

title: Great hotel
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at Andaz. We were well treated as globalist (thank you to customer services team), rooms are nice and modern, service is very good. Pool area had some renovations and sauna was closed but hopefully this will be fixed soon. Breakfast had good variety. Location is also very good in the middle between most tourists spots.

title: Lower than expected
desc: I‚Äôm so disappointed for this brand, especially for the first time. No elite recognition as well. No slippers in the room, but you need to request it. The breakfast is very limited, not many options. Moreover, other outlets restaurants you need to book a reservation 7 days in advance otherwise no seats for the in-house guests.

title: Delightful & Luxurious 3D2N family stay
desc: This was meant to be our first family overseas trip post Covid to enjoy some R&R, and we were so glad we decided to give Andaz Spore a try. Over a two night stay, we have thoroughly enjoyed this modern hotel with all the trimmings, especially the delights on our kids face from the infinity pool on L25. Evelyn from Reservation was courteous & responsive to our queries prior to our arrival, & while we came to appreciate that upgrades are quite scarce by Andaz, as other reviews have attested to, the services more than make up for it during our stay. From Zai the front concierge who organise our taxi to the airport, to Norie the lovely waitstaff at Sunroom who took the extra kind gesture to make hot choc for my 3yo girl, we felt warmly welcomed to Andaz. Our request for an early

title: Amazing stay in SIngapore
desc: High quality of all services. High attention paid to all guests - staff was available at all time, finding solutions to all requests and questions. Very peaceful ambiance - helping to relax. Perfect rooms - very clean and equipped with taste and quality. Great location for the hotel - walking distance to lot of business and entertainment spots. Fantastic Rooftop bar. But beyond everything - I was amazed with the service.

title: Indeed a 5 star hotel
desc: A very nice hotel to stay. It‚Äôs also convenient to stay in this hotel as it‚Äôs easily accessible to places especially the train station is linked. Totally in love with the room . Though i feel the pillow is not as comfortable.

title: Great service, great view, excellent stay with family
desc: Booked a room for a birthday staycation as a family. This is our 2nd time at the hotel because we had a pretty good experience the first time round. Great service by front desk - Staff were welcoming and checking in was a breeze. There was a queue when checking in but was cleared quite fast. We ordered food delivery a couple of times and it was well coordinated by the front desk. We didn't had to wait very long. Room - Room was clean and spacious. We booked Andaz Suite King. Bathroom was spacious and clean as well. Our kids enjoyed their bath time. Breakfast in the room - we had breakfast at the comfort of our room. View was great and food tasted great. Kids enjoyed the food very much too. Request for birthday cake - we requested for a small birthday cake and they gladly

title: Beautiful hotel but staffs need a makeover
desc: Andaz Singapore fell short of being a hospitable, service oriented hotel. We are comparing our 3 nights stay here a few days ago in comparison to our other stays in our month long vacation in (3 nights in PH Istanbul, 2 separate 1 nighters in Grand Hyatt KL, 4 nights in Alila Ubud & 4 nights in Alila Villas Uluwatu, 3 nights in Raffles Singapore). Those previous hotels set the bar & Andaz fell way short. In general, most staffs w came across were not very welcoming or friendly. Example: check in staffs don‚Äôt greet or say good mornings, a couple of the host/hostess at the breakfast carried a face as if you owe them money. Overall, an unfortunate experience. Staffs friendliness & hospitality attracts customers and not just its physical attributes. Andaz Singapore is a very

title: Fabulous Stay
desc: My first stay at Andaz Singapore. overall all the staffs are very professional, friendly and very helpful. I stayed in a nice comfortable suite room with nice view, room is modern and spacious. Easy access to the shopping mall around the area. also strongly recommend to try their rooftop bar Mr. Stork, Chinese restaurant 5 on 25 and steakhouse 665, foods and services are excellent. Absolutely will stay here again

title: Staycation in glam~
desc: A very comfortable and satisfied 4D3N stay there. Got us the room with a city view and it was such an amazing view, personally. Bed was comfortable, toilet was great due to having bidet! Location is great for those that would like to walk around as hotel is located within the heart of Bugis - near Haji Lane, Bugis Junction, Bugis+ & Bugis street. Overall, would definitely stay there again for another staycation :)

title: Impressive Hotel
desc: The room was spacious, organised and clean, we had a nice view and very comfortable workspace. Breakfast was awesome, Laksa was delicious for people who enjoy spicy food. Hotel staff were friendly and professional. Location of hotel is also very convenient, near the mrt and with a lot of good food around the vincinity.

title: Happy staff
desc: This is our 3rd time staying in this hotel. I like it that the staff are happy and chatty. There are 3-4 rooms all connected for mingling, drinks, snacks and meals. It will be good if Andaz can open before 630pm the rooftop garden for strolling.

title: BCT
desc: Very convenient location, walking distance from Bugis MRT station. Near by got many shopping center and restaurant. The Inhouse restaurant also are very nice and good choice esp. Beijing duck at 5 on Alley. Fitness center is very big and many equipment. The swimming pool is nice but without changing room as well need to pass by main entrance and all the restaurant.

title: Great hospitality, awesome breakfast!
desc: Super helpful staff and everyone is so friendly. So much pride in their breakfast spread, high quality food! The sunroom is open until 10pm to serve snacks and drinks, offering a place to chill outside of the room, best of all, it is free!

title: Good stay
desc: Check in was pretty smooth because we went in late. Room was clean and as expected. No bathtub. Wished there was a wider selection for the breakfast. The carpark wasn‚Äôt complimentary so that was a downer. The pillow was extremely soft, almost felt like you were sleeping on nothing.

title: Birthday staycay
desc: Room was super nice and clean. Got the corner room at level 37 and could see sunset! Walking distance to bugis. Staffs were helpful and friendly. It could be better if the breakfast is halal and complimentary as the rooms were already quite expensive.

title: Immaculate and modern
desc: I really love all the Andaz properties I have stayed at. The Andaz Singapore was modern, clean, and incredible. The views were amazing. I stayed in a Large Suite, and I really enjoyed all of the open space and ability to shut off all of the rooms with pocket doors. The shower and its multiple rainfall heads were wonderful. As a Globalist, they allowed me to check in very early without charging for another day, something I truly appreciated. I‚Äôm really spoiled by how amazing the Large Suite was, and it‚Äôll be hard to top that on my future travels.

title: Thank you for the wonderful memory
desc: We had a staycation at Andaz. Room was clean and the check-in/check-out process efficient. The pre-check in WhatsApp was also really helpful - not to mention, very responsive (office hours)! Knowing it was my father's 70th birthday, the staff prepared longevity buns when I went to the 5 on 25 restaurant; as well as macarons as gifts. Pool is relatively small but the Mr. Stork gave an amazing view.

title: Love this place!!! Hospitality beyond words üíØ
desc: We stayed in Andaaz for 8 days on our trip to Singapore in Summer ‚Äò22. As a frequent visitor to Singapore I must stay that this hotel is one of the best. It was a tick on all my requirements for an ideal stay with family. Loved the interiors with a modern vibe. It does like a designer hotel with such niche appearance. We were upgraded to a Marina bay deluxe room & the view was amazing!! The room were carefully designed to maximize space, to give a lux feel for the guests & the bathroom was amazing too. A special word of thanks to Mr. Isaa one of the managers who went above & beyond to meet our every request & also upgraded us to a great room. The entire team was so friendly & dedicated including the house keeping & restaurant staff. Though the quality & taste of the food

title: Best hotel
desc: Overall the best hotel ever i‚Äôve been to! Totally worth it! Will definitely come back again for future stays to host for birthday or anniversary events. Will definitely recommend this hotel to family & friends!

title: Best place to stay in Singapore
desc: The rooms, the view, the staff, the service, the food the way people taking care about their guests is unique. I am traveling quit alot but coming back to the ANDAZ Singapore is always special because of the great people working there!

title: Great stay at andaz
desc: Singaporean staying first time at Andaz. Having stayed in many different hotels both singapore and overseas, this definitely ranked as one of the most comfortable stay. Great breakfast, clean room and staff who are always ready to help staff. Highly recommend.

title: Stay at the Andaz Singapore
desc: Excellent for the short stay we had, great location and easy access to rest of the city. Great ambience and very friendly staff. Would love to see more vegetarian dining options. Reasonable charges for overnight car parking too !

title: Great hotel
desc: If you ever visit Singapore the Andaz is the place to stay. Great location with plenty of options around the hotel. Easy access to transportation. Rooms are spacious, service is great and all of the restaurants are outstanding. Held a seminar at the hotel and the set up for 20 and the price per pax and facility worked great. Highly recommend

title: Love this hotel!
desc: This was an excellent option while in Singapore. Our offices are right next door so very convenient. But the service and rooms were equally appealing. Housekeeping went above and beyond and was prompt each day. The beds were comfy and bathroom stocked with amenities. Food selection at breakfast was also plentiful. We ate on the rooftop restaurant for snacks/drinks, and had great views of the city. Bummed I never got to experience the pool. Will absolutely stay here again.

title: Good and comfort
desc: Comfortable and cleaned Nice view of city view room. Breakfast also provide wide range of options even I‚Äôm vegetarian. Andaz provide a Surprise Pandan cake for my birthday month. So sweet. All the drinks and snacks inside the room is complementary. Most important part is each guest have also welcome cocktail or mock tail for free!

title: Best Staycay-moon Hotel!!
desc: My husband and I were able to check-in earlier than expected and their services were amazing. Such friendly staffs and I really enjoyed their Pandan cake for us to celebrate my wedding day with my husband. Amazing view and facilities. I love everything about the suite that we stayed in. Would totally come back here again for every other anniversaries.

title: Stingy Hyatt status recognition but otherwise an amazing property
desc: I had booked this property for an extended "workation" back when Singapore still had pretty strict entry requirements and the gamble has paid off. I love the Andaz brand from other locations and having lived for many years in Singapore in the past, was super keen to check this one out. I knew already that management here seems to be extremely stingy when it comes to recognises loyal Hyatt members and unfortunately, my stay was no different. There was no proper room upgrade offered which is a disappointment when staying several weeks. In most cases, this goes the other way round as properties understand you need a bit of extra room when staying away from home but I guess it requires a bit of good will and sophistication with their reservation system as otherwise there's always a

title: Andaz!
desc: Had a good stay with andaz! Rooms were clean and had an upgrade to city view. However, the kids pool should be cleaner especially during this covid times. The water in the pool wasn‚Äôt that clean and could see dirt. Other than that, all is good!

title: A nice located property
desc: This was my favorite place to stay when I am in Singapore because of centrally located however due to pandemic some level of services are not back to the previous level due to some new staff however the location is prime.

title: Great stay!
desc: Good clean / luxurious modern room. Had city view which was amazing. Mr stork was awesome and staff friendly. Hotel by Bugis with lots of shopping / food. 5-10 min ride to MB area. Well worth a stay and visit. Enjoyed my stay here :)

title: Easy peasy.
desc: We stayed two nights at the Andaz Singapore last week en route to Thailand. The hotel is impressive, the art is breath-taking and the place functions like a well-oiled machine. The staff are incredibly friendly, helpful and just overall nice people. Our suite was gorgeous and the decor is an A+. Special mention to Sean who made sure we were well taken care of and even personally made sure I got my laksa for breakfast every morning. We‚Äôll definitely be back.

title: Going downhill. Inconsistent service.
desc: This is the third time I stayed at the Andaz but the hotel has gone downhill and lost its way. I do not recommend this hotel if you care about getting quality hotel service. The good 1. Tall tower high floors. Used to have a great view but sadly new developments are increasingly blocking what was once a great view. But no fault of hotel 2. Nice bar on top of the building and nice steakhouse 665 on higher floor. Staff at 665 provide good service which is unusual for the Andaz Singapore. 3. Good tourist location Bugis with good public transportation 4. Handful of good managers and staff who are overwhelmed by mediocrity that is the norm of service. They try to do service recovery but after a while there are too many holes in the service to make up for. Even compared to

title: Exceptional Hotel Experience
desc: Overall an excellent hotel experience. Great customer service, wonderful rooms, a fantastic bed and amazing breakfast buffet. Despite what others have said, the hotel was more than happy to accommodate a slightly later checkout for myself and my travel companion. Would definitely recommend.

title: Swanky without the W bling
desc: Exceptionally good and well designed hotel with an atmosphere not unlike a W, but without the flashy lights. Rooms are great (tip: the tv swivels so you can plug in your laptop or cast when at the table) and filled with amenities. Minibar is stocked daily and is inclusive in the room rates. Rates also include free refreshments at the lounge. However, breakfast is standard stuff, so skip it and save some $$. And for all the locals (or those coming to see fireworks at the bay), the view from the swimming pool is now permanently obstructed by the new guoco tower.

title: Do not expect a little later check-out or get disappointed!
desc: Great hotel, super service but total inflexibility with a little later check-out which shows that they do not anticipate what their guests might like (contrary to their claims). Leaves you with a bad last impression of their service attitude. Never had that in any hotel before.

title: Lovely Hotel in Great Location
desc: Very nice hotel with a very "boutique" feel - Excellent customer service and spacious well equipped rooms. Complimentary in room snacks and drinks are a nice touch. Facilities were well maintained and the variety of options at breakfast would suit all tastes. Very happy with my stay.

title: Excellent Location & Lovely Room! I love the Modern Decor, but lack of Recognition to Globalists & not enough Bell Staff
desc: Andaz Singapore has been on my number one to visit list after the travel restriction is lifted on Singapore. After reading a blog review on the MileLion and achieving my Globalist status, I made a reservation with a reasonable rate. Knowing that the hotel has only a small number of suites, I used my confirmed suite upgrade award for my five nights stay. The suite is beautiful with a lovely living room area. I love the foyer with a huge space for hanging clothes and even changing. The bathroom is huge with a large walk-in shower as well as a bathtub. There are two sinks in the suites with ample spaces for personal items. The view from the room is lovely. It is definitely a good use of my confirmed upgrade, given the limited amount of suites available. However, if you

title: Good stay
desc: Good stay, good choice. Good location and traffic, where you could go to the big mall conveniently. Good room with excellent view, and clean every dayÔºåthe mini bar is free. Food is fine, not too much choice but delicacy.

title: Beautiful Hotel i a Great Location
desc: Andaz Singapore is a beautiful hotel that is within walking distance of great food and several attractions. The staff is very friendly and the breakfast is one of the best I've had in my travels! Highly recommend staying here

title: Comfortable
desc: Overall good , breakfast was great, gym items very well equipped. The room was big and clean, just that at night the aircon seem to be not working, set to level 3 fan and 17.5 degree‚Ä¶ the room feel warm.

title: Excellent hotel.
desc: Very recommended hotel, if you are looking for good location, with train station is jus 1 min walk. Easy access to shopping area. Staff are very professional and pleasant. Service is excellent. Thank you

title: Gorgeous rooms with beautiful views. Service more like a 4 star
desc: Beautifully designed rooms with everything you need on a business trip. Good fridge and amenities. Service is ok but not more than that. Room service was excellent. Didn‚Äôt have breakfast or eat there so can‚Äôt comment on the eating venues. Doesn‚Äôt have a lobby as such So misses that hotel lobby entrance feeling.

title: Great Location
desc: Perfect location for MRT, Arab St and shopping. Just across the road from Atlas cocktail lounge. Comfortable beds, excellent rooms with great service and attention to detail. Visit the rooftop bar on L39 for 360deg views of Singapore.

title: A Great Choice In Singapore
desc: This is one of the better hotels we‚Äôve stayed in. We stayed for three nights. The location is great, with a metro station essentially linked to the hotel, so very easy to get around. The breakfast was great, the rooms were very clean and spacious and the staff were friendly.

title: Great Location
desc: A big imposing hotel with everything you expect and want from a 5* ‚Ä¶ We melted into it after the long haul flight from London the train station is under it and only two stops to Marina Sands ! Close to the Arab quarter and the amazing colourful streets surrounding ‚Ä¶ love , love loved it !

title: Best value hotel
desc: What more would you want from a hotel? Clean connected to public transport And awesome staff. If you are looking for something which does not burst your budget and yet having the the premium experience look no further

title: Staycation with family
desc: Really enjoyed my stay. The complimentary refreshment was what make it more enjoyable for my children as it really kept them and their tummy occupied. :-p Hotel location is also very accessible to good food and shopping.

title: Nice property!
desc: In June 2022, my family stayed for three nights in a Junior Suite. The suite is very nice and the bathroom was the best part of the suite. The breakfast buffet was good. Location is centrally located and it's near a RafflesHospital, so my family can get our pre-departure tests before our next destination.

title: Good but not great for the price.
desc: We stayed week in Singapore at Andaz. Great location, helpful staff, good connectivity. The staff was helpful at all times. Mr. Stork (the rooftop bar) was great and 5ON25 restaurant is also good. But the whole experience felt a bit sterile. It didn't have the zing.

title: A perfect stay
desc: I was travelling with my husband and two kids. It was a long overdue overseas holiday since covid halted everything. And Andaz was the first hotel we stayed in overseas since. I have to say I made the right decision. We spent sometime in The Jewel right after landing and by the time we got to the hotel, we were knackered. The check-in was swift and I was pleasantly surprised that we were upgraded to a bigger suite. The suite was beyond perfect. It was tastefully designed with ample space and spotless. We had the most amazing sunset view everyday. Breakfast choice was vast and everything tasted great. Kids love the sun room for quick refreshing drinks and snacks after we explored the town. Hotel entrance staff were always kind and extremely helpful. It was pouring one day

title: Staff gave poor attitude and empty promise.
desc: Before arriving at the hotel, your staff replied my email that there would be a complimentary box of macaroons for my sister's birthday. I wanted to surprise her with it. But on the day of the stay in Andaz, I had to personally go to the Front Desk two times to ask when it would be delivered (so that I could make arrangements on my side). But I was brushed off by the Front Desk staff as she said she would bring it up to my room. Still, no complimentary sweet treats were delivered to us as promised in the email. If you guys are not sincere or are selective in giving the guests complimentary birthday treats, then just say so. Do not make empty promises. I know the birthday treat is complimentary, but I am complaining because of the attitude and service that your staff gave me. No

title: Stay at Andaz
desc: Overall, I had a wonderful stay. The room is huge and the view is awesome. However, I just want to give feedback that the hotel bed is quite uncomfortable. We have stayed in many 5-star properties in Singapore and the mattress quality in Andaz is rather disappointing. Both my partner and I had body stiffness after that. Perhaps the hotel can look into including an extra comforter to make the bed more comfortable.

title: Nicest hotel I‚Äôve stayed in.
desc: Attentive and courteous staff. Room was spotless, spacious, quiet, comfortable. Huge comfortable bed with great linen. The whole package making this one of the nicest hotels I‚Äôve ever stayed in‚Ä¶ ever‚Ä¶

title: Positive and Negative
desc: There was no bath tub in my room, and that was a kind of unexpected issue. Number of staffs seem low? I called guest service but they didn't pick up for an hour. Belt buckle of my trouser was lost in laundry. They made me feel like it was my fault (maybe right). I am still looking for how to buy that. The other experience was good.

title: Charged Twice !!
desc: Was charged twice. Unsatisfactory response, taking an unreasonable time for a refund. Staff off in ‚ÄúLa-la Land‚Äù. Inattentive staff. Hopefully they will learn from my experience and implement some changes.

title: Impeccable service by Andaz Wedding Team!!!
desc: My husband and I held our solemnization and wedding banquet at Andaz - Garden Studio on 26 Jun 2022 (Sunday). Tiffany (Event Manager), Alvin (Banquet Manager) and the banquet team had provided a professional and wonderful services for our wedding celebration! The wedding was perfect and well-received by our loved ones. They felt at home, warm, and comfortable and this was possible because of all the staff behind the scenes! From the bottom of our hearts, thank you to the team in putting everything together and making our special day such a wonderful and memorable one!

title: Good property
desc: This was Our first hotel stop on a 3 week tour of Singapore and Bali, Stayed 6 nights,Room was great and a good size also no noise heard at all, Mini bar stocked each day complementary only soft drinks though, Liked the rain shower which you should find at most 5* properties these days. Tried a couple of restaurants and the one near the lobby by road. They were on the expensive side so our $100 credit softened the cost. Pool was nice but found it difficult to get a lounger a couple of times as there were not many. The breakfast was included in our rate and was very good with options to cater for most people. There are plenty of places to eat very cheaply in Burgis just a short walk from the hotel, Gardens by the bay is a must visit, But go at night for the fabulous music and

title: Staycation for my mum's birthday
desc: The staffs are all very friendly and helpful. The room is spacious and well kept with very beautiful view. The mini bar is on complimentary, and refresh with a cold drink is nice. Lastly the location is so strategic that is so accessible.

title: Great location and good value
desc: This is our second stay within 2 weeks as we used the Andaz as a stopover for us in between our trip to Langkawi. Before arriving we read many reviews about the Andaz being a bit hit and miss. So I was prepared for this and yes, we did experience areas that can be improved for sure. But overall, I will still come back to stay here with my family as it‚Äôs still a great place and provides great value. We had two interconnecting rooms so our kids could have one and my husband and I the other. Our view was the Marina Bay but because of the massive Suntec building sort of in the way, you can only see a bit of the view. I feel it‚Äôs not necessary to pay the extra for this view. Maybe it was our floor? We were on floor 29. The rooms are beautiful and new looking. And the breakfast

title: Amazing stay
desc: Second time at Andaz and it never disappoints! Immaculate rooms and amazing customer service. Friendly staff. Great variety of food and quality was great too! Happy that buffet style breakfast has now resumed.

title: Awesome stay
desc: The stay was great except for the bad breakfast experience with the breakfast service staff on the 2nd staff. Must say the Sheg at the oriental & noodle station did an awesome job. The room was spacious and design was good. Really quiet and provides good sleep quality and had a great view! The 1 day free cocktail was truly enjoyable. Will be great if Andaz offers a club service for premium room guest. Other than that the stay; food and all was excellent.

title: restful staycation
desc: its a nice hotel, nice location, nice connectivity to transport and amenities, nice people, very thoughtful by providing an area with refreshments throughout the day, I have enjoyed swimming in the pool and I have enjoyed my stay

title: A Big Thank You to Mr Greg
desc: Apart from the hotel which is really good, I want to share on the great experience I had during the hotel stay, in particular about Mr. Greg. We were greeted at the checkin counter by Mr Greg. At the 1st min of our conversation, we knew we had chosen the right hotel to stay. Mr. Greg had excellent customer service; he was patient, had a great listening ear and he even managed to hold a conversation with my 3 year old son. Mr Greg gave us an excellent start to our hotel stay and it ended as an excellent one too. Mr Greg is definitely an asset to the hotel and such customer service definitely will be remembered by guests who will return back to the hotel for such experience. Solid work!

title: No. 1 favorite Staycay hotel in Singapore
desc: Wonderful 2 days‚Äô staycay. Convenient to mrt, malls and eateries. Infinity pool & mr stork (beautiful sunset) worth enjoying with friends! I prefer their breakfast before. Still gotta book breakfast timing and only 1 hour allowed, pretty rush. Advisable to book 9am or after. Anytime b4 815am they will really chase u out when your 1 hr time is up. However pool requires no booking now so definitely much better. Another thing i love is their digital check in! First time using digital check in and i was notified that my room is ready much earlier than normal check in time! Soooo delighted! Room prices have increased now. Glad i book earlier. 3rd time staycay in Andaz and still love every moment of it!

title: Birthday celebration at Andaz Hotel.
desc: We have our stay during my birthday and was happy with their service. The room is spacious and the view is impressive but no birthday surprise for me from the hotel for a 5 stars rating. Last time when im in Bangkok during my birthday with other 4 stars rating hotel, the staffs even gave a surprise birthday cake and present on my birthday during my stay. I ask how they know its my birthday,they said they saw the details on my passprt. Really touching. Overall this is quite a decent and nice hotel with walking distance to bugis.

title: Excellent Experience for Staycation!
desc: This was our first experience having our staycation at Andaz Singapore. At the check in, we were impressed with Quentin who was very professional and courteous in explaining things to us. We were also equally impressed with the other hotel and restaurant staff we came across over the two days as they were also very attentive and helpful. The room was very clean and we were pleasantly surprised with the complimentary mini-bar items (soft drinks and snack) in the fridge as most hotels will charge for them at inflated prices. The breakfast was also very nice with a good spread of food to choose from but we were not aware that we had only one hour to eat until we were told with just 5 minutes left. Perhaps this should have been told upfront by the staff when we arrive for

title: Amazing room, views and people!
desc: It was our first time in Singapore. We used our World of Hyatt membership using our points. For 40k points only, we were able to experience Singapore in the best way possible way. Andaz is an amazing hotel. Great staff. The infinity pool is a way to scape the heat. Rooms are huge and very good for family.

title: Comfy stay in central location
desc: Hotel is situated near central south of Singapore. Linked to the Bugis mrt, it‚Äôs a breeze to get everywhere. The proximity to Bugis Junction also means ease in topping up essentials and groceries. Room is cosy and welcoming, with welcoming and helpful staff.

title: Inconspicuous with an amazing view
desc: The location is hard to beat. We walked to so many places and we‚Äôre able to catch the mrt everywhere including the airport. I really liked that there was a very low key entrance and that the hotel didn‚Äôt feel like a huge crowded monstrosity like other high end hotels in Singapore. The pool was beautiful. But the best was the view from my room which was also the view from the well equipped fitness room.

title: Excellent Service from Arrival to Departure
desc: My family of four enjoyed our recent staycation at the Andaz Singapore. We booked a Studio Suite King room and had a rollaway bed which allowed all four of us get a nice comfortable rest. The bedroom was spacious, clean and hotel staff were attentive and courteous. What made it even more memorable was the night-duty service engineer (Mr Pak Hon) who helped us retrieve a dropped earring into the bathroom sink hole for which we would like to convey our thanks and appreciation for his help! Two-thumbs up!!!

title: Staycation
desc: Had a pleasant stay with my wife for our anniversary. The online check in was fast and convenient. The hotel amenities was very clean and new. The room ambience is perfect for the stay. The location of the hotel was near bugis, one of the busiest shopping and food street in singapore

title: 5 Star hotel
desc: Lovely stay, hope to have oppotunity to stay in again. Like the freeflow drink at lounge, the service and the prompt action. Also very impressed by the gymn equipment, super clean and well set. If the rate can be slightly lower, think will be even more appealing to traveller

title: Excellent stay
desc: The team at Andaz work hard to make your stay feel like you‚Äôre the only person at the hotel. The rooms are excellent and the entertainment and cuisine at 665F are top notch. The roof top bar is a highlight.

title: Great design and views, more care for service recommended
desc: The Andaz Singapore is conveniently located through its direct underground link to the Bugis MRT station, even though heavy car traffic and a number of construction sites around limits its pedestrian accessibility. The pre-communication and pre-organisation regarding our stay was absolutely professional: We were able to move our breakfast to our arrival day, since we did not have the chance to have breakfast on our departure day, and all arrangements were prepared thoroughly by Greg de Drouas and Quentin Carpier. Quentin kept the promise of full understanding of his guests throughout our entire stay, which must be complimented vigourously! Also, our check-in was friendly and well-informed. As Hyatt Globalists, our check- in was even made possible at 7 am and we were

title: Great Short Stay (Couple)
desc: A really pleasant experience that my fiancee and I thoroughly enjoyed. Service was excellent, and the room itself was clean, spacious, and provided everything we needed (including solid wifi and comfy bed). Breakfast buffet is good if not amazing, and the lap pool was clean. Very good location that's connected directly to the train station, and has shops and restaurants a short (air-conditioned) walk away. No real options or activities for children in the hotel itself, so may want to think about that if you travel with kids. Would stay again!

title: Excellent experience!
desc: Hotel was chic, modern and also felt luxurious. More importantly, the service staff knew their work and so many of them went the extra mile to make our stay feel extra special. Thank you for the wonderful time.

title: Nice and clean. Breakfast many varieties.
desc: Very Good ! Clean and nice hotel.. Near to many amenities and the breakfast was one of the best, or among the best of many hotels i stayed in. It is very nearby to Bugis and also MRT stations, thus the travel will be very convenient to other places.. Highly recommended.

title: decent choice
desc: everything is near to perfect for the stay there just advisable not to drive there esp weekdays! not only you have to pay but its quite a walk to the lobby esp when you are carrying heavy items along with you.

title: Twin Standard Room
desc: The hotel is new, specious and clean. There are free refreshment at the lobby. Mini bar is free. We visited Mr Stork at level 39 with a great night scene. Great location. Satisfied with our stayed here. Highly recommended.

title: Great service at 665
desc: Collin and his team went above and beyond to fulfil our request to help out little boy who was dinning with us. As he was sick and wanted some noodles, Collin went above and beyond to get them from the other kitchens. Will definitely return for another visit.

title: Good location and new
desc: Good location. Near several shopping malls and eateries. A short walk from Bugis MRT Station. Was given high floor but unfortunately we did not get a sea view. Although it is expensive, one night stay is not enough given that we can roam to rediscover this part of Singapore.

title: Poor room service and TV sound not working
desc: Sound system not working Breakfast served late due to system glitch issue. Request for late check out denied. In the end all the front desk manager did was a 20% discount for the previous room service order and 2 cakes

title: Perfect Busines Stay
desc: Just checked out of Andaz, and truly unmatched service, great food, staff goes above and beyond for guests comfort. Location wise, walking distance to Raffles City, Suntec Mall and Bugis. Highly recommend booking direct and becoming a Hyatt member, the level of service truly differs by doing so as well. Mohammed at reception was truly a delight, knew my name from day 1, granted me a late check out 4pm since my flight was at 11pm, anything needed was promptly provided. 5 star service from him :) Breakfast was also excellent and refreshments at Sunroom was a refreshing welcome every day coming back from business meetings.. Rooms were large, free mini bar, great toiletries and amenities and the most comfortable bed! Thank you for making my first business trip after the pandemic so

title: Excellent Place
desc: Excellent Service üôåüèº Love the room which is clean. Location is good and it‚Äôs near to the mrt and food places is near. One complaint would be the reception area, it does not look like one and it made me confuse if i was at the right place to check it, but other than that, would definitely recommend to stay here

title: Great place for a stay cation with a view!
desc: We got the highest floor, which came with a great view and automated curtain system that opens up to the floor to ceiling window view overlooking the city skyline, right from the bed. Spacious room with a nice movement flow with two walkways to the toilet. Lovely and welcoming service at the reception, sunroom, and breakfast staff. Head to the top floor for a view (open to public) or choose to have a drink or two in the evening for a relaxing, stargazing night.

title: love it
desc: room was clean, cozy. the gym was nice too. has amazing view. managed to watch the sunset. would love to come back again. expensive but worth every penny. must must try experience staying here at least once

title: Worst experience of a staycation so far
desc: The staff were unobliging and kept telling us their rigid and unfriendly policies. The infinity pool was dirty , my husband ran out of shower gel halfway his shower and had to use the small bar of hand soap. There was a splint in the carpet. How much worse can it get? The only consolation is their breakfast spread, we liked the variety and quality of food.

title: Amazing stay with a gorgeous view
desc: Had a 1 night stay with my partner and enjoyed the great service. Andaz kindly provided a cake for birthday and acceded to my request to allow my acquaintances to setup the room for a small event. The view of the room was amazing, and the location is very assessable ‚Äì right above an MRT station. Would definitely recommend to everyone looking to stay away from the busy shopping belt and CBD area but yet would want to enjoy a great view of the city skyline.

title: Weekend break
desc: Always a comfortable and relaxing stay at Andaz. Cosy interior with a lovely city view. Service is excellent. Great amenities, breakfast and location! Could get to nearby restaurants and mall via underground access.

title: Worst staycation ever
desc: Booked a staycation with my family and 3 children from 30/5/2022 to 01/06/2022, but had to just end it after 1 night stay. Terrible customer service, promises not kept, duty manager not informing us of changes to booking dates that we have made. Was informed by duty manager at 1140hrs to check out that very day. Not recommend to anyone to stay here.

title: staycation
desc: excellent experience in Andaz, we are a family of three with 1 toddler. Service was amazing, rooms were fantastic and food was awesome. highly recommended for friends overseas or local, for business or for families.

title: Staff unhelpful
desc: Some staff simply not interested in answering questions from guests, for example, where to exchange money, where is such a such restaurant, and so on. This standard of service clearly falls short of my expectation

title: We enjoyed our stay!
desc: We enjoyed our stay with our kids. Loved the comfortable, stylish rooms. Convenient location too with the Bugis MRT right under and Raffles Hospital just a block away. Definitely recommending to family and friends.

title: Truly a gem in the city üíé
desc: Hyatt never fails to deliver. It was our first time staying at Andaz and we were so impressed with the quality of materials used, attention to detail and cleanliness of the hotel and our room. The views from our room, gym an pool were wonderful and the whole hotel felt like a luxurious home, not over the top. We will definitely choose Andaz again!

title: Well designed, well though out design room and bathroom. Fantastic view from 33rd floor. Loved by the children too.
desc: Our room was in the 33rd floor which has a breath taking view. The design of the bathroom and room is very functional, and well designs for families. Much thought is put into the quality of what is provided like the slippers, emergency torch, tooth brush etc. Loved the free minibar and refreshments. My kids loved it! Bed was very large and comfortable. Breakfast was great. We would definitely return. Thank you!

title: 10/5 stars!!
desc: My wife and I have been to many hotels and f&b outlets, and let me just say, Andaz has topped our list for both. Service 10/10 Polite, respectful and very welcoming. This is THE standard of service that one would anticipate while booking a stay at a 5 star hotel. Top notch Food 11/10: While we only dined at alley @25 and 665 steakhouse. Both of the food blew us away. Kudos to Colin Yong and his team, shout out to the bartender that let us tried that delicious mocktail with the secret ingredient ( im sorry if i forgot your name but you know who you are ;) ). This place is the best place to grab steak. Albeit slightly on the higher side $$ wise, it's 100% worth it and you get what you pay for. Divine flavours and service. Room 10/10 : What more is there to say? You

title: Andaz Stay
desc: Perfect stay for my 1st trip to Singapore after Covid-19. Facilities is nice and nearby is very convenient. Welcome as Hyatt series Globalist. Nice view hotel, close to Garden in Bay for a nice evening jogging etc

title: Excellent business hotel
desc: First business overseas trip since the end of the pandemic. Excellent, convenient location for meetings. Easy access to two MRT lines and Grab Taxi pickup at the front. Rooftop bar is an impressive place to bring business associates at the end of the day.

title: My thoughts about the room
desc: The room has such an amazing view even though the dots on the window made it a little harder to enjoy the view from up-close. The bed felt amazing, and it was a very spacious room. The bathroom was wonderful but I was hoping for a bathtub.

title: Aweaome hotel near everything
desc: This hotel is superb and is located so that you can get to everything in Singapore easily. Superb staff helped with every need. The hotel was immaculate and well maintained. The breakfast menus had a great variety.

title: A Return Stay at Hyatt Andaz's Large Suite
desc: Booked a special offer online via sale which includes a stay at the Large Suite which came with 200 SGD worth of credits which could be used at most of the F&B establishments as well as for takeaways after checking-out. Checking in was smooth and requests as well as inquiries were met even before the stay without any issues. The large suite is very spacious and could easily accommodate 10-12 people for a gathering. The television allows chromecasting but YouTube is unavailable beyond the hotel's control. The bathroom is incredibly big with two showers within the same compartment, and has both rain shower and conventional shower functions. The bath tub fills up quickly but takes a long time to drain. The view from the bathroom is great as well. The living room and bedroom has

title: Great stay at Andaz Singapore
desc: Service from the staffs was very good and helpful. Condition of the room was excellent. Check-in process was fast and food was excellent there. It was really a great experience staying at andaz and would gladly return for another stay.

title: Great hotel and great location
desc: This fairly new addition to the Hyatt family is excellent. The rooms are spacious, modern and have everything you need. Location is excellent though it took us a couple of days to get our bearings ! The pool, though small, has lovely views - if you want the sun it's only on the pool until lunchtime. We'll be back for sure.

title: Bad phone service and teepee huts but excellent rooms
desc: Had a bad experience with the phone operators prior to checking in. Waste a good chunk of my morning. The teepee huts at the rooftop bar had ants crawling all over the dining table, had to defend our food for long portions of the evening. Rooms were fantastic and loved the rooms so much.

title: Birthday Staycay
desc: When we first got the room, there was still trash on the floor. Called guest services to ask for somebody to come clear it but nobody came. Got tired of waiting and asked to change room. No issues with the rest of the stay afterwards. Room design was quite nice.

title: Fabulous views, fantastic staff, 5-star stay!
desc: We went for an Andaz Suite with stunning views of Marina Bay, Raffles City and surrounding areas. Staff were fantastic and friendly, service with a smile and more. Only downside is parking isn‚Äôt complimentary and you have to take 2 lifts up to room level. Otherwise, an excellent hotel highly recommended :)

title: Andaz Presidential Suite
desc: Room Interiors well done with beautifully chosen furnitures. Good amount of space ideal for family gathering over special occasion. However, overall service experience of presidential suite sub par as compared to my past multiple visits of Andaz residence suite

title: Great place to stay when in Singapore
desc: It‚Äôs beyond expectations when you stayed at Andaz. Nice hotel with great locations and surrounding area. Very comfortable. The service also superb and made us really enjoy to enjoy the hotel. Great place to stay when in Singapore.

title: Good (but not Great) in Almost All Aspects
desc: For my latest stay in Singapore I wanted to try something new and I had never stayed at Andaz Singapore before. Overall I was quite happy with this Andaz, although it was ‚Äúgood‚Äù in most categories rather than ‚Äúgreat‚Äù. As Hyatt Globalist tier member I received an upgrade to the Studio Suite room type. The quality of the hardware was very good except for a few minor issues for example the plug at the bottom of the bathtub was very hard to remove so we had to rely on housekeeping to empty the tub on occasion (or use a knife ourselves), and two of the dispenser bottles broke at one point. Thankfully the hotel also provided toiletries in a gift box set so we did not run out. The main weakness of the room has very little to do with the construction itself but rather the fact

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: Is our 1st visits to Andaz Singapore, we enjoy ourselves so much during the stay. The pools is just nice for the kids and their breakfast is so yummy. Everyone in the hotel is so friendly and helpful... Look forward to visit them again.

title: Great experience.
desc: Highly recommended to stay at least 1 night. Staff were amazing and friendly. They were quick to act upon our request. Overall experience were tip top. Thank you Andaz. We will definitely stay again!!!

title: Good service and view
desc: The staff at Andaz are friendly, knowledgeable. Alway eager to help and make one feel very comfortable. Good service overall We like the view of the city light especially the rooftop bar and the swimming pool areq

title: Perfect City View
desc: The hotel has a fantastic city view and its situated at a very convenient location whereby local food delights, train and malls are within walking distances. The gym room is rather small and tight but the infinity pool gives a great sea view!

title: Great hotel, Great location. Fantastic service
desc: Upscale hotel in great location. Hotel food was great, lots of other food options near by. High walkability score! Room was well appointed, had all the amenities you might need, friendly staff, very service oriented.

title: Family staycation
desc: This was our 2nd visit to Andaz and we had booked 3 rooms for family. Overall experience is good, location is great and rooms are clean. Not sure if it is just coincidental, but we were given the same room as last year. There are some improvement required but we had enjoyed our stay.

title: Delightful Staycation
desc: A very delightful experience on our staycation at Andaz. Overseeing the city view of Singapore with a short walking distance to Bugis brings much convenience. Staff working at Andaz were very helpful, proactive and friendly. The room was spacious and clean, I love how the warm lightning makes it very cosy. The bed was huge and comfortable. Breakfast at Alley On 25 was really nice! The portion was sufficient and served warm. The attentiveness from the staff working at Alley On 25 was really tip top! The roof top view overseeing the city is magnificent with dining options available. Overall, it was a very pleasant stay at Andaz.

title: Long Stay (April 2022 - 3 Weeks)
desc: Quite pricy for the service and amenities you are getting. The hotel looks new and relatively clean, the gym area is small, and the pool is nice. Take note of the inclusions you are getting, I was a long-staying guest (stayed with them for 3 weeks), only got a discount on breakfast, and still had to pay the full price of the laundry which was astronomical. The staffs are friendly though. Take note that if you mark your pillowcase and beddings, you will notice that sometimes it isn't changed and if you call for an explanation they will insist that it was. Saw the cleaner also put the pillows on the ground and then back on the bed. Overall stay during the pandemic was alright, they do provide wipes and masks upon request.

title: Awesome Andaz! Fun, energetic hotel in the heart of the city
desc: Beautifully designed hotel in a really cool, energetic neighborhood. Located conveniently next to Arab St, Bugis, and a nice walk to Marina Bay. Recommend checking out Golden Mile Food Centre, Albert food Centre, Atlas Bar, Arab St bars, and 665 upstairs at the Andaz has great steaks! Pool had great views of the city and the guys at the door were always warm and friendly!

title: Excellent view and very well connected to Bugis (MRT Down-Town) Line from lift at Basement 3
desc: Check-in experience was easy and smooth with a complimentary upgrade to City view at level 29. Room is very clean and spacious. Location is superb with MRT (Bugis) just connected at Basement 3. Staffs were courteous and attentive at dining area (breakfast and high-tea) at level 25.

title: Great Stay
desc: Overall great stay. Paid for a bay view room but the bay view was not really worth paying for, being blocked by Gateway East & West. Should have just settled with city view with breakfast. Wish we had stayed last year when the rate was way better and with breakfast too! That aside, everything else was fine. Stunning views at Mr Stork, but they only open at 3pm. Staff at Mr Stork are not very welcoming if you do not dine. We were just there to soak in the views.

title: Luxurious, comfortable and convenient
desc: Spent 5 days at Andaz with my husband on a wonderful vacation as we were looking for much needed rest. The hotel was beautifully designed and has been well-maintained. The room was clean and included all the basic amenities we needed - iron, ironing board, complimentary snacks, drinks, and bottled water, bathroom amenities. The hotel was also conveniently located - despite the monsoon season, we had no problems getting to the MRT as it was connected by covered and underground walkways directly to Bugis. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and are looking forward to returning next time we're in town.

title: Great hotel - terrible breakfast
desc: I have stayed here many time pre-COVID and super excited to resume this tradition. The hotel and facilities are excellent, welcoming staff and good access to major attractions. If the breakfast is a key choice in your decision for hotel (like me) avoid this hotel. Pre-COVID it was one of the best buffets in Singapore, now it‚Äôs a minimal menu that is really expensive and super bad quality. I am hugely disappointed and will find an alternative for remainder of my stay.

title: Very Disappointing Stay
desc: My stay at this hotel was shockingly bad. The quality has declined precipitously compared to pre-covid standards. Understaffed and underserviced - every aspect of the hotel was subpar. Room service, cleaning, bell service etc all were insufficient. It is a shame. I have stayed at this hotel many times and always had a good experience in the past. I hope they can turn things around.

title: 5 stars ? Even 3 stars can do better!
desc: Stay here for staycation with friend turn out our room no make up and need us to call twice only there someone from housekeeping come for make up room. Never in my life stay in hotel no make up done need myself call them! Seriously? Breakfast overbook! As what I know we require choose slot ? Why will overbook ? Our food not all served and only allow eat 1 hour. If you can‚Äôt serve on time don‚Äôt restrict 1 hour. We need check with person in charge twice and only our food served! And is 45 minutes later. Kitchen busy their answer, if you can‚Äôt cope don‚Äôt allocate guest this timing ! Give me free I also won‚Äôt stay anymore!

title: Great stay
desc: For the areas that it promises to deliver, the andaz does very well of its price point. Excellent location and amenities. Hotel is still in a very good condition although some facilities are designed for a business traveler in mind

title: A very nice experience
desc: Overall, the hotel was great and the staff, in particular, was very helpful. I enjoyed the cleanliness of the place, its proximity to my office and meeting places, and the friendliness of the Andaz staff. I will definitely recommend it to my work colleagues as a great place to stay in Singapore.

title: Birthday Celebration in Andaz
desc: Had the absolute pleasure of staying here for my birthday celebration and as usual, the team never disappoints. Special thanks to Kenzie from FO for helping us with our reservations, and making sure that we are comfortable during our stay! Thanks to everyone at Mr. Stork as well especially to Carlo and Joel for assisting as throughout the night, ensuring that we have the best view and time there. Will definitely return if the opportunity comes up. #WhenInAndaz.

title: Stay anywhere else!
desc: DON‚ÄôT stay at this hotel. Our shower reeked of urineüò∑. It was ‚Äúdeep cleaned‚Äù twice but continued to smell like a public toilet üöΩ. Their solution was to offer a downgrade of our rooms and REFUSED our request for a partial refund. Tiny rooms for the price and unprofessional service. Difficult to even find your way in and out. ‚ÄúGuests‚Äù complaining to each other as they bumble around looking for access.

title: Typical Hyatt room but not the usual Hyatt experience
desc: The hotel occupies the high floors only in the building. Room facility and cleanliness is excellent. A couple of (rather small) restaurants available within the hotel itself, there there are plenty of food options nearby. Quick drop-key checkout.

title: Unbecoming of 5 star hotel
desc: First time staying with Andaz and it's a poor experience. Would not recommend Pros: Room was spacious and good location, Cons: soft product was lacking (i.e. lack of service and lack of attention to detail) Had booked the stay to celebrate my girlfriend's birthday. Staff checking us in didn't read the booking notes and didn't even realise the birthdate on IC was during the stay period Room finishing also looked well worn. Our toilet door couldnt lock properly since it was slanted at the hinges. Room Items were not replenished according to inventory Requested for items but some were out of stock Andaz fell way short of expectations given price paid and the 5 star rating

title: Bakery basket without jam & butter
desc: - Late Checkout - 3pm was swiftly granted upon check in, but rudely told otherwise when i reaffirmed the same night! - Paid Bed and Breakfast for 3 adults - a chaotic morning with a missing set and several items, despite my verbal reservation with guest services upon check in.

title: Staycation @ Andaz
desc: An overall great stay for the weekend. The complimentary drinks and little snacks in the lounge area was good. Customer service was exemplary over the room amenities. Muhammed (front-line), Afiq (F&B) will be CSO that you will want to meet during your stay. :)

title: Great for introverts!
desc: Entering the hotel from the drop-off point left us a little lost as there was no one who bothered to welcome and guide, but service was fine otherwise. Seems like they remain unobtrusive unless specifically approached, which isn't such a bad thing. When you do require service, however, they are quick to respond and polite. Pretty happy with this experience overall.

title: Needs a lot of work
desc: A 5 star hotel with a lot of flaws. The hotel and location itself are very prime and good. The staff are the biggest let down. Training is needed for staff members. Some members are abrupt and some don‚Äôt know anything in relation to guest assistance. Was quite disappointed.

title: How can this hotel is even a five-star hotel, 3 should be more than enough
desc: We check in to the deluxe room with extra bed since we have 3pax, however when we arrive the room the amenities are only for 2 guest and the extra bed is not there. Moreover the room smell very dusty with the carpet which later we need to ask several time for the carpet to be removed. The concierge are also not helpful at all, as I graduated from hotel management school I can confidently confirm that the service I received from concierge is just terrible. Also another time when I ask the desk next to the front desk for the availability of the restaurant on the 36fl, the staff just tell us to check upstairs by ourself instead, is this a standard of a luxury hotel? I will not complain at all if I didn't pay such a high price tag since I believe that the hyatt brand could offer

title: NO HOUSE KEEPING DONE
desc: House keeping is done after complaining. No evening turn down service after 3 nights of complain. Face towels given after 7 nights of stay. Non response from front desk on the house keeping after 2 complain. 3rd complain to duty manager only solve the problem, but explanation not satisfied on the face towels saying that hotel stop giving face towels because hotel on staycation business. Bathroom amenities not replenished even gone, replenished only after complain.

title: Excellent Location and great walk-in closet cum shower/dressing area.
desc: Location of the hotel is excellent. The MRT (Bugis Station, Exit E) is below the hotel, great food within walking distance). Room was very clean. We love the walk-in closet cum shower/dressing room. Love love love it. Highly recommended.

title: My first trip back to Singapore after the Corona crisis
desc: I was surprised how Singapore recovered after the crisis. For me, the Andaz hotel was a very pleasent surprise. I loved the location. It looked like everything was back to normal, the nightlife at arabstreet also the shopping at suntec city‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..

title: Mr Stork a place for everyone any occasion
desc: Came to unwind after work. And this place has a great atmosphere to do so. Gogul the Bar Cap. assisted me. He was always attending to all his guests. Table by table. As I was alone. I could see he was really the backbone of the team. Nevertheless .. the team were as exceptional as well... I will come here. Again and again. Given the fact that i work nearby. My hangout place after work has been cemented. Well done guys

title: Great stay at Andaz
desc: Very chic designs, comfortable stay and good customer service, the lounge with great ambience serves free flow coffee and tea to guests staying in the hotel until 10pm, free in room mini bar. Breakfast is 1 main + free flow appetiser, drinks and desserts served to your table due to covid

title: Lower than my expectation.
desc: Had been staying at the property in the past and was happy with their service. Not this time around, service was way to slow and staff was a bit rude in handling request for additional amenities in the room.

title: No complementary parking
desc: Stayed from Friday to Saturday. Check in at 3 and check out at 3 will require to pay parking of $30+. $2.57 for first hour, $3.20 for subsequent hour ($0.80 per 15mins), per entry at at $3.75 from 6pm to 8am. Personally felt that paying for such price for a staycay at Andaz and it does not includes parking will not justify for another return to Andaz. Hotel also does not bother if you are having an anniversary celebration. No efforts seen to retain staycay guest.

title: Where to even begin?
desc: I couldn‚Äôt imagine staying anywhere else in SG - globalist status recognized immediately and upgraded to a view of the bay. Mr. Stork on the roof is a game changer. Staff everywhere to help you with anything you might need. The elevator will take you directly to the Bugis metro station where all you need to do is tap a credit card at the turnstile and you‚Äôre on your way. Huge thanks to the Andaz team for making this business trip memorable - will definitely be returning.

title: Fantastic Stay
desc: I had a very good experience in 665 degree and the chinese restuarant at 5 on 25. The service staff were friendly and attentive to details. The food at the bar was good and the gin drinks were awesome especially the world's best G&T.

title: Good but not quite 5 star
desc: Functional room with practical good quality fittings but not grand in terms of opulence. The location is central and is very close to CBD, Arab street, Bugis junction, Mariott, Intercontinental, Raffles hospital are in the vicinity. The breakfast is served rather than a self-service buffet possibly due to covid related restrictions. I had requested for a table at the rooftop bar called Mr.Stork. I was offered a pair of Tepee's/tents as there was a dearth of tables. When I came in at the scheduled time I was quite surprised to see that what they were offering was different from what we had discussed during the booking. I was not pleased, but their assistant F&B manager managed the situation well, set up a table and in general went the extra mile to help make our sty comfortable.

title: solo staycation in Andaz
desc: had a great time during my stay, a pity it was only this short and there was construction ongoing! used the Singapore SRV vouchers for this. it was a very rejuvenating stay and i was really surprised by the facilities offered!

title: Choiced Accommodation in Singapore - Andaz!
desc: Very warm and hospitable! Very personable & attentive service from those at the reservation, the front desk to those at the F & B, especially Teresa & team at 5 on 25. The room is compact yet spacious with good & smart use of space. The room is generally clean and comfortable. Nice toiletries by Christophe Laudamiel. Good view of its vicinity from the room - in spite of the ongoing construction projects nearby, pleasant and clear view of Haji Lane, Kampong Glam & the majestic ATLAS. Food quality and service at the F & B joints, especially 5 on 25 is excellent. The Peking Duck at 5 at 25 is better than the famous at Paragon. The claypot eggplant, asparagus with live abalone and dim sum are our favourites too. Their Xiao Long Bao rocks! Only downsides the pillows in the room

title: Great dinner and stay experience
desc: Booked 2 Twin Beds with Bay View, Deluxe with Klook with $100 dining credits. While the reception area seems small, Jaypee was very friendly. Gave a complimentary cake to the room knowing it was my father's birthday. Shower door was glass though, which meant that the additional wooden door partitions were required for privacy Teresa from 5 on 25 was a great host, made great recommendations on the menu, even offering seasonal specials (bamboo clams) which were superb! Would return again for sure!

title: Staycation
desc: Very good location. Near to attractions and city center. Rooms were clean and quiet. Separated shower and WC areas. Ample room for privacy. Aircon not too cold. Good for elders who cannot tolerate too low temperatures. Renovation works and diversion of check-in areas were expertly arranged and very discreet. The service was unobtrusive and efficient.

title: Disappointing stay. Great facilities but bad service.
desc: So many screws up I don‚Äôt even know where to start. Booked the 36h package via Klook using SRV vouchers. Received email from Andaz stating my stay was from 31 Mar to 2 Apr when it was supposed to be from 31 Mar to 1 Apr. So I called them up to ask if they made a mistake because the package clearly stated 36h. Staff from reservation replied ‚ÄúYes it‚Äôs a 3d2n stay‚Äù. Found it hard to believe I paid $250 for 2 days so I called a few times to confirm again, all of them said ‚ÄúYes ma‚Äôam it is 3d2n‚Äù. One of them even sounded irritated because I kept asking if he was sure. I was still very confused but went along anyway. Check-in went smoothly and staff was very nice.
