Told us we were entitled to a $100 dining voucher as it is ‚Äúpart of our 36h package‚Äù. I was very happy that the hotel

title: Excellent
desc: it was an excellent stay. love the room view and structure of the room. service was nice and friendly. breakfast was good too. would come again for a longer stay as the room viiew is spectacular i can stay in all day.

title: Great view hotel!
desc: All staff are friendly and helpful. Check in and out are quick and smooth. Hotel with great view. There's observatory deck at level 34. Near to lots of halal eatery. Quick access to bugis train station at B3 via hotel lift. Highly recommended hotel.

title: Excellent Staycation.
desc: Good Location with good view, Excellent room condition and services were provided during the stay. One of the best hotel visited for my staycation and will definitely be looking forward to my next stay with Andaz Singapore.

title: Best staycation in Andaz with great breakfast choices
desc: Upon registration in Andaz at level 25 , we were welcomed with open arms by your blue coat staff, Didnt manage to catch his names cause we were so excited to check in. At the reception, your staff named Nizam is really helpful and friendly in helping us for a smooth check-in. It was a quick check in tho. He also inform us about few things and confirm with us if we‚Äôre driving cause there‚Äôs no complimentary parking. Breakfast was the best . This is by far the best breakfast i had although its quite limited choice but the portion and also the great service by your staff makes our morning. Customer oriented, greeted us with a smile and also they are quick on their feet, prompt in clearing the empty plates. Kudos to the in charge in managing systematically. Room was spacious

title: Andaz stay Nash
desc: Good service by mr stork staffs, Carlo, Cheryl and Jing Wen. The hotel was good. A few time at the hotel and everything was tip top condition. Minibar this time do not have the andaz beer. Will come back next time üôÇ.

title: Andaz Singapore - the Heart of your trip
desc: Location - best as near to all amenities Convenient, clean,friendly staff, superb view. Easy excess to anywhere and everywhere. Near to pubs, mosques, food centres, shopping, traditional stuff and modern ones. All walks of live in front of your eyes! Superb

title: Worst Andaz stayed at so far
desc: Unfortunately this Andaz does not fulfill my expectations. I would not stay here again Positive: good location, nicely furnished modern rooms, pool looks nice (but did not go there) Negative - no central slot booking system for gym/ breakfast/ pool, they expect you to book via Facebook messenger -> other hotels developed an app - gym access: having booked a slot for the gym on level 38, you need to go to the pool first (level 25) to get a key (reception did not tell me, so I first had to ask at the restaurant on level 38) - super inconvenient process - breakfast: no freshly squeezed juices, limited international selection of food items, waiters do not know items (which is ok but also don‚Äôt offer to ask), avocado toast tastes a bit sour - seating in alley 25 is more canteen

title: Enjoyable Staycation.
desc: Love the location and views surrounding the hotel. Unique interior designs in the room, super comfy bed and clean bathroom. Would be back for a future visit, and I would recommend Andaz to my friends.

title: Klook staycation
desc: Wonderfully designed room and facilities. I personally preferred the cheaper City view. My only regret was the lack of a supper menu for in-room dining after 1030pm. I would like to commend the team for their efficiency in the delivery of orders.

title: Relaxing, Comfortable, Easy Access to Shopping Mall
desc: It's my best staycation ever. Relaxing and comfortable stay. Room is very big and nice. Friendly staff. Walking distance to Bugis Junction and MRT. Peaceful and quiet environment. Definitely recommend.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Rooms are clean and comfortable. Service is efficient. There are several counters for check in so it was quick and efficient. Due to the size and layout of the hotel, however, facilities are more limited compared to other hotels. But it is a good place for a relaxing quick getaway and if you like to be left alone without a lot of staff hovering about.

title: Pop'up Disney staycation
desc: Staff that serve us to check in the hotel is very friendly. And the view from the hotel is amazing. Mange to navigate the hotel app easily. We thought that there is bathtub in the room. But overall experience is excellent. Great job andez . We will be back for more

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: Had a wonderful experience at the Andaz. Went for the 36-hour package which gave us sufficient time to enjoy the hotel as well as its surrounds. Warm, friendly staff, check in was a breeze. Gym was well equipped and clean. And we also had a great meal at 5 on 25. Will definitely want to return!

title: hotel room
desc: The hotel room is spacious and staffs is pleasant and accommodating. The room is equipped with drinks and snack and is complimentary per stay . Besides that guest also can obtained take away drink from the lobby at times during their stay

title: Great hotel for staycation
desc: Booked Andaz for staycation and it was the best decision made. Hotel staff were friendly and polite. Hotel room also have all the amenities. The room is bright with a lot of natural light and the bathroom was well designed with powder area for ladies. The room is also very clean! The location of the hotel is great with a lot of food choices nearby. It can be linked to bugis station too. Very conveniently located. I‚Äôve heard many good reviews from friends and indeed, Andaz did not disappoint!

title: The Staff need to go for a training
desc: The room in Andaz is very comforting & nice. But this "comforting & nice" feel are lost once we are out of the room. I had 3 unpleasant experience at the same place - Sun Room where they provide complimentary refreshment & snacks to guest. 1) I went to check if everything is in order for next day breakfast for 4 pax (my sister and husband checked in the day before). Check in counter told me to refer to Sun Room. I went in, saw 2 gentlemen & a lady a the counter. I assume they are guest like me.. So I did not "see" any staff so I walked out to the Bar Square to seek help where the staff lead me into Sun Room again & point to me that 3 people at the counters are staff. Well, in the first place when I first went in, they should have acknowledged themselves. 2) When we walked in,

title: Excellent
desc: celebrate birthday here and have staycation for one night. room is cozy with nice city view. they also brought us a nice birthday cake! staff is friendly and helpful. breakfast is ok. gym is clean and machine looks well maintained.

title: Unpleasant stay at Andaz
desc: Day 1: Extremely unpleasant check in process. With the peak check in timing , there is only 1 staff at reception and the queue had to form. Moreover, I was invited to online check in prior and I have already checked in successfully. Yet the whole family has to still queue up due to the poor arrangements. Day 2: The room was fantastic coupled with the location of the hotel. However the breakfast was extremely disappointing with rude experienced staff coupled with 2 inexperienced new staff. There was loud coaching session done by the senior staff throughout my hour here (at least 6-7 times) and he was standing in the middle of the floor to lecture them. The lecturing took place disregard of our waving for service. Only senior staff can take orders but he was not friendly nor

title: Wonderful Staycation at Andaz Singapore
desc: We have had a wonderful time at Andaz Singapore. The breakfast was excellent. We hope to experience dining at 665 Deg F restuarant and Mr Stock in our next visit. The staff were very helpful and friendly.

title: Definitely worth every dollar spent. Amazing experience!
desc: Loved the room, spacious, clean, and bright! With a great view, you can really stay in throughout the entire day! Looking forward to visit the pool and gym too! Will definitely visit again soon! One of the best stays I've had in Singapore üá∏üá¨!

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Very nice hotel, good F&B choice, good room.. unfortunately swimming pool is a bit small but it is a good infinity pool design. Thx you for the macarons and birthday card as well. Stay with kids and wife and overall is very good

title: Nice room view & Friendly check in
desc: We reserved for a standard room was offered a special price for city view upgrade. This able us to have great view of the skyline. Check in time was crowded but in orderly manner. We are able to enjoy take out complimentary drinks eg, coffee/tea, lemonade etc at sunroom during specific timing daily. Inside guest room we can enjoy the items in minibar once per stay which I feel is a good gesture of welcoming guest. It was my hubby‚Äôs birthday and our rom anniversary, hotel provided box of macarons and a birthday card. Overall experience was pleasant :)

title: Acceptable Stayca
desc: Poor directional sign, bfast not enjoyable due to 60min time and small table arising to table full of plates, bedside lighting posed risk hazard to head injury. Service and Cleanliness is reasonably acceptable.

title: Disappointed with the service
desc: Stayed there for 3d2n for our anniversary. Went to Sunroom on the first night. My husband and I got a seat and enjoyed ourselves. My sister and brother in law came to stayed another room by themselves on our second night. Brought them to Sunroom. We were told that drinks are only allow to take and go. Felt so strange that how come we can sit there to have drinks on the first night but not the second night. We reserved a table at 8.30pm at 665 Degrees Fahrenheit for dinner. It was very crowded. The staff guided us to Sunroom to have a drink while waiting for a table at 665. This time, the staff from Sunroom told us the same thing! He said only allow to take and go. We were shocked and told him that the staff from 665 who are just behind him asked us to wait here. We felt being

title: Great staycation!
desc: We have a great staycation in Andaz Singapore. this hotel is everything about digital eventhough everything is digital, they have excellent customer service, our complaint was settled promptly and with professional way. Last but not least, their food is really above our expectation, we have a really nice food served by heart from the kitchen team. keep up the good work!

title: Good hotel but below par customer service
desc: It is so called 5 star hotel but definitely not the service. Very SOP oriented and not customer centric. More training or communication among different departments. The hotel design and location is good.

title: Friendly and helpful staff
desc: Would like to compliment Scott. Scott is very friendly and helpful. Appreciate his assistance to book breakfast slot. As we did not receive a pre-checking email to book the breakfast, during checkin, we were direct by the check-in staff to the Sunroom to book the breakfast slot. Scott, at the sunroom was very helpful and made it so hassle-free to book the next day breakfast slot. We met Scott again at the swimming pool. Would like thanks him us to take photos. He offered a bath towel for my 11 years old when we are going back to hotel room after the swimming when he saw my girl feeling cold and shivering a little.

title: 5 star facility, 3 star staffing
desc: Most of the staff want to do a good job, but it‚Äôs like they‚Äôve recently been hired straight out of school and haven‚Äôt been trained well. Service is very inconsistent. Sometimes prompt and helpful, other times non-existent. Reservations in 665 are also seem to be artificially scarce. I found i could get a table just by showing up.

title: AAA Location and Comfy Stay
desc: It‚Äôs a very new hotel with excellent condition and cleanliness. Location of hotel is perfect - walking distance to Bugis & Arab street area, nestled among heritage buildings and shopping stripes. The MRT is situated just below the hotel that makes traveling to anywhere cross island so convenient. There are tons of food options around; Halal and non-Halal. One of the best place for tourists and staycation venue for locals. Love the stay, the hotel staff are friendly and helpful. Quick key drop-off checkout with no hassle is so convenient but only when you use credit card for security deposit when checking in. Highly recommended!

title: Excellent room and service!
desc: 2-night stay and room and bathroom was clean. Little details that made it easier were much appreciated. For eg, the shower handle is a giant knob you need to turn and the last time i stayed there, it was so hard to turn the water on with slippery, soapy hands. But they added a rubberised strip on the knob and so it‚Äôs much more convenient now. Even though it was a short stay, minibar was replenished and room was cleaned even though i insisted that she didnt need to. The housekeeping cleaned the floor and bathroom, refreshed the towels and toiletries and made the bed, all with a smile. Thank you!

title: A very nice stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay in this beautiful hotel! Very convenient location - Bugis MRT station is accessible from the basement level of the hotel. Rooms and common areas are spotless, and the staff is fantastic. Highly recommend.

title: Clean, Comfortable, Scenic
desc: Pretty comfortable room. clean and cozy. Staff are friendly and helpful. Good for family. Accessible to shopping malls through underpass. Breakfast spread is good. Check-in process is smooth and easy.

title: Huge hotel beds
desc: Stayed here just a short week ago. Hotel's concept is quite unique I would say, Staffs are clad in a laidback, tucked out work outfit. Initially we don't even know they are staffs working in the hotel. Customer service is excellent, quick & efficient. Rooms are beautiful. Beds are hugeeeeee. I've never been to a hotel room that has such a huge bed Pillows are soft. Some hotels provide hard pillows just because it looks presentable when placed on bed. Breakfast is fantastic. Even during covid, I would say it is quite a variety and real tasty. Location is everything here. Walking distance to Haji Lane. Plenty of cafes and bars that opens till late. Could do a little shopping down the lane too.

title: Greats hotel but poor service
desc: Small check in lobby, Big rooms but no bathtub for standard rooms. Great room interior, clean rooms but poor customer service for a 5* hotel. Poor service in terms of staff availability, responsiveness & timeliness

title: Wonderful location n big room
desc: Location is superb. It's just above Bugis downtown line. Great for shopping and dining. We had the large twin suite and it was exceptionally big and clean. Staff was polite. Room service was fast. We met one of the staff, Scott at the swimming pool area. He was very polite and paid attention to the guests needs.

title: Perfect getaway in a perfect location
desc: Second stay at Andaz, and there are so many reasons why we chose to return despite a plethora of choices. The location is great - there is so much to see and do in the vicinity. We love the flexible and seamless design of the room with a walk-in wardrobe attached to the bath area. The Bay View room offered a panoramic view of the Singapore skyline, just as the pool and gym. Imagine yourself running into the city while on the treadmill! The Sunroom offered free flow drinks and snacks, and that is on top of the free minibar in room (once). Breakfast at Alley on 25 gave a hearty start to the day after a great morning workout at the gym with its free flow continental! Special shout-out to Auntie Laksa!! To top it all off, the staff is warm, friendly, hospitable and accommodating to

title: Wonderful Staycation Experience!
desc: From online check-in to check-out, the process was smooth and easy. Staff were responsive and helpful. We stayed in a beautiful, spacious room on the 37th level and had a spectacular view of the city. Meals at Alley on 25 were a real treat. Food was delicious and the portion size was just right. Apart from the pillows, which were too flat and soft, our stay on the whole was wonderful.

title: Staycation with kids
desc: It was a great staycation as the design of some rooms is suitable for kids to run around. The only pity part is there is no bathtub else it will be perfect. The food is excellent plus the pool staff was doing more than he should which is a plus plus.

title: Excellent choice of stay
desc: Andaz Singapore is a wonderful hotel to stay in. The place is clean, new and the staff are helpful. It is also near many places of visit and has both MRT (train) and bus services. Very convenient! Altogether a very comfortable and pleasant experience.

title: Great Staycation Choice
desc: Staycation using Discovery voucher on the 36hrs stay promotion was tremendous. Interesting package of 36hrs instead of the common 24hrs stay. Facilities are nice. Swimming pool design lack surprising factor. Staff service was warm and professional. Good choice for short stay especially the amenities around the hotel location are fantastic. Many eateries around and interesting joints to visit.

title: A superb and excellent hotel!
desc: A superb hotel with excellent facilities and good food and a scenic view,the staff are very kind and helpful as well!Thank you for the wonderful stay Andaz!! I recommend it for many people.we will surely come again!

title: Wonderful stay as usual
desc: We celebrated my husband‚Äôs birthday with a weekend at Andaz, and the room, view, facilities did not disappoint. Hotel is well located and an easy walk to City Hall and Bugis. We also enjoyed the daily breakfast, which had a good selection of options.

title: Staycation at Andaz
desc: It was our first time having staycation at Andaz! My husband and I found our stay at the hotel very relaxing and satisfying. We stayed there for 3D2N. However, breakfast was not included so we had to pay for it separately. $25 per pax. Nevertheless, we enjoyed the breakfast and did not mind paying extra for it. We also went to the Pool and Observation Deck! Love the scenery although there are still construction of buildings around. We booked a room that has the bay view. We also love the fact that the drinks and snacks are complimentary. Just a feedback on their uniform. They do not look like a Hotel Staff. Unsure of their intention of having such dresscode. Probably to be more welcoming of guests who are staying there or just want to blend in with the guests by giving off a

title: Amazing as Always!
desc: We were here last in 2018 and four years later, everything is still in tip top condition! Love how spacious the room is, the incredible view, and the excellent location. The staff, especially the pool boy, made us feel welcomed and contributed to the memorable experience. Still my favourite hotel after all these years!

title: Excellent Location
desc: Very convenient, MRT is just below the hotel (served by 2 MRT lines). Lots of nice food around too. For those who love culture, Malay Heritage Museum is a stone throw away. Also, must visit roof top Mr Stork for a panoramic view of Singapore. Beautiful!

title: 1 night staycation
desc: My stay was pleasant on the first day. But the next day was a total turn off. The room service department actually opened my room door not once but twice. We had a late check out as per prearranged due to late check in. It‚Äôs not my fault that the system was not updated. The room cleaning personnel did press the bell. But straight after the bell rang, they just open the door. There‚Äôs no time for us to react. It was a total turn off for staying at this hotel. It‚Äôs like they are chasing us off.

title: Excellent stay!
desc: Recently stayed at Andaz Singapore under the name 36 hours experience where check in was as early as 9am and check out was at 9pm the day later. Everything was smooth from check in to check out. Really enjoyed the room with its window deco and high floor with views of the mysterious Gotham-like building. Breakfast had a good spread with free-flow of appetisers and selection of one main. Minibar was also complimentary.

title: Awesome stay!
desc: Clean & hygienic property in a strategic location with extremely efficient & helpful staff! Stayed in 37th floor with a marvelous view of Singapore..... Good breakfast with many varieties. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay!

title: Great experience
desc: Book this staycay as a birthday celebration for my sister. Enjoy the attentive services by the staff throughout the stay. The room was bigger than expected. Was given a room at level 37, the view was amazing. Location was convenient and close to mall and public transport. Though it took a while to figure out how to get the to lift lobby of Andaz (use the escalator nearby Man Man) We love the experience so much that we would like to revisit again.

title: Great location
desc: Check in location on the 25th storey was different from other hotels. Was given a complimentary breakfast for my 3 nights stay due to room was not ready but cant use it as the food was not halal. Should have given a free room upgrade at least. Room was.on the 37th floor third highest floor. view was nice but bed and pillows not comfortable. pillows was too soft that it flattens and bed was too hard. Theres a bose Bluetooth speaker and the tv can be adjusted to many angles. Theres an expresso machine and complimentary minibar.

title: STAYCAY = Me Time
desc: Staycay @ Andaz was a great choice. Though it was more expensive than what I usually would spend, but the room and view was beyond expectation and was worth the price. It was accessible to both Bugis's shopping district and Arab street.

title: Wonderful stay.
desc: Stayed in the Andaz Residence Suite with the Disney package where a few plushies were given. The staff were really polite and attentive to my enquiries. The guy who checked me in were really nice and polite (but unfortunately i did not manage to get his name) The room was big and it was noise proof for sure. The booking slots for facilities were rather easy to access too. Will definitely come back again.

title: Celebration our ROM Anniversaries
desc: First staycations with my husband feel comfortable ,beautiful Scenery and happy too. Enjoy room Mimi bar .Next staycations will upgrade to room service. Will introduce my friends and family for Andza Singapore

title: My fave hotel at the moment
desc: Room check-in was really quick and hassle free. The room we stayed in had a really great view, and the room itself was gorgeous. Would definitely return and experience the suites instead. Worth the money.

title: Andaz Staycation
desc: In terms of location of the hotel is very convenient around bugis and City hall area. There's a underpass linked via MRT station to bugis junction so travelling with family is good. However, the overall hotel experience is below expectation as the hotel policy is very restrictive. For instance, strictly abide to the early check in and/or check out timing (always full booking), booking of gym and pool is limited to 1 time per day when staycation is meant to make use of the facilities. The breakfast mains portion has reduced in size and each session to dine is limited to 60mins...

title: Overall good stay with some room for improvements . Would recommend
desc: Did a staycation at Andaz for my birthday and had a great time overall. Although there was some construction and maintenance work going on, the rooms were of a good size and the service was great. The hotel has a very nice vibe overall. We went to Mr Stork in the afternoon for drinks, and they gave a free birthday cake, as well as a pandan cake (paid as they only had macaroon option) delivered to the room. I would suggest to deliver upon checking in rather than at night for a better surprise though. They also kindly offered a late checkout. Will add that our room didn‚Äôt include breakfast because we redeemed with points and for the price, I felt like only offering one main was kind of expensive and should be given the option to at least get two. I got the shakshuka and it

title: Surprisingly great with baby
desc: We had a lovely time with our 16month in the suite, the layout allowed us to put baby in the living room whilst we still had the rest of the room to enjoy ourselves. The room was also surprisingly safe for baby to roam around so even in wet weather baby wasn‚Äôt too bored in room.

title: Andaz is not a Halal-friendly Hotel
desc: To all my Muslim brothers and sisters. please take note that Andaz Hotel in Singapore does not serve Halal breakfast and no longer has a restaurant that caters to the Muslim community. The only hotel worth staying in Spore that caters to Halal food is the Royal Plaza by Scotts and Parkway Royal Marina Bay, formerly Marina Mandarin.

title: Spectacular hotel room, view and breakfast.
desc: Would visit again. Very nice hotel with very good size room, spectacular view and breakfast is awesome! The high tea is a plus. Swimming pool can be better if there is more seats. Mayb a little more personal service will be a perfect stay!

title: Stay cation
desc: Happy & enjoyable staycation with 36 hours package stay at Andaz Singapore. Every staff members are cheerful, friendly, approachable from check in, at the service lift and check out. We will be back if there is more of this 36 hours package stay.

title: Staycation at Andaz Singapore
desc: Very good hotel, especially like 39 floor that can walk around to see Singapore night scene. Breakfast is okay. Chinese restaurant food is delicious. Location is convenient, nice food nearby and go shopping at walking distance.

title: Enjoyable stay
desc: Hotel has excellent view of Singapore . Nic e pool . Very convenient to move around as the MRT train station is just below the hotel with a 7/11 store and restaurants are all walking distance . Excellent service provided by Andaz . We enjoyed our stay very much !

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: The hotel is really nice and new, room is huge and has all the basic amenities you need for a stay. As I book the stay for my birthday, the staff arranged for me to have a small birthday treat which surprises me

title: All Good except loud AC noise in room
desc: Better than expected as staycation, stay during the Disney pop station package. Walking distance to Bugis / Golden mile / beach road Breakfast at level 25 require booking, got the last slot of 10.15am where 60mins of breakfast which staff politely informed that they need to turn over for lunch.

title: Pleasant Stay
desc: The stay was relaxing. Location wise, need not to say much. Walking distance to Lavendar, Bugis, Haji Lane. Very convenient as near to MRT stations, as well as there's alot of eating place around.. Service was good. Seamless check-in. Suggest to go earlier for the check-in else the queue will be long at 3pm check-in time. Personal preference, i feel that the pillows and bed are too hard. I kept waking up on the first night but after changing to a softer pillow, i slept very well on the second night.

title: Staycation at Andaz
desc: Amenities and decor were above expectation, brand new and modern. The view at the pool is great except for the tall building that is under construction. My Stork was amazing and definitely recommended for a nice romantic dinner. Location is superb, close to Bugis Junction and MRT.

title: Review on 2 nights stay
desc: The hotel room and bed was quite big. Since the hotel is quite new and the condition was very good. The only area of improvement will be probably a smart TV with Netflix, Disney+, etc. Also the pillow is abit too soft which lacks support.

title: 36 hours Staycation
desc: We wanted to use our Singapore üá∏üá¨ discovery vouchers and looked at Klook for good deals ! This 36 hours staycation was too tempting 9am on 1st day to 9pm the next day ! The room was fantastic big , the bed was giant double queen enough for 4 pax to sleep side by side ! The restraunts were excellent, (pls refer to my other reviews) The management immediately sent a birthday gift to the room after finding out. All the staff were extremely casual and friendly and check in and check out was extremely fast ! The 36 hours deal also include tea and breakfast (excellent choice to order buffet ) we wanna come back again if the 36 hours deal is back !

title: Great stay at Andaz
desc: Great service, superb room cleanliness and facilities. Food selection at the L25 restaurants and cafe was varied. Breakfast at the cafe had a wide selection ranging from local delights to popular western dishes. Highly recommended to all to try Andaz for a local staycation.

title: Exceptional customer service and luxurious accomodation!
desc: Had a fantastic experience at Andaz! Gab, who checked me in, had amazing customer service. Staff in the hotel were friendly and helpful too. I stayed in the King Deluxe with a nice panoramic city view. There was a chromecast in the room, which meant Netflix/Disney+/Youtube could be streamed onto the TV (great for binge watching on a staycation). Having a separate toilet and shower was convenient. I liked how you could have the rain shower and the shower head on at the same time (shiok)! I had a very restful sleep because the bed was comfortable, the room had blackout curtains and different firmness of pillows were appreciated.

title: Staycay at Andaz
desc: The 1 night stay at Andaz was much better than we expected. Staff were friendly and check in was in order, free flow beverages at sunset room. We had the $100 food credits which we spent on dinner at Alley on 25. overall food quality was good, we ordered the pizza, bbq pork ribs and dessert. Breakfast was good too, and serving speed is fast.

title: Staycation
desc: Nice, cozy hotel with great views! Room was clean and well maintained. Made use of the $100 dining credit at Alley on 25 and the food was great! Complimentary breakfast was also nice. Staff were attentive and helpful.

title: Spacious & Comfortable Rooms
desc: Introduction Located about 30 minutes drive away from the Changi international airport in Singapore, Andaz Singapore is a 5-star luxury hotel co-located with the DUO Galleria mixed-use development. Presently in the midst of upgrading their facilities (as of February 2022), Andaz Singapore is built on one of the 2 land parcels co-owned by Malaysia in a historic 2010 land swop deal with Singapore, hence, the iconic Islamic-inspired architecture and design of the external facade, resembling a honeycomb. Ambience Ambience at Andaz Singapore exudes a modern luxury. Gleaming marble walls lit by warm decorative hanging lights, with window views across the city, evokes a sense of awe. However, the harsh sunlight streams in at certain points throughout the day, heating the place. Love

title: Great Staycation Experience
desc: After 2 years plus not able to do travel and staycation. Finally waiting for this staycation. My experience with Andaz - staffs show great customer service level nice foodies, clean room and great night view at the roof top restaurant Mr Stork. Most important I found my right type of pillow but too bad not able to purchase, their helpful guest officer has assisted me with details and where can I purchase it. I will be back again with my family.

title: Hotel overall Services
desc: The staff there are friendly and helpful, Detailed and efficient Reception and Rooms service are good too. 25 on alley staff and manager are nice and patient. We also very appreciate The Chinese restaurant 5 on 25 staff She so sweet, when she realise we celebrating birthday, they did the birthday bun for us and send to our rooms. So touch by their service Their Overall service is great and excellent.

title: Disappointing experience
desc: Had a disappointing experience at Andaz. Stayed on 28/2/22 - 2/3/22, room 3504. Requested through guest service for room makeup while we were out for almost 5 hours, expecting to come back to a tidied room, however, shockingly, our room was not makeup at all. The staff who answered our call acknowledged and reminded us not to put on the do not disturb sign, which we did. Furthermore, we indicated our preference for housekeeping to be done in the morning. Nothing was done when we are back after 1.5hrs of breakfast . If the timing cannot be kept, then what is the point of providing an option to indicate our preference. This is the first time that we encountered such lack in basic service of housekeeping. Atter hearing good reviews about Andaz, we booked syaycation for our

title: Good value staycay
desc: My husband and I, together with another couple had a wonderful staycay at the Andaz. Room had great views and very sizeable, very comfortable and modern and clean. Loved the rain shower. Breakfast was good and well managed through their booking system. No breakfast line!! Will highly recommend this hotel.

title: Andaz Suite
desc: For wedding celebration, took the large King suite. Overall experience was great wz the view and the size. Disappointed by the room TV that auto on by itself after switching off. And in the night, can hear sounds coming fm the toilet.

title: Great food and staycation at Andaz
desc: We had dinner at Alley on 25. As usual, the food was great as well as the services provided by Joey and her team. This is my second staycation at Andaz and their services have exceeded my expectations so far.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Great location. Friendly staff. Easy and fast check in and check out process. Room is big and clean. Thank you for allowing us to check in early. Wished I have stayed longer. Will definitely consider coming back again for my next staycation.

title: Exceptional service, beautiful decor, clean and new hotel - wonderful stay!
desc: My husband and I recently celebrated our wedding lunch reception on 26-27th Feb 2022. We can only say good things about Andaz, because it was exceptional! The cleanliness of the bridal suite, the check in process, the decor and quality of rooms, but we would like to recognise the exceptional service of your staff. The bellhop, room service, restaurant and banquet staff showed nothing but joy and professionalism which made our special weekend even more memorable. Our guests and friends also shared with us their feedback that the staff was so friendly and this made their experience at Andaz an impactful one. I wish to highlight the exceptional service of Valerie Foo (salesperson) and Apple (banquet manager) who worked tirelessly to ensure a smooth luncheon - and we noticed it, and

title: Relaxing staycation
desc: Excellent breakfast! Room and Swimming Pool comes with panoramic view of the city. Nice Roof Top Bar (Mr Stork) with night city view. The afternoon Tea was somewhat a let-down though: Wonton Soup tasted like sea water. Amongst all the nibbles served, only the ice cream has left a good after taste.

title: Great room, excellent location to MRT and mall, superb view of the sea
desc: The rooms, restaurants, lobby were new and modern. Excellent location with direct underground to the MRT and Bugis Junction. Lots of good restaurants at Tan Kwee Lan St. Were fortunate to meet a couple of outstanding employees. Scott at the pool was very friendly and caring - he offered a float for my 3-year-old and additional towels when they were cold. Another employee who brought us a complimentary cake went the extra mile to exchange the cake for another flavour when he realised the birthday cake is for a kid who loves chocolate. Would have provided 5 stars but felt that there are still areas of improvements: not all the employees were friendly and service-oriented. It's nice the hotel offered complimentary drinks at Sun Room but the paper cups for cold drinks don't look

title: Comfortable stay, wonderful service
desc: Booked a night's stay with my partner to celebrate Valentines' Day. Room was comfortable and beautiful, we loved the bay view. Staff were extremely friendly and quick. Food was excellent. I absolutely loved my stay here! Air-con was a little hot, had some trouble sleeping.

title: Excellent Staycation - relaxing and pleasant stay
desc: Great experience when I was here for a staycation with my family. Had a smooth and pleasant check-in with Adrian Tam, and we had a great time at the pool - all thanks to the wonderfully attentive and friendly service extended by Scott. The rooms were clean and well furnished. The food selection available for in-room dining was quite good and the dishes were quite well prepared. Had a relaxing and pleasant afternoon tea at the Sunroom. Overall quite a good hotel for a relaxing staycation with the family.

title: great stay at Andaz
desc: WE had heard that the place is nice. Well I will definitely agree that it is a great place to spend a staycation. I recently booked in a one-nite stay and enjoyed both the hospitality and good food. IT was well worth every $$ spent. At Mr Stork we managed get a wonderful evening slot and experienced the beautiful sunset. Drinks were interesting and staff Bryan & Thiri gave us excellent service. Will definitely visit again.

title: Great Staycation!
desc: Celebrated our anniversary here at Andaz, totally did not disappoint! We stayed a total of 2 nights. The breakfast was great and the service staff were all very friendly and attentive even though it might get quite busy. Rooms were clean and the view was spectacular. Overall a great experience and would love to come back again

title: Nice hotel, friendly and helpful staff
desc: Nice hotel located in city and nearby MRT station and shopping malls. Staff are friendly, always smile and helpful and provide detail briefing. Complimentary beverage and snack at lounge with city view.

title: Amazing
desc: I had a good time spent with my family for staycation. We were on the highest floor. Pool is clean and staffs are friendly. Wish the restaurant 665 could have better customer service and better food qualty. No kids menu?!
